series.title: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
series.author: Online Trading Academy

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Mind of a Trader
episodes.summary: Veteran currency trader, Rick Wright stops by the studio to talk about today’s rate announcement with the Australian Dollar and how it might impact his trading. The duo also looks at listener questions on several currencies, including the Canadian Dollar and the New Zealand dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Benchmarks of Uncertainty with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at several major market issues which will most likely add to the market uncertainty going forward. Many of these topics will present you with some great trading opportunities at some point!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tariff Talk with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell take a look at the unusual world of trade Tariffs. They present may interesting facts and charts on Coffee, oil, natural gas even sugar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Wanderlust with Matt Gildea
episodes.summary: Matt and Merlin talk about some tricks that anyone trading while traveling should know! Simple steps to protect yourself from hackers, and making your international trading more secure. They also address a listener question about options selling strategies.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bigger and Better with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Gene Longobardi to the show to talk about the upcoming OTA Thrive event happening in Las Vegas, as well as the upcoming OTAcademy! Some events and resources for Online Trading Academy graduates! Merlin also takes a couple questions about currencies and portfolio management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Rebalancing Act with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Merlin sits down in studio with Russ Allen to talk about the basics of portfolio allocation, and common mistakes most investors make. Then Russ presents some amazing charts which help support their discussion about the importance of rebalancing your portfolio periodically. The difference in portfolio gains from NO rebalancing to quarterly rebalancing are phenomenal!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Go Long or Short
episodes.summary: Merlin and John break down the current trends in the Online vs. Physical retail space. Both present some amazing trading and investment opportunities, whether you want to go long or short! They also look at Bitcoin, which made an all-time high today.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Managing the Trump Bump with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Long term guru, Russ Allen joins Merlin to talk about how investors should be positioning themselves during this historic market rally. Russ and Merlin look at option strategies which allow investors to join the market rally, without actually buying anything! They walk listeners through a practical example of this using a popular ETF.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Survival Guide with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: After talking for a bit about how the typical trader progresses, Merlin takes several listener questions relating trading survival. Each question highlights some simple problem that traders face and can be easily overcome.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Story Time with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: Long time floor trader on the floor of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, Bill Henner joins Merlin Rothfeld in studio to talk about some of his experiences. They begin by looking at the differences people face trading today vs. 20 years ago when floor traders used predominantly hand signals. Later, Bill offers his insights in the US Dollar and a listener request for stock analysis.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Calling The Shots with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes back Larry Jacobson to talk about the new changes coming to the Online Trading Academy ProTrader class and how it’s going to impact the learning process. Later, Larry gets a big “Atta Boy” for an amazing trade he called out on Power Trading Radio last August, to which Larry offers 2 new great trade candidates!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Know Your Toolbox with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: In a follow-up discussion, Merlin and Tillie look at how to participate in the current market rally without buying long in the equity markets. This involves using different financial instruments, and changing your market approach. They also look at the utilization of volume indicators to help find buying & selling zones.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pick of the Litter with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: Many traders struggle to find the trading instrument that fits their needs. On this show, Merlin and Master trader Craig Weil, take a look at some of the key considerations when selecting stocks, futures, forex and more! They also address a listeners question about market timing, pullbacks and patience!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Execution Methods with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes trading expert, Roger Best to the shot to talk about preferences when sending orders to the market. Most platforms will have multiple ways to send orders, from Order bars, chart trading, Level 2 screens and much more. Merlin and roger talk about their preferred methods, and what traders should be on the lookout for.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Three Powerful Trends
episodes.summary: Merlin and John look at 3 powerful trends expected to move cities, economies, and demographics. To the trained investor, all 3 of these spell opportunity! The duo breaks them down and offers insights into how to benefit from these trends, and also how robotics play into the mix.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Deciphering Order flow with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Having worked on a dealing desk on the floor of the CME for many years, Sam Seiden learned to identify high probability/low risk turning points based in order imbalances. Sam talks about how he learned to identify institutional order flow and translate that over to a price chart. It is this methodology that is the foundation of the Patented trading methodology taught at Online Trading Academy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Put Strategies with Michael Young
episodes.summary: Long time CME floor trader, Michael Young joins Merlin to explain how he is currently trading these markets. Michael talks about some the Put strategies he is using on commodities, as well as his thoughts on the differences between Spot Forex and Currency Futures.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Dealing With Black Swans With David Warner
episodes.summary: Major shakeup happening in the Forex trading space, which may command your attention! David Warner and Merlin Rothfeld look at the issue and offer piece of mind for traders as many panic. They also look at the issues with dealing desks at brokerage firms.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Price Patterns with Sean Reed
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Sean Reed to the show to talk about the price patterns forming on the currency markets. Sean offers his analysis as well as insights on buying securities which have been hit by BIG price declines.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Major Announcements with Dodd-Frank
episodes.summary: Major announcements with Dodd-Frank and an important Fiduciary regulation for financial advisors vaulted financial firms Friday. This may present some great trading opportunities going forward! They also talk about Iran dropping the US dollar, Gold and Oil.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies Ya'll
episodes.summary: Veteran trader, Steve Misic joins Merlin to offer his insights and trading observations for the British Pound against several other currencies. With a major Brexit vote happening next week, tons of trading opportunities are presenting themselves.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Chart Analysis with David Warner
episodes.summary: As promised, David Warner is back in studio to analyze a variety of currency questions sent in by listeners over the past few days. This includes the Euro, Dollar, Pound, Australian Dollar and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Oil & Gas with John Rowland
episodes.summary: Having worked on the floor of the NYMEX for 17 years, John Rowland knows a thing or 2 about Commodities! Today, he joins Merlin to talk about the potential trends for Natural gas, Oil, and other commodities. He also looks at a bizarre anomaly found in the Commitment of Traders report, showing a massive short position on oil futures.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fed Up?!? With David Warner
episodes.summary: Self-Proclaimed Fed lover and Currency Trader, David Warner joins Merlin Rothfeld in studio for a look at the role and significance of the Federal Reserve in the USA. Later the duo look at how countries like Australia, New Zealand and Japan telegraph their currencies with their Rate statements.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell & John Tamny
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Real Estate Trends with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: Real Estate expert, Diana Hill joins Merlin to talk about the recent Trump changes to FHA loans, and its potential impact on the housing markets. Later, the duo answer a great listener question about a personal residence purchase and the risks of waiting to buy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Taking Back Your Finances with Ara Bayindiryan
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes financial market expert, Ara Bayindiryan to the show to talk about how the average American can save themselves untold amounts of money by taking control of all their financial decisions. Each day Americans are faced with Annuities, retirement planning, social security, credit checks, college planning, and much more! Each of which is being sold to you by someone looking to prosper on your decisions. Learn to cut them out of the equation!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Low Volatility with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: With the VIX at lows we haven’t seen in a decade, it’s becoming increasingly difficult for Options sellers to find some Alpha! Master trader, Steve Moses joins Merlin to talk about some of the changes he has had to make to accommodate this current market, and offers some expectations about where we may be headed next!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 2017’s First B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Professional trader & CMT Scott McCormick to the show to talk about his monthly B.E.C.C. report which focuses on multiple asset classes to get clues about market strength and direction. The duo analyze several charts and look at many technical levels which may be significant going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The First 100 Days with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merin and John review a transcript of President Trump’s planned first 100 days. Reading between the lines, there are many great trading opportunities coming! Tune in and find out what they are!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Helping Hands with Brandon Tristan
episodes.summary: After answering several listener questions from today’s special Trump webinar, Merlin welcomes Brandon Tristan to the show. Brandon addresses the topic of trade reviewing and what he and his team do to help traders get over learning obstacles. Later, he offers his insights to a few currencies, including: the Dollar, Pound, and Euro.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Q&A with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Merlin tackles several listener questions and offers analysis of their trades. He also gives more detail about the free webinar with Sam Seiden and Eric Ochotnicki being held Tomorrow, Thursday January 19th at 10am PST. Register for free here: www.tradingacademy.com/trump

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Aggressive Trading with Bob Dunn
episodes.summary: Long time floor trader at the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, Bob Dunn, joins Merlin to talk about a new class he is teaching which applies Mr. Dunn’s aggressive, short term trading approach to Online Trading Academy’s patented Supply & Demand methodology. The duo also look at a listeners trade on the British Pound – Japanese Yen currency pair.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Double Bullish with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: Josip joins Merlin in studio to talk about a recent trading strategy he has been using to capitalize on short term pops in market volatility, he calls it Double Bullish! The also talk about the impact and tweaking of strategies around major market announcements.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monetary Policy In 2017
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell take a look at 5 major items that will be the storyline for monetary policy in 2017. From debt to market corrections, European Union to Trump: today’s show has a little something for everyone!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Being Proactive with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Paul joins Merlin to talk about the current status of the 401k and IRA industry. The duo look at multiple was to increase everyone’s rate of return through simple ProActive steps.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Juggling Volatility with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: Wednesdays trading session was marred with significant swings due to Trump speaking. Is this the new normal?! Master trader Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin to talk about how the current market volatility and rangebound market are making it challenging for some traders. Gabe also looks at the Vix and offers some suggestions to traders on how to use it in conjunction with supply and demand levels for higher probability trades.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 3 Great Trading Opportunities with Tracy Hubbard
episodes.summary: As the new year gets underway, Tracey Hubbard and Merlin look at 3 different currencies for trading opportunities. These 3 have the benefit if very strong trends and some quality supply and demand levels, which make for higher probability trades.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mastering the Short Term with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Roger Best may seem like a long term investor at first glance, however, once you get talking to him, you will quickly realize his Short term trading skills! Merlin and Roger talk about what it takes to to be a short term income trader, and what are some of the adjustments will need to be made for those who are focusing on long term wealth creation.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Base Metals and Other Commodities
episodes.summary: Merlin and John Take a look at the stellar performance of base metals and other commodities in 2016 and offer insights as to their direction in 2017. They also talk about the strongest currency from 2016, Bitcoin!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mapping Out 2017 with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: The architect of Online Trading Academy’s patented supply and demand methodology, Sam Seiden, joins Merlin to talk about some new initiative put in place to further enhance student success, and offer us his insights into what to expect for 2017.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Watching The Data with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Merlin dives into 2017 with a look at how traders and investors should be looking at economic data put out by various agencies. He also offers some insights into the commonly used “overbought & Oversold” words thrown around by traders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 2017 Kickoff with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: Veteran CME floor trader, Bill Henner joins Merlin to talk about major obstacles and opportunities in 2017. From all-time highs, soaring dollar and volatile commodities… 2017 will have something for everyone!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Out With the Old, In With the New with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at their major take aways from 2016, and offer insights into the new year.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Rebalancing with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie shares some insights into how she evaluates her investment portfolios at year end to optimize her overall returns. This often involves rebalancing of instruments to achieve the greatest impact. She also talks about using options as a portfolio catalyst.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Making a Living as a Trader with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Having worked with thousands of traders and students from around the worlds, Sam Seiden has seen it all! His experiences has shown him what it takes to be successful as a trader, and what causes people to fail. He shares these insights with Merlin, then looks at the recent moves in the bond markets for trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mass Market Manipulation
episodes.summary: Merlin takes a look at the amazing rally in the Chip making space, and comments on a wave of recent upgrades by major financial firms. He also offers some suggestions for traders looking for pointers on year end account review.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Tax Plan with Michael Atias
episodes.summary: As the end of year approaches and everyone is fixated on how Trump pays no taxes, Merlin welcomes Michael of OTA Tax Pros. The duo takes a look at how people pay no taxes and how everyone can build a tax plan. Merlin also looks at the benefactors to the new trump tech summit.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Everybody's Working for the Weekend with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Establishing YOUR Rules with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin addresses listener questions pertaining to trading psychology & personality types. He walks listeners through his 10 Laws of Trading in an attempt to show viewers how his rules were built to help address personal weaknesses.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Sit-down with Eyal Shahar
episodes.summary: 20 years ago, Online Trading Academy began in a small office in Irvine California, the brainchild of Eyal Shahar. Today, it is the global leader in financial education, with 40 campuses around the world! Merlin and Eyal talk about how the business has grown, and what are Eyals driving forces to make it even bigger & better!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Report from the North with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bizarro World with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: As president elect Donald Trump rolls out his appointments for prominent positions, Merlin and John discuss the impact that some of these bizarre choices will have on our markets. They also take a look at the recent shift in employment data, and the transitioning of jobs to robotics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Week of Central Banks With Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Thursday capped off the 3rd major central bank rate announcement this week! While all 3 were in line with expectations, it’s the wording by Central bank officials that is causing concern. Tim Pesut joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about the impacts of today’s news, as well as analyze the charts of the Euro, Pound and US Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Inner Zen with Justin Krebs
episodes.summary: Having received multiple compliments on his teaching style and uber calm demeanor, Power Trading Radio welcomes back Just in Krebs to the Show. Justin and Merlin look at the current market rally, US Dollar, Euro and Gold for some past trade and current trade analysis.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Always Learning With Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Jeff joins Merlin to talk about a new asset class that he is trading: Options ON Futures. While not new, it has not been a very popular vehicle with main street. Jeff shares some of his learning experiences with them, then talks about some of the risks. Later, the duo look at Gold and Silver for trading levels.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Dot Bong Era?
episodes.summary: Traders and Investors are scrambling to get on the next trading phenomenon: Pot Stocks. Merlin talks a look at some of the risks involved as countless companies join the fray. He also takes a look at routines and methods of finding trading opportunities in the market.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Easing Into the Weekend with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John look into compelling data as to why the majority of Americans are NOT participating in the current market gains, and then focus on why the top 16 banks are correct less than half of the time when recommending investments to clients.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: Master Trader, Jose Blasco joins Merlin to talk about some of the recent updates to the ProActive Investing course taught at Online Trading Academy. The duo also take a look at the different dollar indexes and offer their insights on the current dollar trend.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bond Markets with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Bond markets have been propped up by the Fed for the past few years, creating a dangerous environment for those wishing to enter the market. Tillie Allison joins Merlin via phone to talk about what is currently going on in the bond and futures markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: All Hail the US Dollar with David Warner
episodes.summary: With more rate increases looming, the US Dollar has been enjoying a serious rally the past few weeks. Master trader & fed aficionado, David Warner joins Merlin on set to talk about what rate increases mean for currencies, and how it impacts the carry trade. David and Merlin also look at gold and relative strength  per listener request.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Master trader, Mike McMahon, joins Merlin in studio to talk about the impacts of the December fed meeting, sighting the possibility of no rate hike and how the markets will react. Later, Merlin and Mike look at Amazon, and the potential for this company which has been beaten up as of late.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Thanksgiving Show with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John joins Merlin Rothfeld on set to talk about the black Friday impact on the markets and what it means to our economy. They also look at Gold and the current “Trump” effect on the global markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: More Q&A with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Merlin answers more listener questions on trading and Investing. Topics ranged from Gold vs. Silver investing for the long term portfolio, to how to deal with stop loss violations. Merlin also shares some insights into how orders are handled by the exchanges.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Merlin Is All Alone
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin dives into the mail bag to answer several listener question. First he bashes a trader for trading dangerous penny stocks, then talks about much of the intellectual discipline needed to succeed as a trader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Rollercoaster
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes John back to the show to catch up on a rollercoaster of a week! The due start off looking at the Baltic Dry index and its recent ascent, followed by a look at the current status of free trade in the US. Later, they look the future with household innovations designed to reduce our costs and emissions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Question and Answer Time!
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin takes time to answer many listener questions including: 401k fears, The importance of trade planning and journaling, and some chart analysis on Gold.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Super Dollar with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Several factors are pointing to a continued dollar rally, which could pose some interesting challenges for the US economy. Tim Pesut and Merlin Rothfeld share their perspectives on the topic as well as the recent boom in shipping stocks and potential trades in the Aussie and Kiwi!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading the Highs with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: Master Trader and Award winning online educator, Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin on set to talk about the current election and market changes. The duo look at several listener questions including some price levels on Oil, and how to deal with markets at all time highs.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Structure & Discipline with Kelly Boycks
episodes.summary: 2015 Instructor of the Year, Kelly Boycks joins Merlin in studio to talk  about how he builds his students confidence through group trading exercises and routines. A former pilot, Mr. Boycks focuses on strict rules and discipline in order to achieve trading success.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 10 Major Economic Headwinds
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at the 10 major economic headwinds that face our great country, and newly elected president Donald Trump.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Anatomy of Recent Moves with Eric Ochotnicki
episodes.summary: Master Options trader, Eric Ochotnicki, joins Merlin to talk about several key factors to Tuesday nights sharp selloff, and the logic behind the massive rally we have experienced since then! The duo also look at considerations for exiting trades and specific market demand levels.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A New Beginning with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: The election results are in, and we will have a new president elect, as well as many new elected officials. Merlin and long time floor trader, Bill Henner team up to talk about how the price action today is giving clues as to further market direction, and how we should be playing it.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Election Day with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: As America heads to the polls, Larry Jacobson and Merlin Rothfeld look at potential portfolios which will benefit from either candidate being elected. They also look at some other ballot measures which may usher in some great trading and investing opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading: The Ultimate Business with Tracy Hubbard
episodes.summary: Having run several successful businesses, Tracy Hubbard knows how it works! Merlin and Tracy talk about why he transitioned to a full time trader/educator, and what lessons he brought from the business world to trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Canadian Housing Bubble, Eh
episodes.summary: Merlin and John look at several disturbing trends in the market including the housing bubble in Canada and the evolution of print media publications. Of course, with less than a week till the presidential elections, they also take a look at several listener questions about politics and trading the elections.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Support Tools with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: A listener recently asked what support Merlin has for his thoughts that we are headed down further. Merlin looks at a variety of run of the mill technical indicators from the perspective of decision support tools. With a foundation of Supply & Demand, he illustrates how these indicators can help clue us into market changes, and how he is using them in his current trade.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Emotional Rescue with Roger Best
episodes.summary: One of the biggest problems for traders is controlling emotions! Roger Best and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at why emotions creep into our trading, offer suggestions as to how to control them, and walk you through some of their biggest emotional problems during their trading careers.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market drop? Don’t Just Buy Puts with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: The equity market experienced a decent sell off Tuesday, causing many traders to seek out the protection of put options. However, those options were significantly inflated! Master trader, Josip Causic, joins Merlin Rothfeld to look at other strategies for capitalizing on bearish or bullish market situations.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Freaky Friday with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Expect The Unexpected with Michelle Volmering
episodes.summary: Master trader, Michelle Volmering, joins Merlin to talk about how she is dealing with the current market chop, and upcoming election. It all boils down to being prepared for the bizarre market moves and having a plan.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Constant Innovation with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Trader & Instructor, Joann Farley joins Merlin on set to talk about some of the upcoming improvements in the XLT community. This trading environment has evolved significantly over the past 20 years, with a consistent focus on student wants and needs.

episodes.summary: For over 20 years, Bob Dunn worked on one of the most Vibrant trading floors in the world, The Chicago Mercantile Exchange. Bob shares some of his trading experiences with listeners and offers some insights into the challenges he faced while transitioning from floor trading to screen based trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Straddling the Trade with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes options trader Steve Moses to the show to help answer a great listener question about Straddles as they pertain to Options. The duo give a great overview of how they work and show some examples on the charts before addressing the pros and cons of this particular strategy.

episodes.summary: Master trader, Scott McCormick joins Merlin to talk about some of the current sector rotation issues happening right now. Scott shares some insights into how he uses this information in conjunction with supply and demand levels to increase his probability of trading success.

episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and David Warner team up to talk about the effects of monetary policy on currency direction in the medium to long term. This included a look at the operations of various central banks to better understand their overall intentions.

episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Merlin Rothfeld

Merlin walks through some market levels on the S&P 500, before talking about some of the steps investors should be doing to protect themselves should the market correct.

They also look at the potential impact of either candidate winning the upcoming election.

episodes.title: Wholesaling Real Estate with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: Merlin and Diana discuss the profession of Wholesaling in real estate and how it might be an important part of your buying process. They also take a look at several charts which shed some light on the current housing markets, and clues as to the future.

episodes.title: Q&A with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Alone in the studio, Merlin takes time to answer several listener questions on a wide range of securities including Apple, Google, Sugar futures, British Pound and much more!

episodes.title: Surfing the Chop with Gabe Velazquez

Gabe and Merlin discuss the current Fed comments and how they are adding to the current waves, then they move on to a listener question about bracket orders.

episodes.title: The Next Shoe to Drop With Steve Bobbitt
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Steve Bobbitt back to the studio to discuss the recent developments with Deutche Bank and how it might impact the markets. Steve also shares some stories from a recent class which offer some insight into how to get out of a losing streak.

episodes.title: Trading Success with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: John and Joann Farley discuss what makes for a successful business and why Online Trading Academy meets those requirements and so much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Austrian Capital Theory
episodes.summary: Baylor University professor Dr. Peter Klein is the Carl Menger Research Fellow at the Mises Instituteis. Peter and John O’Donnell discuss the topic on why zero interest rates pushed by Central Banks do not make sound economic sense according to Austrian capital theory. We discuss why independent capital and voluntary price discovery by the market are the foundation of capitalism, not government intervention into the capital markets led by Central Banks. The duo discuss why the digital  disruptive  online education space is growing in both the for profit and nonprofit education spaces.

episodes.title: Mises Institute Mainstream vs Austrian Economics

Merlin welcomes trader & investor Sean Reed to the studio to talk about what True Diversification is, and what it attempts to achieve. They also answer some listener questions on commodities, particularly gold and silver.

episodes.title: Q & A with Merlin Rothfeld

They also look at several charts pertaining to jobs data for August and the emergence of Fintech. A sector of the economy growing by leaps and bounds, and offering great trading opportunities.

Janet Yellen and some of the most powerful bankers may make statements in the coming days which can create significant market moves!

John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at many charts which might shed some clarity on this confusing topic! The duo also discuss factors which may further push up equity market prices! Finally, the look at a recent report illustrating that 50% of jobs in America will be lost to robots in the next 20 years! Scared? You should be!

The duo also look at Growing retirement problem in America and offer solutions to be better prepared.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing Market Hoedown
episodes.summary: The housing market has played an instrumental role in the continual rally since 2009. Merlin and John look at a variety of charts to see if the strength is still there, and what impact it might have on our markets going forward. They also look at the trillions of dollars sitting in offshore accounts, and the impact it could have if brought back into the US.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Wars with David Warner
episodes.summary: Master trader, David Warner joins Merlin in studio to talk about the recent, and upcoming central bank announcements which have kept markets in uncertainty for the past couple years! David also offers some insights into the Japanese Yen currency pairs which face a major announcement later tonight!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trade Planning with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: From Mumbai India, Vishal Subandh joins Merlin to talk about some trades he has mapped on 3 specific markets. He details why the trades were chosen, and what the plan will be using multiple instruments. Later, Merlin and Vishal look at the Euro and Pound for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Making the Call with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Master trader, Mike McMahon is not afraid to make crazy market calls on the air with Merlin! In this session, Mike talks about his thoughts on his July 21st “Tech Crash” call, and offers insights into other market phenomenon which may be hitting out markets soon!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bird Watching With Steve Bobbitt
episodes.summary: Markets sit perched at all time highs, supported by a wealth of lackluster data. This has trader Steve Bobbitt feeling like a black swan event is nearing! Merlin and Steve look at what those events may look like and how they may impact the market. Later, they look at the upcoming fed meeting and the lack of market correlations!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Ascending Equity Markets
episodes.summary: Equity markets continue their torrid ascent to all time highs, while the data for US growth has been showing weakness for the past year! Something is broken! Merlin and John look at the data and offer insights into why this is happening, as well as the potential time bomb facing financial firms around the world.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Routine with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Merlin walks through some of the basic steps that he takes when making trades in all asset classes. It all begins with market analysis, then breaking down the specific assets which will present the best trading opportunities based on current  conditions. This brings in the odds enhancers, mastermind grid levels, and solid money management to help round out a great trade!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Adaptation Game with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: The market volatility has all but evaporated this past week, making it difficult for Options sellers to find trading opportunities. Master trader, Steve Moses joins Merlin to talk about what he is doing to accommodate these challenging times. Steve goes over his essentials of risk management,  and why he still prefers selling options to buying.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Uncharted Territory with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: With many markets at all time highs, many traders are looking for any opportunity to short! Master trader, Gabe Velazquez cautions against this strategy! Instead, focus on key levels and let the market tell you when to short, or go long! Gabe and Merlin look at several charts for insights as to where those upcoming levels may be.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Case of the Mondays
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Economic Apocalypse
episodes.summary: Are you prepared for the next Economic Apocalypse?! Larry and David discuss Economist James Dale Davidson's prediction of a 50% correction in the stock market in 2016, as well as misconceptions and realities regarding retirement.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Larry David Show
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weighing Your Options with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: Several great questions pertaining to options came in over the past couple days, and Josip Causic joins Merlin in studio to go over them. The look at using the leverage provided with options to capitalize on market moves, as well as how to look at implied volatility to find trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: All About The Levels With Scot Stokes
episodes.summary: Merlin and Trader Scot Stokes talk about how they first focus on supply and demand levels before using any indicator or candlestick formations. They then answer a listener question on a shooting star found on the GE Daily chart.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Labor Participation, Credit and Global Stress
episodes.summary: Jobs acted as the catalyst for the market surge on Friday’s trading session, but was it justified? John and Merlin look at several charts which shed a slightly different perspective than was reflected in the mainstream media! They also look at labor participation, credit, and the stress on global financial institutions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Generating Income Using Options with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at a great listener question regarding an overzealous financial advisor. The duo point out some simple steps to help transfer money out of the financial advisors pockets and into yours! They also break down how being a seller of options can provide a lower risk approach to generating a consistent income stream.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with David Warner
episodes.summary: More listeners than ever have been sending in questions about the Euro, Pound, the Fed and Quantitative Easing! Clearly a sign of uncertainty and confusion. Trader David Warner joins Merlin to talk about the continuing pressure on currency markets, and the great trading opportunities currently at hand!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bangers & Mash with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: Fresh back from a trip to London, Director of Student Services at Online Trading Academy, Larry Jacobson discusses his thoughts and observations regarding the Brexit and the potential trading opportunities. The duo also look at several historical charts for key levels and setups.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Brexit and Coal
episodes.summary: As the dust settles on the Brexit vote, Merlin and John look at the impact the event has had on the global  markets, then break it down even further to identify a much bigger problem than the Brexit itself. The duo also look at the Coal industry and offer some insights per listener request!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Is Your 401k Safe?  with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Another massive settlement hit the 401k industry today, this coming on the heels of any other firms being sued for gouging clients with fees. Trader Paul Orme joins Merlin to talk about what investors should be looking at to see if they are being gouged as well!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Been There, Done That with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: With 43 years of trading experience under his belt, Craig is NO stranger to announcements like the Brexit vote. He offers his insights into how this impacted us so far, and what it might mean going forward. Craig also talks about risk management and scaling in and out of positions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: The “Voice of Reason”, Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin to talk about how he has kept his XLT students calm and composed with all the market volatility caused by the Brexit. Gabe stresses rules and discipline as the major factors to success during periods of large market swings. The duo also go onto answer several listener questions pertaining to several currency pairs.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Announcements With Matt Gildea
episodes.summary: Master options trader, Matt Gildea, joins Merlin to talk about how he approaches major announcements such as Brexit, earnings and much more! The duo also take a look at the concept of relative strength and how they use it to find trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition Brexit Panel
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes John O’Donnell, Larry Jacobson and David Warner to discuss the major events that happened last night with the UK Referendum vote. They look at this as the first domino of many to potentially fall now that the UK has decided to leave the Euro. What does this mean for the markets going forward? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Final Hours with Tracy Hubbard
episodes.summary: In just a few hours, a MAJOR uncertainty will be removed from the market, the Brexit. Regardless of the outcome, the markets will have a chance to move past this hurdle and either seek out new lows, or vault to new highs. Currency trader, Tracy Hubbard offers his insights to how he and his students at Online Trading Academy will be trading the event, as well as analysis of the dollar index.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trader Taxation with Michael Atias
episodes.summary: Michael Atias of OTA Tax Pros joins Merlin to elaborate on topics from a previous show. How can you get Uncle Sam to contribute to your vacations? How can you make sure that you are not going to run in to problems with regard to trader status? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Building Pressure with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Tim was the first to break the Brexit topic on Power Trading Radio back in 2015, and it has been snowballing every since! This week we will get a final decision on the UK departure and the resettling of global markets. Will the new normal be a EU without Britain?! Tim and Merlin discuss this as well as some of the currency pairs which will be experiencing much higher volatility over the next few days!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: June B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Scott and Merlin start off with a look at the Fed, and the possibility of upcoming events such as, rate hikes, or potentially another round of quantitative easing! Then focus shifts to the B.E.C.C. report, a monthly market outlook Scott performs to help shed light on any market changes which could present trading and investment opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: “The Ambassador of Opportunity”, John O’Donnell joins Merlin to talk about the lack of action by the fed with regard to interest rates, and the potential impacts it may have going forward. They also look at the current status of the Brexit vote, and how it will impact US markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Institutions Are Taking Your Money!
episodes.summary: Most financial advisors will tell you that you need to earn a 6-8% rate of return to achieve your retirement goals. Sadly, they do not tell you that they are charging you up to 10% just to be in the investments they advise! And you’re going to pay that fee regardless of market performance! Merlin Rothfeld looks at how the industry is systematically taking what is rightfully yours in exchange for Nothing at all! He looks at ways to get around some of the big fees and put that money back in your pocket. Above all, it’s about education and knowing what to look for! Do you know what to look for?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Brexit is Coming with David Warner
episodes.summary: Today’s unsurprising announcement from Janet Yellen didn’t do much to the markets here in the US, however, all eyes are focused on the nest weeks news. Forex Trader, David Warner joins Merlin on set to talk about some of the finer details of today’s fed announcement, and how it’s shaping up next Thursdays bomb!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Brexit with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: The next couple have some major announcements for all financial markets! Next week, the Fed will make its rate statement, and on June 23rd, the UK will vote on leaving the EU! Veteran floor trader, Bill Henner, joins Merlin to talk about these issue as well as break down some charts from the technical perspective!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Buyouts with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: A massive buyout of LinkedIn had many questioning the action and how it might play out. Merlin offers his 2 cents on the subject and also addresses listener questions on insider transactions and dividends.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John look at the impact of company buyback programs and the CEO effectiveness at timing the markets with buybacks. They also look at the current debt picture in the US, and the eerily similar picture to 2007! Finally, they look at the most recent economic data and offer their insights into next week’s rate hikes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Story Behind the Patent with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Traveling around the world to teach & trade is the life of Sam Seiden! Power Trading Radio managed to get a few minutes with Sam to talk about Online Trading Academy’s patented trading methodology, as well as a little market insight. Merlin and Sam discuss the importance of knowing which side your on: Novice or Professional. Which side are you on?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Plans & Currencies with Jody Wong
episodes.summary: Jody is live on set to talk about the importance of planning your trades as well as identifying personal strengths and weakness in trading. If you don’t do it, the market certainly will. Later, they look at some listener questions on spot pairs including, the Canadian dollar, crude oil, British pound and Yen.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Reginald Ringgold
episodes.summary: Interest rates and the global currency war have flooded Power Trading Radio with currency related questions! Veteran trader Reginald Ringgold joins Merlin Rothfeld in studio to answer several of these questions including: the Euro, British pound, Australian dollar, us dollar and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Analysis with Scot Stokes
episodes.summary: Fresh out of a ProTrader class in Irvine California, Scot Stokes joins Merlin Rothfeld on set to discuss some recent listener questions regarding Semiconductor stocks, candlestick patterns, and the once all mighty Apple!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Oil and Metals with Paul Buzby
episodes.summary: The oil rally is up nearly 90% off its January lows, and there may be some obstacles in its current trajectory! Senior Consultant at RCW Financial, Paul Buzby, joins Merlin Rothfeld on set to talk about his outlook for oil, and to discuss the recent KPMG report on Rare Coin Wholesalers!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Build Wealth Using The Tax Code with Michael Atias
episodes.summary: Director of Tax Services at OTA Tax Pro’s, Michael Atias joins Merlin Rothfeld on set to talk about how everyone, including traders should be utilizing the code to help keep more of the money that they make. Michael answers several listener questions regarding deductions for education, travel, and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: Live from Mumbai India, Vishal Subandh joins Merlin for a look at currencies many listeners have been asking for. Including: the Euro, Dollar Index, Aussie, and the Pound Rupee Cross. Vishal and Merlin also discuss the relationship between the US Dollar and Oil.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Module of Capitalism
episodes.summary: The Ambassador of Opportunity John O'Donnell takes on hosting duties while Merlin is on sabbatical.  He and special guest Mark Thornton discuss capitalism from many different angles and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Platforms with Damontre Owens
episodes.summary: Many people new to the financial markets think it’s only about having a good trading strategy! Truth is, there are many variable which impact your chances for success! One of the biggies is a trading platform. Merlin welcomes trader Damontre Owens to the show to talk about some of the considerations traders & investors should take into consideration when searching for a trading application.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The World Reserve Currency War with Reginald Ringgold
episodes.summary: For years we have been monitoring the growing global power of China and its pressure to take over the worlds reserve currency status. Trader & instructor, Reginald Ringgold joins Merlin to talk about some important changes to this global power struggle, which is starting to change its course! Who will win? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Last month, Scott revealed the findings of his monthly B.E.C.C. report, which showed a bearish bias for the markets based off of several key factors. In the 30 days since that show, the markets have dropped by more than 2%! What will the next 30 days hold? Tune in and find out!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Current State of the Commodity Market
episodes.summary: To help quench Power Trading Radio’s listeners thirst for more information on Gold and other metals, CEO of US Global Investors, Frank Holmes joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld to talk about the current state of the commodity market. The trio look at gold and gold stocks, as well as some new ETF’s in the airline and municipal bond space.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Q & A with Merlin
episodes.summary: Merlin devotes this show to answering many unanswered listener questions from the past week. Topics range from Forex Setups, mortgage rates, arbitrage and even back testing.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Options For A Living with Michael Young
episodes.summary: With over 36 years of trading experience, and much of that on the floor of the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, Mr. Young holds a wealth of trading knowledge! Michael shares what he calls his “bread & butter” trades, and how he uses them to generate income. The duo also look at trend analysis, multiple time frames, and the use of major announcements like we had today.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Uncertainty Rules with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Just weeks away from the potentially historic vote in the UK, markets are particularly volatile! Tim Pesut takes time after his class in Milwaukee Wisconsin to discuss the factors he sees moving these markets and where they may be headed! Tim and Merlin look at the Aussie, Euro, Dollar and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Rant with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Anyone who has traded for a while knows that the media is the MASTER at distorting facts, twisting words and pointing the finger! Roger joins Merlin to talk about a video that was posted on CNBC which included a ridiculous viewpoints on HFT & Shorting between Steve Wynn and Jim Cramer. Roger shares his thoughts and offers clarity into how the markets truly operate!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Misperceptions of Capitalism & Social Inequality
episodes.summary: Dr. Mark Thornton, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld look at the misperceptions of capitalism and social inequality. All this revolves around a theme of being more involved with your personal finances, and work on a plan to grow your net worth. Later, they look at how gold has held up with other asset classes, and as a store of value far better than fiat currency.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Loving the Fed with David Warner
episodes.summary: The battle between technicians and fundamentalists rages on, but there is no battle here! David and Merlin both share how they use fundamental data to help plan out trades, and enhance their probability of success. They emphasize that the fundamentals are a secondary factor to the primary trade analysis on a supply and demand basis, regardless of trading time frame. David also shares some of the criteria he filters for when reviewing central bank statements from around the world.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Mental Game with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: One of the toughest aspects to trading is Psychology! Merlin welcomes trading psychologist and coach, Dr. Woody Johnson to the show to help listeners seeking answers to their trading issues. The duo look at a variety of complex problems which all traders suffer through.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 3 Assets, 1 Goal with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: On a day that offered only food for the bulls, Josip and his students were treated to some great trades! He walks Power Trading Radio listeners through the selection process for his trades, which includes analyzing futures, indicies, index components, equities and ultimately options. With winning trades in hand, he performs one last trick at the end of the trading session.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Catching Up With Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: In a short but entertaining segment, Larry Jacobson joins Merlin in studio to talk about a trade he opened recently on Amazon, which echoes the sentiment of a listener inquiring about shorting opportunities in the same stock. Merlin also answers several listener questions about markets and trading styles.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Given the number of questions about Silver and other commodities, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld devote the entire show to the mining industry. The duo looks at mining, royalties and global demand as potential factors for buying into silver, but both caution about buying at these levels!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Wrap with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: Given the number of questions about Silver and other commodities, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld devote the entire show to the mining industry. The duo looks at mining, royalties and global demand as potential factors for buying into silver, but both caution about buying at these levels!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Leading Indicators with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Everyone wants the crystal ball to see the future, yet nobody has it. What we do have is a wide array of resources, each designed to help us understand where things may be headed! Mike McMahon joins Merlin to talk about an indicator he uses to help anticipate market trends, and right now, its way out of whack! The duo also talk about PE ratios and how they can be misleading in the markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Welcoming Back Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: After a short vacation in France, Tillie is back in the monthly rotation on Power Trading Radio. Tillie and Merlin discuss several markets including the S&P 500, Gold and Oil. The duo look at key levels, as well as address some of the key relationships between these assets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis With Chris Manson
episodes.summary: Chris joins Merlin on set in Irvine California where he talks about several trade setups that he and his students were working in class today. These trades were taken from several sources, including XLT, Mastermind grid, and class analysis. Later, Merlin and Chris talk about the current levels on the S&P 500 and offer insights into where they see it heading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Filtering the Noise with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: With 44 years of trading experience, much of that on the floor of the CME, Craig Weil knows a little bit about trading! Craig shares his thoughts on how he filters through all the market noise emitted daily in the mainstream media. He focuses on a different set of data points that he shares with listeners. He also talks about one of the characteristics that can really lead to successful trading!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: PTR Weekend Edition: the Inflation/Deflation Debate
episodes.summary: Merlin and John talk about the inflation/deflation debate and offer their thought as to where we are on the cycle. They also look at the rates of return for a variety of asset classes, trying to identify fundamental changes in the markets. Finally, the FOMC actions & impacts are looked at.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Apples in India with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: Live from Mumbai India, Vishal Subandh joins Merlin to talk about some great setups on local markets, as well as market relationships which may add to higher probability trades. The duo also look a listener question pertaining to the Apple expansion into India.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Against All Odds with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin takes a look at the inconceivable market rally which refuses to acknowledge a poor earnings season, and economic data. This transitions to a trade setup and analysis for the platinum futures, offering insight into risk management techniques.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Markets with Tracy Hubbard
episodes.summary: When Tracy was on Power Trading Radio last, he and Merlin made some great calls on the GBPNZD, and other currencies. This time around, the duo focuses on the impacts of Oil on the currency markets as well as insights on several different pairs.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Scott McCormick's B.E.C.C. Report
episodes.summary: Scott Joins Merlin for his monthly market outlook, more commonly referred to as the B.E.C.C. report. Scott breaks down some of the current market correlations and what their implications may be for the market going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Commodities with Rick Rule
episodes.summary: John and Merlin welcome the President of Sprott Global Resource Investments, Rick Rule to the show! The trio look at many aspects of the commodities market including gold, silver, copper, mining companies and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Resources for Trading Success with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: The Director for Student Services at Online Trading Academy, Larry Jacobson, joins Merlin on set to talk about some of the new resources in place to further accelerate information retention and trading success! Larry and Merlin also answer questions about today’s selloff, and offer suggestions as to the catalyst.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Highs with Michael Young
episodes.summary: Master trader, Michael Young joins Merlin for a look at how traders should approach the upcoming market highs. He suggests doing what the markets least expect you to do!! What does that mean? Tune in and listen to Michael and Merlin explain!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Money Makes The World Go Round with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Tim and Merlin talk about the significance of currency markets in all asset classes, and how they help as odds enhancers. The duo also look at the Euro, Pound, Yen, Dollar and many more currencies, looking for trading opportunities. They also answer many listener questions about the Brexit and interest rates.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Making of a Great Trader with Scott Chrisan
episodes.summary: Every trader has a journey to tell when it comes to trading! Scott Chrisan joins Merlin on set to talk about his path from Institutional trading to trading his own accounts over the past 16 years.
