He shares with listeners some of his biggest learning lessons, and what he did to overcome obstacles to ultimately be a professional trader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Macroeconomics and Marijuana with Jeff Deist
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld welcome the President of The Mises Institute, Jeff Deist to Power Trading Radio for his 3rd visit! Jeff talks about the potential impacts of negative interest rates, as well as the moral hazards of a bad monetary policy. Later, the tri look at the booming industry of Marijuana in the US.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Filtering Trades with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: Options trader, Josip Causic, joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how he uses scanners and filters to find trading opportunities for Options. This involves using a filter to help find not only trades, but trades that fit your particular trading objective using options! Josip also helps Merlin answer several listener questions!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Listener Questions with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: With no guest on the show today, Merlin dedicates the entire episode to listener questions. From Macro Economics and market players, to JP Morgan and Earnings, Merlin has an answer for them all!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Listener Questions with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: With SO many questions rolling in to the studio, Merlin and Tillie decide to devote the entire show to addressing as many questions as they can. The duo take a look at Gold, Oil, The US Dollar, S&P 500, Starbucks and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Magic Numbers with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and Jeff Manson  “Nerd Out” to some interesting market numbers that Jeff has discovered over the years he has been trading. The duo map out how these figures may shape the markets over the next 34 days. Jeff also answers some listener questions regarding EPS and Dividend usage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Look at the Commodity Markets
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at the commodity markets, offering analysis on market relationships as well as rates of return. Gold, Zinc, Oil, Gold and much more are looked at, and some trading opportunities discovered!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Tax Crash with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Veteran trader, Mike McMahon joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about his forecast for a brief market correction around tax time. Mike offers insights into why he sees the market going south, and offers another date that should have a much bigger market sell off down the road! Want to know the date? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 25 Year Floor Trading Veteran Loren Newman
episodes.summary: It’s not every day that you get a 25 year veteran from the CBOE to talk about how he trades, and how they got into trading! Lucky for Merlin, that’s exactly what happened today! Loren shares his stories of how he got into the trading world in Chicago, and his personal approach to trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Forex Trading Works with David Warner
episodes.summary: For many, the exact workings of a Forex trade are shrouded in mystery! Veteran Currency trader, David Warner, joins Merlin to share his experiences working behind the scenes at a major FX broker, and what traders should know with regards to order flow. David also shares his thoughts on the US Dollar, Japanese Yen, New Zealand dollar and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 6th Year Anniversary Show with Scot Stokes
episodes.summary: With over 1500 live shows, and 4 million downloads, Power Trading Radio celebrates its 6th anniversary with stock trader Scot Stokes! Scot shares some insights into stocks like Apple, Tesla, and the S&P 500.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Current Jobs Numbers
episodes.summary: John and Merlin dive into the current jobs numbers for an interesting look at where the creation is coming from! They also look at the Baltic Dry Index for clues to global growth, or lack thereof!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Reading the Warning Signs with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Russ Allen shares his thoughts about the rapid rise in the markets, and offers some suggestions to those holding long term positions. Russ stresses the rules of ProActive investing, and what he looks for when analyzing the markets from the larger time frame perspective.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Futures Wednesday with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison breaks down several markets including the S&P 500 and Gold, then turns to some rules that have helped shaped her trading career. She shares with listeners her trading results for the month of March, which is something she analyzes to help make her trading better. Judging by the results, its working!!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Fed & The Dollar with Jody Wong
episodes.summary: Janet Yellen stirred the market today with a somewhat predictable speech today, and stocks rallied! Jody Wong joins Merlin to look at the impacts of today’s move on the US Dollar, the Pound, Euro, and the Yen.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Social Mood and Trading with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: One of the original instructors at Online Trading Academy, Mike McMahon, Joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how current events have been leading to somewhat predictable trading markets! Mike looks at how social mood has been steering buyers and sellers, and where they are likely to go! The duo also look at the current situation for Oil.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The 4th Industrial Revolution
episodes.summary: Revolutions have a way of creating amazing opportunities, both long and short! On today’s show, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at the 4th Industrial Revolution, which we are currently in. The duo discuss the potential impacts of this revolution and where trading opportunities may be found!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Indian Markets with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: Vishal joins Merlin to offer his monthly insight into several Indian markets including The Nifty and Banknifty Indexes, as well as the USDINR currency pair. Vishal shares several charts to help traders understand the concept of multiple time frame analysis, as well as confluence.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodity Mayhem with Don Dawson
episodes.summary: Commodity markets have been dishing out some amazing trading opportunities recently! Don Dawson joins Merlin to analyze several popular commodity charts and offer insight into some facts you might not be aware of!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Charting Forex with Sam Evans
episodes.summary: Merlin Welcomes back Sam Evans to answer listener questions on several currency pairs including: the New Zealand Dollar, Canadian Dollar, British Pound, Euro, Yen and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mapping The Trade with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Roger joins Merlin, live in studio with his ProTrader class in Irvine California! Roger walks through some trade setups, as well as the importance of looking at different time frames to help dial in trades. They also answer a live question on how to determine when a gap is going to occur, and how big!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John break down the important factors regarding inflation. Several listeners have asked for more clarity on the topic, so the boys help out! The focus is on a mix of different instruments to help gauge inflation, not just the industry promoted & manipulated CPY & PPI!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Industry “Experts” will tell you that you cannot time the markets, nor should you try! Sam and Merlin look at this fallacy and offer their take. Sam shares with listeners his perspective on projecting market tops & bottoms as well as discussing some of his best & worst trades he has taken.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mapping Out Oil with John Rowland
episodes.summary: Long time energy floor trader, John Rowland, joins Merlin Rothfeld on set to talk about the current Oil & Natural Gas picture. The duo look at multiple contracts to help determine underlying strength & weakness in the energy products, as well as breaking down the commitment of traders report for more odds enhancers!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Time Zones with Sam Evans
episodes.summary: Originally, Sam did most of his trading from London, enjoying the best of both worlds with regards to active currency markets! Now, Sam has moved to the US, and talks about how he deals with no longer being awake for the open of the London markets! Sam and Merlin also answer listener questions about time frames and risk management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How To Trade Announcements with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: Following last week’s volatile markets and major ECB announcements, many listeners questioned how to trade these frequent events. Master trader, Gabe Velazquez, joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how he personally trades these events, and what you should look out for.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Deirdre McCloskey
episodes.summary: Economist, professor and author Deirdre McCloskey joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld to a look at economic History. Through an understanding of the past, we can focus on the events and tactics which led to great economic growth and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Listener Question Day with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: With no guest on the show today, Merlin focuses on catching up with a ton of listener questions! Topics range from adding gold & silver to retirement accounts, Continuous education and coaching, and specifics  like analysis of the NZDUSD and Crude Oil.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Impact of Negative Rates with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: The Steep decline in oil prices have put a crimp on jobs around the country. Tim Pesut joins Merlin on the show to talk about his current Forex class in Houston Texas. In this class, many students were in the oil industry and worried about job security, which drove them to be proactive about their financial future. Time and Merlin talk about the impacts of negative interest rates for the US economy, then dive into some analysis on the New Zealand Dollar, British Pound and Australian Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: High Probability Options Trades with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Many traders are looking for the Massive winners, and will boast about their trading. Today’s guest, Steve Moses, has no interest in boasting! He focuses on setting up extremely high probability trades which generate smaller profits. Mr. Moses talks about how he adapts his style to the current markets, and changes as needed. The duo also tackle a listener question on Credit Spreads and risk/reward ratios.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Business Godfather: Chris Koomey
episodes.summary: Trading is a business, Period! As traders, we must treat it like one. Merlin welcomes the President of the Online Trading Academy in Washington DC and Baltimore to the show to talk about his new book “The Business Godfather Treatment: The Streetsmart Handbook for Building Business Wealth.” Chris and Merlin look at some major factors to take your business and trading to the next level.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld discuss the recent article by Niels Jensen: If Only We Could Blame China. The show revolves around commodities, interest rates, debt and global markets. Merlin and John both offer insight to the topic, and also how they plan on trading given the current market conditions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using All Available Resources with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: 2 weeks ago, Larry was on the show talking about a trade he recently opened in Pepsi. He mapped out the trade on air, and talked about the logic behind it. On this show, he shows us the results of the trade, and outlines how he is going to play it going forward. Larry and Merlin also talk about many of the resources available to traders, but free and paid for.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Should You Follow the Market Gurus?
episodes.summary: Alone on set, Merlin takes a look at a couple major headlines including several listener questions regarding market  dynamics and trade setups. Merlin focuses on some trades he is still in, and the justification for the trades he closed out during today’s bullish commodities session! Listeners also question the validity of following market experts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What It Takes To Make It with Jody Wong
episodes.summary: Jody joins Merlin on set to talk about the realities of succeeding in trading. Merlin and Jody look at several key concepts which are paramount to success, regardless of trading style. Jody reinforces these with live examples of trades taken in his ProTrader class today in Irvine California.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Preparation with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Many investors build their portfolios based off a flawed model taught by the financial industry. Russ Allen joins Merlin to look at the correct way to design a portfolio as well as tools to help generate increased rates of return.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Richard Ebeling
episodes.summary: Merlin and John welcome back Dr. Richard Ebeling to talk about his recent article about The Follies and Fallacies of Keynesian Economics. The trio also look at the current debt picture in the US and the potential for the “End Game”.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The 4 Slices of Real Estate with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: Merlin and Diana break down many of the misconceptions that reality TV has put in our heads when it comes to real estate! Whether you’re talking Fix & Flip, Wholesaling, Multi-Family or commercial, there are things you must know and do in order to be successful. Diana talks about how the 4 programs at OTA Real Estate are set up, what the primary objective is, and what separates these 4 courses apart from others in the industry.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Nailing Levels with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: It’s not often that you hit a significant Demand zone to the tick, then have it rally hard to the opposite Supply zone, to the TICK!! All during the same trading session! That’s exactly what Bill Henner and his students experienced during their trading class in New York City today. As well as anyone else following the levels on the MasterMind grid! Bill shares with us his thoughts on trade planning, as well as some answers to listener questions on the Euro, and getting stopped out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Trend is Your Friend with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: For the past 6+ months, every time Vishal has been on the show, he has been adamant about selling the rallies! And for 6+ months, he has been SPOT on! Will his market view persist? Tune in and find out the answer and much more as Vishal calls in from Mumbai to talk to Merlin on Power Trading Radio.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Setups & Style with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Roger Best stops by the studio to talk about how he uses pre-market activity to help identify trading opportunities. He walks through an example from last week’s trading session, then the focus shifts to identifying ones trading style.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Socialism vs. Capitalism with Dr. James Otteson
episodes.summary: In an effort to add some clarity to two misused and misinterpreted terms, John and Merlin welcome Dr. James Otteson to the show! The trio look at how these terms have historically been, in both good ways and bad.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: New Service Rollout with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: Last week on Power Trading Radio, Sam Seiden shared information about a new options service being rolled out soon that would be available to the MasterMind community. Today, Larry announces the official rollout and offers some details about this revolutionary options service that you can’t get anywhere else. Larry also walks us through a trade he is currently in and talks about his view of spread trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tuning Out The Noise with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: Craig Weil spent many years on the floor of the CME trading the only true currency: Price! Not the news, not what CNBC was telling him, or any other biased reporting! And you shouldn’t either! Merlin and Craig talk about how the media distorts the market picture, causing traders and investors to lose money. Are you in the same boat?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Rock Star Corey Lane
episodes.summary: Aside from being an accomplished musician, Corey Lane is also a very accomplished Trader! Corey joins Merlin to talk about his style of trading options, and how the market dictates his trading style. He shares with listeners some strategies that are working well in the current market environment, as well as showing some examples for viewers.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Despite a great 2 day run, the weekly tally for the markets were all in the red! John O’Donnell joins Merlin to talk about many market moving factors, including: Gold, inflation, interest rates, Silver, oil, and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mastering The Game with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Sam joins Merlin on set to talk about the current market decline which he and his team had called out back in November. What should traders and investors do at this point? How far will it drop? And what asset class present the best trading opportunities? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Why Options with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes trader Paul Orme to the show to talk about an asset class that only 25% of traders and investors are using: Options! Surprising many overlook, or ignore the power of options as an insurance product, income generator and trading vehicle! Paul discusses their utility and how he uses them.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Beware of the NERP! With Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: The currency war is heating up, and its having a big impact globally! Commodities continue to get crushed creating some interesting opportunities across the board! Tim Pesut joins Merlin to share his outlook on this currency war, as well as talk about some trades he is currently in. Listener questions stretch thing to a discussion of the Euro, Pound, and the Mexican Peso!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Southern Hemisphere’s Biggest Star – Brandon Wendell
episodes.summary: The “Road Warrior” joins Merlin for a look at some of the trades he executed during today’s All Asset Mastery XLT session, and share his thoughts on markets going forward. After making some amazing market calls live on CNBC Asia, Brandon will be back on the air to co-host upcoming programs during his visit to Online Trading Academy Singapore and Jakarta.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Mark Skousen
episodes.summary: Professor, economist, author, and recently named one of the top 20 most influential economists of our time, Mark Skousen joins John and Merlin live on set of Power Trading Radio to talk about Economic data and share his ideas on where we may be headed from here.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Preparing for the Unknown with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Merlin receives a great listener question about how global turmoil will impact short term and long term trading. Merlin and Tillie Allison look at the impacts for the long term, and analyze several markets for potential opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Power of Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Steve Moses takes time after his Options class in Atlanta to join Merlin and discuss several listener questions pertaining to the selling of options. The duo look at the higher probability side of selling as opposed to the greater reward of Buying options. Steve offers his insights into collars as well as spread trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Interest Rates and Currencies with Jody Wong
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes trader Jody Wong to the set of PTR to talk about the current negative interest rate environment facing several countries. Will it impact the US? Will the US follow suit? Later the duo takes a look at the GBPJPY as well as the USDCAD.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stopping The Slide with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Regardless of how long you have been trading, every trader goes on a losing streak. At times, it feels like it will never end! Jeff Manson joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how one should go about stopping the losses and getting back to financial prosperity! They also cover current market analysis as well as answer several listener questions on specific stocks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Andrew Zatlin
episodes.summary: There are millions of resources out there to help navigate the financial markets! John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld welcome Andrew Zatlin of www.MoneyBallEconomics.com to the show to talk about some macro economic data as well as the Vice Index! A unique index which may act as a leading indicator for the markets according to Zatlin.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Capital Preservation with Paul Buzby
episodes.summary: One of the secrets of wealth is growing your wealth regardless of market condition. Merlin welcomes Paul Buzby of RCW Financial, to talk about the use of metals and rare coins to help diversify holdings as well as hedge downside risk. The show focuses on rarity of coins, and presents a 1797 US dollar worth over $325,000… and climbing!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning For The Worst with Michelle Volmering
episodes.summary: As markets gyrate wildly, veteran trader cautions investors and traders to prepare for downside moves! While nobody knows 100% where the markets are headed, may are sitting in big gains thinking the markets can only go up! Michelle and Merlin take  a look the current market landscape, and touch on some important correlation aspects which may give you a competitive advantage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Breaking Down Oil with John Rowland
episodes.summary: With 17 years trading commodities on the NYMEX, John Rowland has a pretty good understanding of what moves markets! Merlin and John talk about the supply and demand issues which face Oil, as well as a look at a variety of futures contracts to help see potential changes in the future. John also talks about his series of Mastermind Community sessions which focuses on how Market Makers and Floor Traders play tricks on the public!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Nailing Levels with Roger Best
episodes.summary: On his last visit with us on Power Trading Radio, Roger was talking about trade setups, and how he plans out trades with his students live in class. This time, roger shares 3 of the setups that his class worked on from December 11th, all of which worked out very well! The duo looks at probability and risk management as a function of planning as well.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John joins Merlin in studio to talk about the many different aspects and impacts of Oil! Focus points toward the possible capitulation bottom put in on Wednesday. Is it the Bottom? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Markets with Irfan Patel
episodes.summary: Out from behind the walls of the XLT program at Online Trading Academy, Irfan Patel lands in Tampa Florida to teach a currency class. He also takes time to come on Power Trading Radio to look at several currency pairs and listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Learning New Tricks with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin from Kansas City, where she is sitting in on an options class with Steve Moses. While normally Tillie is in the teaching spot, she decided to refine her skills in options trading by sitting in with an options master! Even great traders take classes! Tillie and Merlin take a look at several market including the S&P, Bonds, Commodities and Currencies!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: January 2016 B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Master trader, Scott McCormick joins Merlin to share his most recent analysis of the markets including Bonds, Equities, Commodities and Currencies, or the B.E.C.C. report! Last time, it showed a higher probability for further downside movement in the equity markets , does the same hold true in 2016? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Don’t Miss A Step with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: In a year of significant changes and market moves, Director of Student Support and Trader, Larry Jacobson joins Merlin Rothfeld to reflect on his biggest learning lesson from 2015, as well as offer some insights into what he sees for 2016. Larry also talks about how struggling traders sabotage themselves, and how his team is working to build exercises and procedures to help traders succeed.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: The dynamic duo of John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take at look at the decline in Oil, and the remote possibility of $20, $10 and possibly worthless oil! Seem crazy? Tune in and find out why it’s not so fare fetched!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Gas, Oil and Gold… Oh My!
episodes.summary: Solo on the show, Merlin welcomes a small live studio audience, who asks questions pertaining to the decline to oil. Merlin also focuses on listener questions and how to apply risk management techniques to current markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Brexit?!? A Look Ahead with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Markets continued to sell off as fear starts to rip through main street. Many global events are also causing angst! Tim Pesut joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about the potential of Britain exiting the EU, and what the prospects might be for their currency. The duo also talks about potential trades in the Aussie Dollar as well as answer several listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tape Reading of Options with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: Back in the 90’s, tape reading of equities was essential to short term traders. However, may overlooked the art as it applies to Options trading. Online Trading Academy instructor and trader, Josip Causic Joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about he uses the tape to find institutional buying and selling, and use the big traders to his advantage. The duo also look at a current trade that Josip has been analyzing with his students.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodity Meltdown with Wayne Citron
episodes.summary: Wayne Citron joins Merlin in studio to talk about his current futures class in Irvine California. It was a rocking start to the week with a huge down day in the commodities markets. Merlin and Wayne look at the impacts of trends on the current slide in Oil, as well as what it says about the broader market outlook going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with David Warner
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes back currency trader David Warner to the show! David has spent all week teaching a Forex class in Irvine California, riding out waves of volatility in the currency markets! David offers his insights into the current global situation before diving into charts of the New Zealand Dollar, Oil, and several other currency pairs!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Indian Markets with Rahul Ghose
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes investor/trader, Rahul Ghose from Mumbai India to the program for a look at what’s happening in the Indian financial markets. Rahul takes a look at several Auto & Pharmaceutical stocks before offering some analysis on the Nifty index.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Real Cause of the Financial Crisis with Peter J. Wallison
episodes.summary: With the release of the new movie “The Big Short” there is a renewed interest in what really happened. Having served on the White House Counsel under Reagan and Rockefeller, Peter J. Wallison has seen his share of political maneuvering! He points out some of the real keys to the financial collapse which may shock many viewers!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mapping Out 2016 with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: In January of 2015, Mike McMahon was on the show and made several forecasts for the year. All but one came true! Will 2016 be any different? Founding Father of Online Trading Academy joins Merlin to talk about his biggest takeaways from 2015, and what he is looking forward to in 2016! The duo talk about the Pound, Aussie, us Dollar and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: New Year’s show with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: The first official guest of the year, Jeff Manson, joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at his biggest learning lesson of 2015 and his thoughts on 2016. The duo answer listener questions on the use of Supply and Demand levels, and ways to help avoid being stopped out.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Power Trading Radio Final Show 2015
episodes.summary: The ambassador of opportunity John O'Donnell hosts the final show for 2015 with special guest Dr. Mark Thorton discussing global financial issues and how you can create a personal strategy to increase your wealth in 2016 and beyond!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Big Picture on Indian Markets with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: As the year comes to a close, Vishal Subandh breaks down the BIG picture for the Indian markets. Merlin and Vishal look at the major indexes from multiple time frames, offering supply and demand levels for nearly every time frame. The duo also talk about the current downtrend and potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trade Review with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: As the Year comes to a close, Merlin welcomes Tillie Allison to the show to talk about her quarterly and annual trade review. The duo also answer listener questions on stop losses using options and intricacies of looking at Level II to help gauge price movement and liquidity.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Richard Ebeling
episodes.summary: The gold standard ushered in a period of great US strength causing many to argue a return to a commodity backed currency. Dr. Richard Ebeling joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at a brief history of free market economies, then dive into the feasibility of a gold standard as well as its potential impacts for the United States.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Following Your Passion with Eric Ochotnicki
episodes.summary: Merlin opens the show addressing a listener question about negative trading & learning environments. He emphasizes that if you want something bad enough, move past the negativity and prove them wrong with actions! Former floor trader, Eric Ochotnicki joins Merlin to add his views on the topic, then turns to the US dollar and its current impact on the financial markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Solo on Set with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Sorry, Han Solo is not in studio today! Merlin answers a variety of listener questions covering topics from Donald Trump, Technical Indicators, and the all important year end trade review!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Dealing With Change with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: The markets are about to change with the first rate hike in many years! Merlin welcomes Dr. Woody Johnson to the show to talk about how traders should deal with market changes from a trading perspective as well as a Psychological one. Dr. Johnson addresses the importance of journaling, routine, trading plans and focusing your mind on success in any market.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Mood & Correlation with Sean Reed
episodes.summary: The market showed 4 distinct moves today, providing Sean Reed and his class of Stock traders in Irvine California some nice trade setups. Sean talks about how traders need to be ready to take great trading opportunities that the market offers.  He also addresses the current mood of traders and the power of looking at market correlation for trading opportunities in all asset classes!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Back in the studio, John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at the demise of commodities and commodity stocks. While the charts may look like a tremendous buying opportunity, John warns about further declines and offers suggestions for natural resources going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Direction with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Having spent many years on the floor of the CME, Sam Seiden doesn’t put a lot of emphasis on economic announcements. He focuses primarily on price. Sam and Merlin look at the current price situation for the S&P 500 and how that should be steering trades going forward. They also answer several listener questions about the future of gold!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Wars Heating Up!
episodes.summary: The next two weeks will present some catalysts for the currency world with some major rate announcements. Merlin takes a look at the global purchasing power of the dollar, and how he uses it to chose his vacations, then offers some analysis of the US Dollar, Japanese Yen, and Euro.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Catching up with Roger Best
episodes.summary: On a day which would escalate most investors market angst, Roger Best joins Merlin to talk about the great trading opportunities he and his students identified. Roger points out how market volatility can be a good thing and why traders should embrace it!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & John Tamny
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell interviews John Tamny, Forbes writer and editor of Realclearmarkets.com. The duo discuss Tamny’s book Popular Economics about global trade, taxes, honest money, and less government regulations being the foundation of a growing USA economy and new job creation to enhance quality of life and peace.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Bert Dohmen
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and his guest, Bert Dohmen of Dohmen Capital Research and Wellington Letter, discuss coming China and Japan credit purge/defltionary crisis, and the coming crash in USA equity and corporate bond markets. Central Banks across the world have created this coming bust condition through their cheap credit Q/E programs and other methods of artificial stimulus that has not produced real economic growth and job recovery that is sustainable.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Peter Klein
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Dr. Peter Klein, Economist, Baylor University Business School discuss the role of entrepreneurs in our society to drive invention, capital risk management, and innovations that enhance our lives and society via free exchanges of products/services with low government interventions and barriers. Dr. Klein’s expertise, experience and knowledge is ground in Austrian economics principles as outlined by Ludwig von Mises and other classic liberal economists. This show discusses the question of the new fundamental entrepreneurial web teaching models, and characteristics to success in business innovation including the hyper efficient/affordable web-based higher education today in private sector like www.tradingacademy.com.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: John O'Donnell and Mark Thornton discuss the history of Austrian economics and the differences between it and Keynesian economics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Richard Ebeling
episodes.summary: John and his guest, Dr. Richard Ebeling, Professor of Austrian Economics at The Citadel, University discuss why thanksgiving should be celebrated as the birthplace of USA free enterprise. They discuss the principle of capitalism which our founder gave us to follow. Why socialism did not work for the Pilgrims, China, Cuba, and the Soviet Union as explained by Ludwig Von Mises.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & George Reisman
episodes.summary: "The philosophy of 'Buy and Hold' may not be dead, but it's in a coma," states co-host Merlin Rothfeld. "Our listeners demand timely, actionable information that can help them move their money where they find the greatest potential." Rothfeld is joined in an interactive panel format by Mike McMahon, Tilly Allison and John O'Donnell, all seasoned traders who are also professional instructors. The show also features a live and interactive feature called a POWER BLAST, where listeners can get evaluation of their trades or state their own viewpoints, LIVE and in real time during the show.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: For the first time, investors and traders across the nation will be able to get live perspective on the market from experienced professional traders. "Power Trading Radio" is aimed at an audience that wants to improve its edge through active participation whether the market is moving up, down or sideways. In addition to stocks, topics will include foreign exchange, options and wealth management.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John and Merlin take a look at the top stories facing the markets including the curious decision of the NYSE and Nasdaq to stop accepting stop loss orders! The duo also address the differences between Mutual Funds and Hedge Funds and why many Hedge Funds are shutting down.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Gas with John Rowland
episodes.summary: Commodities have had a tough time as of late, but there may be some hope on the horizon. Former floor trader, John Rowland joins Merlin to talk about some of the unique tools he uses to anticipate natural gas and other commodities. More Odds enhancers for you!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Indian Markets with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Vishal to the program to talk about how the Indian financial markets have been fairing since his last visit. From the looks of the charts, there are more opportunities for downside movement!! Vishal and Merlin talk about the Nifty, Bank Nifty and the Rupee!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Capitalizing on Fear & Greed
episodes.summary: Michelle Joins Merlin to talk about how her Futures trading class in Atlanta this week got a great lesson in trading fear! The terrible events in Paris and Beirut last week caused investors to panic, sending the markets sharply lower when futures opened on Sunday night. This presented a great buying opportunity for the class!. Michelle and Merlin discuss how to utilize herd mentality to your advantage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stops & Options with Josip Causic
episodes.summary: Many options traders do not use stop losses, and when they do, it is usually done incorrectly. Trader Josip Causic joins Merlin in studio to talk about the right way to place stop losses, and considerations traders must use when determining placement! Josip also talks a little about his trading style as well as answer some listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with William J Boyes
episodes.summary: Getting rid of public schools seems crazy, until you take a look at the mechanics and results of public schools! Emeritus Professor of Economics at Arizona State University, William J Boyes, joins John O'Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld to share his insights on why getting rid of public schools will create smarter, more driven students.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Mike McMahon Award
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes one of the Original Online Trading Academy instructors, Mike McMahon to the show to talk about the award with his name on it! Mike talks about the standards needed to be a top tier instructor, and win the award. Later, the duo talks about commodities and the current trends they are experiencing. This may present some great trading opportunities for you!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: Former floor trader from Chicago, Craig Weil, joins Merlin to talk about how he has been trading these markets and the specific opportunities he traded today! Craig also talks about some of the statistics he recently discovered about his own trading, as well as how a normal trading day flows for him. They also talk about some great moments from the trading floors in Chicago.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex Analysis with Stephen Hanahoe
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes currency trader Stephen Hanahoe to the Power Trading Radio studio to talk about the most current moves in the FX markets. The duo answer listener questions about the Euro, Aussie, Cross Pairs, Carry Trades, and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The 2015 Mike McMahon Award Winner: Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Having gone above and beyond as an Online Trading Academy instructor, Jeff Manson’s consistent efforts to help students succeed as professional traders was rewarded with the coveted Mike McMahon Achievement award. Jeff talks to Merlin about his current class in Irvine California, some of the great trades they made, and the utility of the MasterMind grid levels. Jeff Also talks about his thoughts on this current market at such lofty levels.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Jobs data has the market buzzing, but nobody can tell whether that is a good or bad thing! John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about the jobs report, real employment numbers and the impact on the Fed decision in December. The dynamic duo also look at household income data and commodity prices. Definitely some trading opportunities there!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Investing for the Long Haul with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Merlin and Tillie take a look at how to invest capital now, with the intent of the continued bullish market trend. Tillie also talks about some of the strategies they implement in the ProActive Investor class at Online Trading Academy. Merlin also offers some helpful advice for traders who hit the dreaded “Downward Spiral”.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Daytrading Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: With several listeners asking about daytrading options, veteran options trader Steve Moses joins Merlin to help break this trading technique down. Steve and Merlin point out some of the major challenges to consider when trading options for the short term. They also look at another listener question pertaining to stocks at all time highs, and techniques for using covered calls.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking at the Big Picture
episodes.summary: The director of Student Support at Online Trading Academy joins Merlin in studio to talk about his perspective on this rallying market. Larry also answers some listener questions about finding trading opportunities, patience, the Euro and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Instructor of the Year: Kelly Boycks
episodes.summary: Winner of this year’s coveted Online Trading Academy Instructor of the Year award, Kelly Boycks joins Merlin in studio to talk about his evolution as a trader. From Airline pilot, to stock broker, to the top instructor at Online Trading Academy, Mr. Boycks has personified discipline and structure. Merlin and Kelly talk about how rule based systems have helped him excel at his professions, and helped his students grasp market complexities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: John O'Donnell's guest on this edition of Power Trading Radio is Dr. Pierre Desrochers of the University of Toronto Mississauga.  Pierre and John discuss the centuries old concept of the population bomb, as well as the gloom and doom economic scarcity myths of Malthus & Paul Erlich that was a hoax.  They also discuss the deception by both scholars to promote a permanent bullish bias of natural resources, as presented in Julian Simon's book "The Ultimate Resource", used to dispel the myths with factual data and logic.  Commodity prices will continue to decline per hour of labor across the world by end users as measured by the CRB Index, as mankind's ability to reason, collaborate, and innovate via the division of labor. Conclusion: we need more people, not less.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Excellence From the Top Down
episodes.summary: Merlin welcomes Chief Operating Officer of Online Trading Academy Gene Longobardi. The duo discuss the progression of trader and ivesting education over the past 18 years, highlighting the steps Online Trading Academy has taken to create the best possible learning experience for students. This includes content, community and support systems to help students achieve their financial and personal goals.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Treating Real Estate Like a Bank with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: For the past few days, Online Trading Academy has been hosting its annual international conference in Irvine California. This year, one of the highlights has been the amazing new Real Estate products and services! Master instructor, Diana Hill joins Merlin to talk about these new tools and why they have historically been available only to large financial firms! Diana also talks about different ways to become involved in real estate which call for very little capital investment.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Wage income inequality in the US is a major issue facing Americans. John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at some shocking statistics which reinforce the issue before offering solutions. Ultimately, wealth is about awareness, education and action!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trend or Countertrend With Michael Young
episodes.summary: Many listeners sent in comments about their struggle with trend or countertrend trading. Michael Young and Merlin Rothfeld offer their takes on how they trade both market conditions, and what others should be on the lookout for! Michael also offers some insights into the Pound as well as the S&P 500 futures.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Switch Hitting with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Trading what the market gives you is one of the motto’s of Power Trading Radio, and Steve Moses joins Merlin to talk about how August was one of his best trading months ever, and it was using a totally different style! Steve tailored his trading strategy in August to accommodate for extreme volatility and was handsomely rewarded! Merlin and Steve discuss the importance of adaptation for successful traders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The 2 Keys to Successful Trading with Sunil Mangwani
episodes.summary: Currency trader Sunil Mangwani joins Merlin to talk about his years of trading experience and the 2 fundamental keys that are found in all successful traders. The duo later focus on listener questions ranging from the Aussie, Loony and the US Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Finding Your Niche with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Master Trader Roger Best has spent years reading price action and creating his own unique approach to trading. Merlin and Roger talk about his style and how it utilizes key elements of supply and demand to enter high probability trades on a short term basis. Roger also bring up the discussion of Bracket or OCO/OSO orders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Richard Ebeling
episodes.summary: In a story reminiscent of Raiders of the Lost Ark, Dr. Richard Ebeling joins Merlin and John to share his story of finding the lost works of Ludwig Von Mises in KGB vaults in Russia. The trio talk about some of the impacts of monetary policy and how Mises viewed things like inflation, central banks, and negative interest rates!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Handling Market Volatility with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: Many traders find it difficult to trade consistently when the market has elevated volatility. Seasoned floor trader, Bill Henner joins Merlin to help answer some listener questions pertaining to the topic of losing streaks. Bill also offers some insights into fundamental data, and where he sees the market heading in the near future.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Filtering Financial Salesmen with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: The financial industry is chocked full of salesmen trying to get you to buy what their firms are selling. Merlin welcomes Paul Orme back to the show to talk about the blockage of legislation to help investors get a fair shake in the financial world. The only real solution is to have a solid understanding of how to ProActively manage your own money!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Helping Traders Succeed with Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: Trader Larry Jacobson joins Merlin to talk about his role with Online Trading Academy, developing and enhancing resources to help traders overcome obstacles and be part of a community. The duo talk a little about trading psychology before diving into chart analysis of Gold and the New Zealand Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Yields and Gold with Merlin
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin fields several listener questions about some potential gold trades as well as a look at the importance of the yield curve. He brings up many charts to help explain the gold levels, as well as other stocks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Christopher P. Casey
episodes.summary: The Ambassador of Opportunity, John O’Donnell welcomes Christopher Casey of WindRock Wealth Management to the show to discuss the impacts, or lack of impact, from the velocity of money. The tri talk about monetary issues which may be leading to inflation and impacting supply & demand for the US Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Rising Star in Indian Markets with Rahul Ghose
episodes.summary: Merlin talks to Online Trading Academy instructor Rahul Ghose who is teaching a trading class in Mumbai India. Rahul talks about learning lessons on his rise to becoming a professional trader, and how he learned these major lessons. He also gives some insight into the impact of a slowing Chinese economy, and the Nifty index.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Commitment with Don Dawson
episodes.summary: By Commitment, we mean the weekly report put out by the CFTC called the Commitment of Traders. Don talks about what he looks for and how to spot potential turning points in commodities.  The duo also look at a couple of commodities which are exhibiting too much volatility, and should be watched for now, not traded! It all boils down to risk analysis!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Money and Oil with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: While some currencies have not had a great sense of direction recently, Master Trader Tim Pesut talks about other areas he looks to for trading opportunities. Merlin and Tim differ on their outlook for oil going forward, which will ultimately find one of them right! Tim also offers some insights into the Canadian and Australian Dollars.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Set & Forget with Ryan Watkins
episodes.summary: Equity markets continued their rapid ascent Monday, ending the day near supply levels which could prove challenging for tomorrows upside push. Master Trader, Ryan Watkins, joins Merlin in studio to answer some listener questions on topics ranging from set & forget orders to tactics for dealing with volatile markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Case for Raising Rates with Paul Buzby
episodes.summary: Paul Buzby, Senior Consultant at RCW financial joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at why he not only thinks the fed should raise rates, but why it will be a good thing for America! The duo also look at a variety of alternative investment vehicles for protection from volatile markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Is QE4 Coming?
episodes.summary: While most of the financial world is bracing for raising interest rates sometime this year, trader Scott Greer feels that they will Not raise, and will eventually bring another round of QE! Merlin and Scott look at this possibility as well as some great technical analysis of the Aussie and the Euro/Pound.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trader Taxation with Michael Atias
episodes.summary: Is there a way to keep more of the money that you earn from working and trading? Absolutely! Michael Atias of OTA Tax Pros joins Merlin to talk about how everyone can benefit from having a custom tax strategy. Whether you are a trader or not, there are many ways to keep more of what you make, and ways to write off expenses for your day to day activities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Making The Most of MasterMind with Jeff Manson!
episodes.summary: There are a Zillion HORRIBLE resources out there for the average trader, and very few Great ones! Jeff Manson joins Merlin to talk about how the MasterMind levels are in a class all by themselves. These levels identify high probability turning points in the market on any time frame you choose. On this particular day, 7 out of 8 levels hit, making for a great trading day! The duo also analyze the S&P 500 for potential clues as to market direction.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Psychology with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: Master Trader, Craig Weil joins Merlin in studio to talk about current market levels, and also answers several listener questions pertaining to trade plans & psychology. Last time Craig was on, he was decisively bearish, where does he stand now? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld in studio to talk about major market themes. John takes a look at the automotive industry which has been beaten up recently. He points out several factors which may make him a buyer at some upcoming demand levels. The duo also looks at the recent moves by Janet Yellen for additional market moves, and how currencies might be affected.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Moving Are Moving Averages?
episodes.summary: Earlier this week, Irfan Patel showed how he likes to incorporate Moving averages into his trading. Apparently this sparked many others to send in questions about them! Merlin adds his personal thoughts and addresses more questions on moving averages, from a long term investing perspective.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Managing Option Risk with Matt Gildea
episodes.summary: Many traders rush into trading, taking on far more risk than needed, and often blowing their account because they simply didn’t know the asset class they were trading. Matt Gildea joins Merlin live on set to talk about some problems that listeners sent in regarding options trading. Matt outlines safer ways to achieve trading goals using options.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tools Of The Trade with Irfan Patel
episodes.summary: Master trader, Irfan Patel joins Merlin in studio to talk about the current forex market, and trading opportunities. Irfan answers several listener questions about using technical indicators when he trades, as well as analysis of the Euro, and US dollar setups.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Like the human body, the markets have many ways to tell us whether we are healthy or ill. Master Trader Scott McCormick shares with listeners his latest market observations using his B.E.C.C. report, which breaks down many market segments and tries to identify potential trend changes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: The Ambassador of Opportunity joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at the big headlines of the week! Of course the major one being the fed’s decision to keep rates the same. The dynamic duo also look at the impacts of Chinas massive consumption of natural resources and how their slowdown might hit global markets even harder.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Financial Matters with Ara Bayindiryan
episodes.summary: The Fed held its course, with no raise in rates. This caused significant gyrations in the market, ending the day on a mostly negative note. Financial Matters master, Ara Bayindiryan joins Merlin to help shed some light on some of the growing issues facing retirees. They look at the complexities of Life Insurance products, and creating your own income stream using bond products.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Life On The Exchanges with Wayne Citron
episodes.summary: Many will never even set foot on the floor of a real trading floor! Wayne Citron has spent over 40 years on them! From the Midwest Exchange, Chicago Board of Trade and the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, he has traded them all! Wayne shares with Merlin how he became a trader on the floor and some of the major learning lessons he faced along the way. Merlin and Wayne also take a look at Natural Gas,  S&P 500 and the all important fed announcement coming out tomorrow!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Shooting For the Moon with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: In January, Mike McMahon made some lofty forecasts for the S&P 500, and the market has sold off a bit. On this show, he makes a slight revision, but still declares his market bullishness with a revised forecast. The duo also take a look at the Aussie dollar, Euro Pound, Oil and Exxon Mobile.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Q & A with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Alone in studio, Merlin answers many listener questions starting with the all important question: Will the Fed raise rates on Thursday?! He also covers buying opportunities with the fall in gas prices, trading biotech stocks, Lululemon, and the potential for a reversal in the Chinese markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: You would think that trillions of dollars would get you something for your money! John and Merlin take a look at how the past decade has panned out from an employment perspective and what the charts tell us about the health of our economy. John and Merlin also look at the Health of the financial markets, which appear to be doing FAR better. But will it last?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning For The Unknown with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Many investors are wondering, “What’s Next?” with regards to the financial markets. Merlin and Tillie talk about some of the steps necessary to remain vigilant in these volatile market times. One listener in particular is 100% long the S&P 500, and worried about further slides in the market… and she should be worried. Tillie and Merlin offer suggestions as to how to protect the portfolio, and possibly diversify.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Improvements with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Many traders struggle to find their way, but don't get the help they need to make it to the promised land. Joann Farley joins Merlin to talk about many of the amazing resources available to traders at Online Trading Academy looking for help, and solutions to what ails them. She points out specific areas in the Mastermind and Clubhouse programs where struggling traders can hone the fundamental skills needed to move up the rungs of professional trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Inside Your Head with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Merlin sits down with author, trader, psychologist, Dr. Woody Johnson. He answers a variety of listener questions ranging from the common fear of pulling the trigger on a trade, implementation of a trade psychology review, and taking psychology tests to help determine your strengths and weaknesses in your trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: John O'Donnell Sits in for Merlin. He discusses the global credit purge cycle within the Online Trading Academy core strategy. Learn how to prosper in the months and years ahead in the global capital markets deflationary trends.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Look Inside Indian Markets with Vishal Subandh
episodes.summary: With 5 years under its belt, Online Trading Academy India has experienced tremendous success and growth. Master instructor Vishal Subandh joins Merlin from Mumbai India, to share his recent classroom experiences and several trade setups he sees for the Indian markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: New Highs or Deeper Lows with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: As the markets continue with significant gyrations, many are wondering what it will take to make new highs in the market. Former floor trader, Craig Weil, joins Merlin to offer his perspective on where we are headed based on market seasonality and emotion.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Selloff Continues with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: After a brief market rally, sellers came back in force today pushing the broad markets down over 2% across the board. Merlin takes a look at the major movers before answering several listener questions on a wide variety of currency related topics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Pre-B.E.C.C. Report with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Veteran market technician, Scott McCormick, joins Merlin to discuss the driving forces in our volatile market. Scott starts off by looking at the current market pattern displayed in the S&P 500, and what it might mean for future price action. Focus then shifts to the bond market and an interesting relative strength comparison of several bond products and the S&P 500.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell & David Morgan
episodes.summary: John O'Donnell interviews silver expert David Morgan. They discuss metals, credit purge and the inflation vs deflation debate.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: The architect of Online Trading Academy’s Patented Supply and Demand Methodology, Sam Seiden joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about some recent trades which capitalized on the extreme market volatility. Sam stresses the importance of identifying zones where price is most likely to turn, then use other supporting information if needed to make the trade. Sam also talks about his new Lessons From the Pros article.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pointing The Finger with Roger Best
episodes.summary: Extreme volatility continues to slap the market with trading opportunities. Many are looking for the culprit, and a popular target for the TV pundits has been High Frequency Trading. Roger Best joins Merlin to give a real explanation to HFT’s involvement in the selloff, and why he feels investors have been misled.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Follow the Money with Alex Perna
episodes.summary: Another wave of selling pummeled the markets today, causing several currencies to rally in to strong supply and demand zones.
