episodes.summary: Originally a student at Online Trading Academy, Joel Greenberg has applied what he has learned and gone on to be a successful trader and instructor. He shares his experiences with Merlin, and walks listeners though his progression as a trader. Joe also shares how his technical background helped him with his discipline. Later, the duo breakdown a couple trades from a stock and options perspective.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The New Depression with Richard Duncan
episodes.summary: Economist and author of several books, Richard Duncan joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at what he feels is the New Depression. A cycle of debt expansion that is leading to a nearly inevitable collapse, that not even a gold standard can safe. The trio discuss this and several other topics while Mr. Duncan offers a radical solution to it all. A solution that would put America back on top, and get us out from all this debt. Mr. Duncan also offers listeners 50% off the subscription to his video newsletter at www.RDMacroWatch.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: DVD Giveaway with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Gifted trader and instructor Tillie Allison joins Merlin to discuss the long term aspects of investing and give away copies of her new DVD to all callers. Simply call 888-304-8723 to get a free copy! Tillie offer some insights into the differences between your traditional IRA and company sponsored 401k program. The duo stress the importance of getting started as early as possible in order to capitalize on compounding interest over time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Futures Under the Microscope with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: Many trader make the mistake of looking at the wrong market data without even knowing it! Master trader, Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin to break down specific details of futures contracts including, rollover, forward contracts and the various types of contracts. This is crucial when planning trades, as using the wrong data, will lead to using the wrong levels!. The duo also look at the Canadian Dollar currency futures.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Sit Down with Steve Forbes
episodes.summary: President of Forbes inc. and former Presidential candidate, Steve Forbes joins Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell for a look at several major factors which may lead to a second Great Depression. The trio discuss the concept of Flat Tax and how it might impact the markets and transition into Mr. Forbes new book about the devaluation of the US Dollar. Mr. Forbes voices his support for a gold standard to help add stability to the financial system and economy as a whole. Finally, Mr. Forbes talks about his upcoming Keynote speech at www.FreedomFest.com in July.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Stocks with Darek Zelek
episodes.summary: Master Trader and Instructor, Darek Zelek joins Merlin to analyze several listener questions pertaining to specific Stocks. They begin by looking at a seemingly innocent chart of Ebay, with many hidden problems! Later The financial sector looks great, yet a shorting opportunity looks even better with Goldman Sachs. Other market segments include Natural Gas and Apple.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Bert Dohmen & John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: With over 40 years of trading experience under his belt, President of Dohmen Capital Research, Bert Dohmen joins Merlin and John for a look at the current status of the markets. After creating a distinction between the market and the economy, Mr. Dohmen addresses several issues plaguing both and raising concern for another large correction in the near future. The trio talk about jobs, “Prelude to a Meltdown”,  future market moves, FreedomFest and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Social Media Show with Zenobia!!
episodes.summary: The gatekeeper for all things social media at Online Trading Academy, Zenobia, joins Merlin for a show dedicated to our community. The show centers around risk management, providing some listener answers to posted questions, and Merlin also adds in his commentary as well. The duo also talk about the biggest risks they have ever taken in trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Options Trading with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Merlin and Steve help listeners understand the basics of options trading, including at look at how to make sense of an options chain. Later the progress into more complex topics such as spread trading, implied volatility as well as how to trade weekly options. Steve and Merlin also critique a listeners options trade on Apple.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex Markets with Brandon Wendell
episodes.summary: Back from a long motorcycle ride to teach in Kansas City, Brandon Wendell joins Merlin for a look at the global currency markets and listener questions! To start, Merlin looks at listener questions regarding Quicksilver and United Airlines, offering technical analysis for video viewers. Brandon takes a look at the US Dollar and its impact on the equity and commodity markets. This leads to a discussion of the Euro and its relative strength to a variety of other currencies. Finally, the duo offer suggestions on how to read volatility in the forex markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Listener Question Monday
episodes.summary: Merlin takes this opportunity to dedicate a show solely to listener questions. Questions range from Supply and Demand strategies for Mutual funds to Market Timing of precious metals, Coal stocks to internet media giants. Merlin also illustrates many examples with extensive use of charts and technical analysis.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: May ended on a sweet note with all 4 major market indexes finishing up for the month. Will that continue in June? John O’Donnell joins Merlin for a big announcement about an upcoming event where Power Trading Radio will be broadcasting live with a ton of great speakers! John and Merlin also discuss the importance of metals and where the trading opportunities may lie.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Retirement Obstacles with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Master Instructor and investor, Paul Orme, joins Merlin for a continuation conversation about the problems with 401k providers and their sneaky ways. Paul talks about the relationship between companies and the 401k providers and how there is a disconnect in fiduciary responsibility for the employees money. To compound this even further, Paul talks about how the Mutual Fund industry worked their way into the mix. The duo also talks about Social Security and some of the considerations individuals nearing retirement should focus on.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Options with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Coming off a whirlwind teaching tour, Master trader Russ Allen sits down with Merlin to talk about the new technology which allows him to teach traders online while watching each of their trading screens. This allows him to correct mistakes, and show proper trading techniques to traders who are in the comfort of their own homes, around the world. Later, Russ handles a couple listener questions about Implied volatility, and shows a couple tools to measure it. More importantly, he shares with listeners what IV means to a professional trader and why we should pay special attention to it. Merlin and Russ also discusses his upcoming Hour with the Pros, where he will be covering OCO and Bracket orders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mastering the Mental Game with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: The Doctor is in the house for an episode dedicated to helping listeners overcome some of their trading challenges. Dr. Woody Johnson and Merlin offer solutions to several listener problems, including: fear of trading live, how to identify trading problems, inability to take losses and much more. Are you having trading issues? Tune in and find out if their solutions help you get past those obstacles. If not, send in your issues and they will discuss them on the next show.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John Mauldin and John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: New York Times best selling author and financial expert, John Mauldin joins Merlin and John for a look at the current drivers of innovation and change in our country. Topics range from Debt to Jobs, Technology to Energy. Previously on the show, Mr. Mauldin has talked about the fact that Jobs WILL come, just not sure where from. In this episode of Power Trading Radio, he sheds some light onto where job growth may come from, providing some trading and investing opportunities for listeners. John also talks about his book "Code Red" which is available now at Amazon.Com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Options and Investing with Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: Instructor of the year at Online Trading Academy, Jose Blasco, joins Merlin for a look at using different investment vehicles to help investors achieve their long term goals. The duo talk about some of the key steps to determining what Rate of Return one needs for retirement. This involves a bit of work, and some sophisticated calculators! Jose also looks at the different ways to use options to achieve the same objective as well as how to use them in retirement accounts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Helping Hand of Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Many instructors do their best to help traders progress and achieve their financial dreams. Some take it one step beyond! Jeff Manson not only teaches physical classes and trades, but he takes any spare time to help in the Mastermind Community, honing trader skills. Jeff shares with listeners some of the high points of his day as well as offer suggestions to new traders looking to make it. Merlin and Jeff also talk about how the market impacts specific stocks and sectors to help us find high probability, low risk trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Markets with John Kicklighter
episodes.summary: Chief currency strategist at DailyFX.com, John Kicklighter joins Merlin for a look at some of the events and data impacting currencies around the world. First comes the Euro, which has been flirting with a strong supply level, yet unable to break! John offers his thought on the ECB’s actions and why this is the line in the sand for the Euro. Later, the duo breaks down the current trajectory in the Pound and the Yen, both of which offer some great trading opportunities. Merlin also looks at some tools, such as the SSI, which helps traders understand where the money is flowing in a variety of instruments.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Stocks with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: The US markets had no economic announcements today, yet we managed decent gains! Veteran Chicago floor trader, Craig Weil joins Merlin for a look at his current ProTrader Class in Irvine CA, as well as analysis if several stocks. Merlin and Craig take a look at Facebook, Whole Foods, Realty Income, Reliance Steel& Aluminum and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: They dynamic duo of John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld are back together after a 2 week break. John gives his thoughts on market volatility and direction focusing on several factors for further moves. From technical patterns to market internals, there are many clues as to market weakness and the duo break these down. John also talks about some of his favorite books which might help listeners grasp the financial markets better. Merlin also brings in some of the recent housing data to see If that might hold things up at these levels, or get rolled over by other market movers.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Portfolio Planning with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Master Instructor Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at portfolio allocations and when to adjust. A listener sends in a question about his portfolio which he is rightfully worried about as it is very heavily weighted in one area and lacking risk protection for downside risk. The duo discuss this as well as a better balanced portfolio using a variety of different financial instruments. Tillie stresses the benefit of using Options to help increase rate of return while incurring minimal risk.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Catching up with Jasmine Wang
episodes.summary: On past shows, Jasmine has shared highlights from the XLT and mastermind programs at Online Trading Academy. This time she joins Merlin for a breakdown of some current currency markets offering insightful analysis as well as key market levels. The duo address several listener questions as well, for an informative and technical show.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Movements with Joanne Farley
episodes.summary: 4 weeks ago, Joanne was a guest on the show and talked about why she felt the market was headed for higher highs. Well, the markets have had a nice run since then! We talk to Joanne again to see if her opinion about market direction has changed, or if it’s still bullish. Merlin and Joanne also take a look at several listener questions including: WPZ, HOT, and the divergence between the Russell2000 and the Dow 30.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Freedom Fest with Dr. Mark Skousen
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell chats with Dr. Mark Skousen. Mark was recently named one of the 20 most influential living economists. The duo discuss the new Wall Street Journal article Mark wrote on Gross Output replacing GDP as primary indicator. They also discuss Mark’s upcoming Freedom Fest in Las Vegas, and his High Income Alert Service for investors in dividend stocks. Visit freedomfest.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Nothing But the Best with Roger Best!
episodes.summary: Roger Best is live in studio with Guest Host John O'Donnell. Roger is an instructor for Online Trading Academy. John and Roger discuss the financial markets while answering questions form a live studio audience. Come join the fun!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Economics of Freedom
episodes.summary:
John O’Donnell & Mark Thornton of Mises Institute discuss the state of the economy and jobs especially older adult workers staying on the job and “crowding out” younger aspirational workers. They discuss why inflation will continue to erode the quality of life for boomers, and why we need to abolish the fiat monetary model and return to the proven gold standard. They also

discuss why austrian economists were able to call the housing bubble forming & the bust in 2006, and other traditional Economists did not even see the housing bubble form and never warned of the coming housing price crash and mortgage implosion in USA and Europe.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Sector Rotation with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and guest Scott McCormick are in the studio today. Scott is a CMT and an instructor at Online Trading Academy. The duo discuss price ratios today, market sector rotation, the 4 stage business cycle and how to integrate the OTA Supply vs Demand patented strategies for better entries/exits in capital markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Capital Markets with Peter Klein
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell interviews Dr. Peter Klein of Mises.org on the critique of the popular new book "Capital in the 21stCentury" by Thomas Piketty. The topics include income inequality cause and effect, role of Fed intervention in capital markets, malinvestment in boom/bust cycles with anemic price discovery and the 99% vs the 1% myth. They also discuss why boomers are working longer and the impact of youth joining the workplace.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Capitalism with Dr. George Reisman
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell’s guest today is Dr. George Reisman. He is a Pepperdine University Professor Emeritus of Economics and author of Capitalism: A Treatise of Economics. He was a personal student of Ludwig von Mises under whom he obtained his doctorate in economics in 1963. His website is www.capitalism.net. The duo discuss on PTR today:  economic inequality, including income and inheritance taxes, the nonsense of the 99% vs the 1%, and where Marx was wrong about capitalism and why the Fed cannot control the equity and real estate markets with interest rate manipulations.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell & Jim Puplava
episodes.summary:
Jim Puplava of FinancialSense.com and John O'Donnell discuss Jim's discovery of OTA S/D strategies in the options class he attended to improve his money management skills. Jim discusses how to integrate classic Grahamn/Dodd fundamentals analysis into OTA core strategy! We also discuss Jim Rickard's NY Times best selling new book on why a major financial crisis lies ahead for dollar denominated assets and how to protect your assets in times of crisis and uncertainty. Sam Seiden and John will appear on Jim's show 26 April here:

www.financialsense.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: DVD giveaway with Tillie Allison!
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison offers all listeners, tuning in live, a copy of her new DVD titled “How To Retire With More Money Than You Need”. The duo focus on this topic and discuss some of the simple steps one can take to increase rate of return and grow savings. Tillie bring up the topic of refinancing ones home and taking advantage of low rates, utilizing the extra money to accelerate retirement account growth.  She also discusses the 3 different retirement objectives that are discussed in the ProActive Investor XLT program and the associated portfolio rates of return.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Evolution of Larry Jacobson
episodes.summary: He’s a trained musician, he’s an author, Master instructor and trader… is there anything this guy can’t do? Dr. Larry Jacobson joins Merlin for a look at how he has evolved as a trader and what were his biggest obstacles along the way. They also talk about his book “Demystifying Success” and its application to the financial markets and success as a trader. Later, Dr. Jacobson takes a look at current markets and discusses his personal trading preferences.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Markets with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: Bank holidays around the world have made for some pretty boring FX trading over the last week, but Steve Misic thinks that will change soon. Merlin and Steve take a look at several currency pairs including the Euro, Yen, US Dollar and answer several listener questions. The duo share their experiences about their early days trading the currency markets and offer pointers on how to grasp it quicker. Steve also talks about his current XLT sessions and upcoming classes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fibonacci with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Markets continued their bounce on Monday, racing toward all time highs… again! Master trader and instructor Jeff Manson joins Merlin to offer his thoughts on where the markets may be headed in the short term. Jeff uses cycles to offer suggestions on market direction, and the hinge on Tuesday’s trading action! Jeff also offers us some insight into his upcoming “Hour with the Pro’s” this Thursday.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Frank Hollenbeck
episodes.summary: Economics professor at the International University of Geneva joins Merlin and John for a look at some of the problems plaguing Europe and the UK. Dr. Hollenbeck talks about the deflation paranoia, and why it’s not such a bad thing! He also offers listeners access to his extensive series of articles on macroeconomics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: When to Sue your 401k with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Merlin and guests have talked many times on the shenanigans that 401k providers are pulling on investors, generally in the form of ridiculous fees. ProActive investing master, Paul Orme joins Merlin for a look at several recent lawsuits against these firms and their elevated fees. The duo talks about the importance of knowing your investments, and being active in their management. Just a 1.25% savings over the course of a workers career can add up to over $100,000! Take control now!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Patented Trading Content with Chuck Fulkerson
episodes.summary: After a thorough walkthrough on the construction and impacts of an inverted yield curve to our markets, Merlin welcomes Master Instructor Chuck Fulkerson to the studio to talk about the newly received Patent for Online Trading Academy’s educational content. Chuck also talks about his approach on trading economic announcements. The duo also takes a look at the explosive move in coffee futures and the potential impact for moves in coffee stocks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Solo in the Studio
episodes.summary: Merlin hosts a show solo and answers a bunch of listener questions. Several listeners sent in questions retarding patterns, so Merlin takes a look at Broadening formations on the QQQ and an inverse head and shoulders on the AUDUSD. Later, he tackles a question on the Dollar index and how it is applied to anticipate market moves. He also looks at the Yen for potential trading opportunities and directional analysis.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Afternoon Rundown with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Markets regained their footing, stopping the significant slide from the second half of last week. Joann Farley, the glue that keeps the XLT program running smoothly, joins Merlin for a look at some of the stellar calls that have been happening in the live trading rooms and offer her thoughts on where she thinks they are headed. Later, Joann welcomes a new group of students to Online Trading Academy with a tour of some of the free resources available to everyone, as well as some of the tools available only to Online Trading Academy students.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Robert Murphy
episodes.summary:
Economist Robert Murphy joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at how the Government is wrecking the economy. Mr. Murphy is also teaching a class starting in 2 weeks on the subject, viewers can find out more here:http://academy.mises.org/courses/wreck/

He also gives away his book: Lessons for the Young Economist. This broadcast is the first from the brand new studio and world headquarters for Online Trading Academy!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing Market Trends with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: Creator of Online Trading Academy’s Real Estate investment course, Diana Hill, joins Merlin for a look at what is trending in the housing market. One interesting is urban development of big cities catering to the younger generation who don’t want rural living. Diana also talks about when is the best time to consider selling your home to get the greatest return on investment.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Harnessing Volatility Using Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: The Vix spiked up and has dropped 20% in 2 days! Clearly a sign of the times and what the year holds in store for everyone! Steve Moses, joins Merlin for a look at how to take advantage of current markets through the use of Options. Steve answers listeners questions about the Greeks and the various strategies that one could use to capitalize on the volatility.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Death by Japanese Debt with Tres Knippa
episodes.summary: Veteran floor trader on the CME, Tres Knippa joins Merlin and John to look at the mountain of debt that Japan has accumulated as well as its inability to pay it off. This presents several trading opportunities which are discussed amongst the trio. Tres also offers listeners a free subscription to his newsletter highlighting the situation in Japan.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday with Walter Block
episodes.summary: Professor Walter Block joins Merlin and John to talk about the recent riff between Mr.Block and the New York Times, who recently ran an article using quotes totally out of context. The trio discuss how the media regularly tweaks stories and interviews to get more sensationalism and sell more copies! Later, the debate about inflation and deflationary pressures is discussed.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Chris Casey
episodes.summary: Managing Director at WindRock Wealth Management, Chris Casey, joins Merlin and John for a look at the current markets with a focus on asset selection and the fed’s roll. Chris looks at potential inflation problems for the markets going forward and offers some suggestions as to where might be appealing to invest in these volatile markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: DVD Giveaway with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by Master trader/investor, Tillie Allison for a look at elevated levels in the markets. Tillie brings free copies of her DVD; “How to Retire with More Money Than You Need”, which is given away to all callers during the show at 888-304-8723. Tillie discusses new changes to the ProActive Investor portfolios which now includes 3 different objectives.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures with Gabe Velasquez
episodes.summary: Record highs for the S&P 500 are sure to bring in new bullish buyers, is it a bull trap? Master trader and instructor, Gabe Velasquez joins Merlin for a look at current markets and where they may be headed. The duo answer many listener questions pertaining to Trade Plans, silver, S&P and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Trader Evolution with Jody Wong
episodes.summary: 4 years ago, Merlin taught his last ProTrader class in Seattle, and one if the students was taking his first Online Trading Academy class. Jody Wong spent the next 4 years working hard to be a better trader and has how become an instructor at Online Trading Academy. Jody talks about his progression and shares some of his major learning lessons with listeners. Jody and Merlin also take a look at US dollar, Aussie dollar and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Are the Markets Really Rigged? Duh!
episodes.summary: The day after 60 minutes ran a piece on how the stock markets are rigged, everyone was talking about as if nobody knew! Truth is, the markets have been rigged since inception! That said, traders and investors can achieve great returns by having a plan and following rules, regardless of the ominous HFT firms. Merlin invites John O’Donnell back to discuss this topic and the evolution of the financial markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Shawn Ritenour
episodes.summary: Professor of Economics at Grove City College, Shawn Ritenour, joins Merlin and John for a look at the truth behind economic data and the current macro market picture. Dr. Ritenour spent time working for the Bureau of Labor Statistics and sheds some light on what is really behind the numbers, and the problem with relying on that data. Later, the trio take a look at the feds current actions as well as the nature of lower prices. Merlin also announces the LAST gold coin winner!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Social Media Show with Zenobia
episodes.summary: Traders make tons of mistakes throughout their careers! We posted a question to our social media sites asking: What are the 2 most common mistakes investors make”, and we received a lot of great responses. Zenobia, Online Trading Academy’s social media queen, runs through the responses and Merlin rates them, applying many personal experiences before finally revealing the true answer. Have questions? You can always use social media to get in touch with us!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Award Winning Author Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Having recently won the Trader Planet award for best trading book, Debbie joins Merlin to talk about her success as an author. Discussion quickly turns to the current markets and a post on Debbie’s social media site calling for a reversal and a sharp move down in the markets. That was a week ago! Merlin and Debbie also look at what makes women better traders then men and the markets longstanding stereotype that trading is for men only.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Ilya Spivak
episodes.summary: DailyFX.com currency strategist, Ilya Spivak joins Merlin for a look at the currency markets and where trading opportunities may be hiding! Ilya talks about basked trading, which allows traders to trade a group of currencies at once to spread risk. Later the duo talk about the potential weaknesses in the Euro, and the possibility of a bullish phase for the US Dollar going forward!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Volatile Markets with Scott Greer
episodes.summary: Markets continue the slide from Friday’s session, with special on the NASDAQ! Scott Greer joins Merlin for a look at some of the significant factors moving the markets and where they see trading opportunities going forward. Scott shares with listeners a little from his class he has been teaching this week in Irvine California.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Austrian Economics in Canada and around the world!
episodes.summary: Redmond Weissenberger, Director of Ludwig von Mises Institute of Canada, joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at a wide variety of topics including the Fed, , Socialism, Health care, housing markets, trading partners, and how Austrian Economics impacts markets. Merlin also announces the latest gold coin winner and reminds listeners, that they have until midnight on Friday (21st) to get their forecasts in for the final gold coin giveaway. Enter at http://www.PowerTradingRadio.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Eric Ochotnicki
episodes.summary: Does the new fed chairman, Janet Yellen, have an impact on the long term portfolio holders? Former CBOT floor trader, Erick Ochotnicki, joins Merlin for a look at how the dreaded “F” word, (Fundamentals!) should play into your decision making as a longer term investor. This ties into those traders calling the tops and setting bias portfolios which stand to lose significant amounts of capital if those tops are not put in yet! Eric shares some of the philosophy of the ProActive Investor course which presently holds a long bias, and is using options to generate higher rates of return.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Macro Economics with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: As Janet Yellen’s comments added a new dose of volatility across all assets Wednesday, focus begins to shift to more macroeconomic issues that may drive markets further. Veteran floor trader at CME, Bill Henner joins Merlin for a look at the impact of a variety of economic reports including Interest rates, GDP, SPI Unemployment and more to get feel as to which are becoming more important with today’s statements.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Bachir Chaaya
episodes.summary: Fresh off a Forex class in Dubai and regular appearances in the XLT program, Bachir joins Merlin for a look at the currency markets for trading opportunities. They begin by looking at some of the advantages foreign traders have over US traders with regards to margin limits, a double edged sword! Later the duo looks at the Yen, Pound, Euro and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Psychology with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Dr. Woody Johnson, Author of “From Pain To Profit: Secrets of the Peak Performance Trader”, and trader coach joins Merlin to help answer several listener questions regarding trading problems. Issues range from fear and greed, establishment of discipline, mindset for setting stops and much more. The duo talk about Woody’s new Clubhouse sessions and XLT appearances.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Rick Rule
episodes.summary:
President of Sprott US Holdings, Rick Rule joins Merlin and John for a look at the commodities market and what it is telling us about the economy. The trip talk about Gold, platinum, palladium, zinc, copper, natural gas, oil, water and much more. Tune in and find out which of these commodities are trading at values which are less than the cost of production! You can view Sprott Global’s free newsletter here: http://sprottglobal.com/thoughts

Merlin also announces the latest gold coin winner. Get your bids in, only 2 more coins to give away!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: High Frequency Trading (HFT) with Haim Bodek
episodes.summary: Renowned High Frequency Guru, Haim Bodek joins Merlin for a look at the current status of the exchanges with regard to HFT. Haim points out a massive loophole that has allowed exchanges to offer elite order routing functionality to the most active HFT firms, which skirts around rules the SEC has put in place to make the markets fair. Haim also takes a look at the unbelievable results of HFT firm Virtu and points out why they are doing as good as they are, but there are bigger fish in that sea! Tune in and catch up on the complex world of the quants!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Evaluating the Permanent Recession with Robert Blumen
episodes.summary: Robert Blumen joins John and Merlin for a look at his most recent article “Say’s Law and the Permanent Recession”. The trio discuss the thought of our economy being in a recessionary state since 2000, and why it is apparently stuck there. More importantly, solutions are looked at to help restore the economy to its full potential.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Forex with Tim Pesut
episodes.summary: Having been actively involved in the financial markets for over 24 years, Tim Pesut has a tremendous amount of experience to share with listeners!  Tim shares his evolution as a trader and then helps Merlin analyze several currency pairs for listeners. Tim points out the current demise in copper and how it might trigger other currencies and markets to nosedive as well!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Flying Solo on a Monday Afternoon
episodes.summary: Alone on the show, Merlin takes the opportunity to answer many listener questions that he has not been able to get to over the past week. This show has a little of everything! From Currencies, to Bill Ackman, technical indicators to multiple time frame analysis, Futures, Gold and much more! Tune in and see if your question was answered!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: Senior Fellow at Mises.org, Dr. Mark Thornton joins Merlin and John O’Donnell for a look at the growing currency war as well as the battle for natural resources around the world. These events are leading to some great trading opportunities across multiple asset classes including futures, equities and Currencies. Merlin also announces the latest gold coin winner.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Catching Up with Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: In a rare studio appearance, Online Trading Academy instructor of the year 2103, Jose Blasco joins Merlin to help listeners with their trading questions. Merlin and Jose talk about measuring progress as a trader and what steps can be taken to help overcome losses in the beginning. Later the duo focuses on the use of technical indicators and their utility in trading as well as the outlook for the overall market.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Targeting Markets Cycles with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Last time Jeff was on the show, he forecasted a 1150 point decline in the Dow over 34 days, it fell 1250 in 36 days! What was he using to forecast this market action, and more importantly, where does it anticipate markets going from here? Tune in and find out! Jeff also talks about his Extended Learning Track classes which have been having some great trading experiences!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Brain Mapping with Sang Lucci
episodes.summary: Charlie Bathgate and Anand Sanghvi of SangLucci.com join Merlin for a look at traders psychology and the importance of understanding what goes on in your brain. The Trio talk about a program they are working on with UCLA Neuroscientist Dr. Andrew Hill which will allow traders the opportunity to test their brains while trading. This groundbreaking study will shed some light into each traders personal strengths and weaknesses as traders and much more! Anand also talks about the psychology of running a hedge fund vs. trading a personal account.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Macro Market Events with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: Global tensions escalate and sends the markets for a loop around the world! Bill Henner joins Merlin for a look at the current market nervousness and where the good market plays are. Bill takes a look at interest rate instruments for potential shorting opportunities as rates reach even lower. Bill and Merlin take a look at the AUDNZD for a listener looking for the best demand level, and finally talk about sharing of knowledge through the XLT program at Online Trading Academy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Markets ended on a sour note, but not after posting some great gains for the week. John O’Donnell joins Merlin from Los Angeles where he was doing a grand opening event. The duo talk about the current market highs and overall market trajectory. Merlin takes a look at bitcoins and gold as a listener brings up the topic of market manipulation of the US Dollar and other assets. The latest gold coin winner is also announced.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Portfolio Planning with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Several listeners send in their portfolio positions for analysis and feedback. Merlin enlists the help of Scott McCormick to go over these portfolios and help offer solutions to make them more efficient. Scott also talks about the benefit of using Exchange Traded Funds instead of Mutual Funds as most investors seem to be still using the most expensive option! How does your portfolio stack up?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Emptying The Mail Bag
episodes.summary: Merlin hosts the show solo and answers many listener questions. Questions range from use of The various dollar indexes, trading afterhours with ECNs, managing risk with stop losses and much more. Tune in and see if your questions were answered!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Wealth Management with James Puplava
episodes.summary: President of PFS Group, James Puplava, joins Merlin and John O’Donnell for a look at the macro perspective of the market and how his advisory team use a hybrid of Fundamental and technical analysis to manage clients money for the long term. Mr. Puplava also shares his experiences as an Online Trading Academy student and why he is currently retaking his class to further his perspective of the financial markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Reading with Marty Dim
episodes.summary: 22 year floor trading veteran, Marty Dim joins Merlin for a look at current market volatility and what it implies for the markets going forward. Marty definitely sees volatility increasing this year, but direction is clouded by many factors. Listener questions about Supply and Demand prompt a discussion on the use of Options and Marty’s current trading activity.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Jeff Deist
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld welcome newly elected President of the Mises Institute, Jeff Deist to Power Trading Radio. Jeff talks about his new role and what the Mises Institute’s goals are. The show focuses on several themes, including the current economic situation, alternative currency methods, and politicians who share an Austrian Economic friendly view of the markets. Merlin also announces the latest gold coin winner.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Social Media Thursday with Zenobia
episodes.summary: Over the past month, many questions have come in via Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and other sources. Queen of Social Media, Zenobia, joins Merlin for a show dedicated to those who interact with us online. Merlin talks a lot about trading Psychology and the perils of falling in love with a security, and how to eliminate the emotional aspect of trading. Did your questions get answered? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Relationships with Brandon Wendell
episodes.summary: As markets reach historic highs, many traders are looking for a more defensive approach to these levels and a potential pullback. Master instructor, Brandon Wendell joins Merlin to look at ways to trade these markets and how to use multiple assets to help gain a greater understanding of where things may be headed. The duo also takes a look at multiple time frame analysis and a recent upgrade by Goldman Sachs on ACT. This ties right into Brandon’s recent Lessons from the Pros article about the so called trading Gurus.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Essentials with Michelle Volmering
episodes.summary: Master trader, Michelle Volmering joins Merlin to talk about her recent XLT lesson, where nearly every level she called out was a hit, creating tremendous trading opportunities to the attendees. Michelle and Merlin take a look current market volatility and talk about changes that should be made to accommodate this volatility. Later Michelle offers her insights on where these markets are headed.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Euan Wilson
episodes.summary: Laws change, moods change, times change! These changes present tremendous opportunities across the financial market for savvy investors. Socionomics expert, Euan Wilson joins the show to talk to John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld about social mood and its impact on financial markets. A great example is the current support for the legalization of marijuana across the United States. This change in social mood has created a boom that was forecasted by Euan and others several years back. Tune in to find out more about this paradigm shift in American mood! John and Merlin also announce the latest gold coin winner!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Portfolio Analysis with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Portfolio evaluation has been popular on the show recently, so Russ Allen and Merlin take a look at a Twitter question about a simple Roth IRA portfolio. A simple analysis reveals many problems, that the vast majority of investors suffer from. The duo evaluate the holdings and offer more attractive alternatives. They also handle several other listeners questions pertaining to Options and trading taxation concerns.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Power Of Options with Matt Gildea
episodes.summary: Market volatility has picked up over the past couple weeks, creating great opportunities for skilled options traders. Matt Gildea is one such trader! He joins Merlin for a look at how volatility has been impacting his trades and teaching. This ties directly to the Vix and its historical action, which Matt trades frequently! The duo also take several live listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with John Kicklighter
episodes.summary: Chief Currency Strategist at dailyFX.com, john Kicklighter joins Merlin for a look at a variety of currency pairs, after analyzing the current macroeconomic picture. The duo begins by breaking down Janet Yellen’s testimony and its impact for global markets, then migrate into the British Pound and their key announcements for tomorrow’s trading session. John also offers some analysis on the Euro, Yen Kiwi and Aussie dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Kick Start with Brandon Tristan
episodes.summary: The equity markets continued their positive tone from the end of last week, with slight gains on the major indexes. Brandon Tristan joins Merlin for a look at what has been happening in the XLT rooms, and highlighting some great calls from himself and his peers. Brandon talks about some current ProPicks and market matrix, promoting them as great tools to help traders learn quicker and create discipline.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Peter Klein
episodes.summary: Professor Peter Klein joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at the pressing macro issues facing the markets including, Obamacare, unemployment, minimum wage increase and much more. These events present trading opportunities and the trio attempts to find out where! Later John and Merlin announce the latest gold coin winner and their nomination for best Podcast.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Portfolio Dangers with Darek Zelek
episodes.summary: In response to a listeners request, Merlin and Darek break down his 401k portfolio and find some serious problems! The vast majority of investors are victim to this problem as well! Tune in to find out what this abundant problem is, and how to fix it. Darek and Merlin show great visual examples and offer resources for investors to do their own analysis to see if their portfolios are at risk.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Diving Deep Into Futures & Commodities
episodes.summary: Futures trading expert, Don Dawson answers a ton of listener questions on a variety of topics including: Live Cattle, Commitment of Traders Report, Money management, Lock Limits, Market Correlations, Coffee and much more. Don also talks about some of his upcoming articles and courses at various locations around the US.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currency Markets with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: Big action in the Aussie brought in many trading questions today! Steve Misic joins Merlin in studio to help break down the current activity in the currency world with a look at the Euro, Yen, Dollar and other currencies. Steve shares some of his personal resources that he looks at to find roadblocks in currency prices using Options.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Mayhem with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Markets posted the biggest one day decline in years, kicking off February with more than a 2% down day. Author and Trader, Debbie Hague joins Merlin for a look back at an import level she has been watching, and calling for a turn on the Nasdaq. Debbie and Merlin also answer many listener questions on a wide range of topics including Stocks, futures, currencies and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Richard Ebeling
episodes.summary: January ended on a sour note as the major market indexes end with negative returns, causing speculation that the markets will end the year on a negative note as well. Dr. Richard Ebeling joins Merlin and John to take a look at the current market situation and the major events of the last 4 weeks. Focus shifts to the fed and its activities to drive the market higher, and the recent tapering which may derail the northbound trajectory. From Bonds, to Krugman, this show has it all! Including the latest gold coin winner!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stick To The Plan!
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a longer time frame analysis of the markets and how to look at things from the bigger perspective. Tillie offers suggestions on how to use options to lower entry prices for traders as well as identifying points in the markets where one might be happy buying. Tillie also answers some listener questions pertaining to Asset Allocation and commodities, which have been very weak lately.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Volatility Spikes, What Does This Mean For Options?
episodes.summary: Steve Moses joins Merlin for a look at the current volatility in the markets and answers some tough questions as to whether to be a buyer or seller of options. Steve also talks briefly about the Greeks and what new options traders should be doing to prepare for his classes. Later, Steve also walks listeners through a couple of trades he has recently made.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Early Thanksgiving from Turkey?!
episodes.summary: A surprise move by the Turkish central bank to significantly raise rates! Currency trader Sam Evans joins Merlin to look at what message this sends to the broader markets, which were rallying strongly in the afterhours session. Later, Sam and Merlin take a look at a variety of currency pairs including The Aussie dollar, the Turkish lira, US dollar and more. This also leads into a discussion on cross pairs and trading styles.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: The final week of January kicks off on a negative note driving more speculation that this is the beginning of a bigger down move. Merlin and Jeff take a look at market levels and offer their insights into where we’re headed. Later, the duo take several listener questions regarding Gaps, and stocks like Caterpillar, Ebay and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: Markets took a significant dive this week, and ended on a very negative note. Dr. Mark Thornton, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at the current market situation and offer suggestions as to where we may be headed going forward. The trio also take a look at the gloomy unemployment scene in the US, and solutions to getting jobs back in America. The latest gold coin winner is also announced!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On the Couch with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Author of “From Pain To Profit: Secrets of the Peak Performance Trader”, Dr. Woody Johnson joins Merlin for a session dedicated to helping traders with their problems. Most traders will agree that trading is 75% psychology, maybe more! This show is full of listeners sending in their issues, and the duo offering solutions. Problems range from fear based trading, subconscious issues with share size and price, and implementation of a meditation routine to ones trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures with Chuck Fulkerson
episodes.summary: Having started trading back in 2005 with ZERO experience in the financial markets, Chuck Fulkerson has evolved into a top notch trader and world class educator! Having won Instructor of the Year in 2011 from Online Trading Academy, Chuck applies a rigid set of rules for trading almost all asset classes including: Stocks, futures, currencies and Options. Chuck walks listeners through his evolution as a trader and offers suggestions to help traders succeed in today’s markets. Later, Chuck and Merlin take a look at several charts and Chuck shares some of the setups he is looking to currently trade.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex Markets with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: Economic data is constantly flooding our daily lives, and as currency traders, it’s crucial to pay attention to it! The question is: How much attention?! Steve and Merlin discuss this topic and give insight as to how they utilize this economic date for planning and executing trades. Later the duo look at several currency pairs for trading opportunities, including: Canadian Dollar, Euro and the Pound.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: With the markets closed for Martin Luther King Jr. day, Merlin welcomes Craig Weil to talk about how rules are applied to his personal trading style. From pattern utilization to establishing risk/reward ratio’s, Craig and Merlin share examples of how they tailor their plans for these rules. Several other listener questions are also answered, including a great one on the British Pound.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Crony Capitalism with Hunter Lewis
episodes.summary: Renowned author Hunter Lewis joins John and Merlin for a look at the major problem facing Government and big business: Crony Capitalism. The trio discuss Lewis’s new book which outlines some of the areas where there is significant corruption. Later, focus shifts to the fed and another book of Lewis: Free Prices Now!: Fixing the Economy by Abolishing the Fed. Finally, Merlin and John announce the latest Gold coin winner!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Social Media Thursday
episodes.summary: Zenobia enters the Power Trading Radio studio with a list of listener questions which have come in over the past month on our social media channels. Zenobia and Merlin discuss these questions and many more on this show focused on trading goals for 2014.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Back in the USSA with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: After an extended tour of the world to teach trading, Jeff is finally back on US soil and ready to share his experiences. Jeff talks about some of the recent activity in the Mastermind community and XLT’s where he and fellow instructors have been making some great calls! Merlin and Jeff also answer a listeners question regarding Fibonacci and how to use it. Both traders do things differently and share those experiences.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Building a World Class Trading Community with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Being a trader is hard work, and even harder when attempting to do it on your own. For this reason, Online Trading Academy has worked hard to build the best community for traders in the world. A major forct behind this is seasoned trading veteran Joann Farley. Joann joins Merlin for a look behind the scenes of XLT and MasterMind community and how it helps traders grow and succeed in the markets. The duo also take a number of listener questions about specific stocks such as: Groupon, Intel, Nasdaq Futures and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Market Analysis with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: A very bearish trading sessions raises questions of a deeper market selloff. Mike McMahon joins Merlin to break down what he is seeing from both a long term and short term perspective. Later, the duo offer analysis of several stocks including: the US Dollar, Target, St. Jude, S&P 500 and more. Mike also talks about his online trading classes he has been teaching which allow students to trade with real money while Mike observes the trades.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from Irvine California Graduate Event
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld broadcast from a special event they are hosting in Irvine California. The duo take a look at some trading plan elements as well as the important macro market issues currently at hand. The live audience asks questions that John and Merlin answer with some live charts. The latest gold coin winner is also announced!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using Options to generate Income with Cory Lane
episodes.summary: Most view Bonds and Dividends as the best way to generate income… they are wrong! Corey Lane joins Merlin for a look at how to use Options to create income in nearly any account. Many fear options as the industry has painted a negative picture of them, to which Corey stresses: “It’s not the instrument that is dangerous, it’s the operator”. Corey also offers insights into what his biggest takeaways of 2013 were as well as sharing some of his best and worst trades of the year.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Ringing in the New Year with Michael Young
episodes.summary: 37 year market veteran Michael Young joins Merlin for a look back at what were the more significant points of 2013. Michael also shares with listeners his personal highlights with regards to his trading and what he has learned from them. Later, the duo take many listener questions with topics ranging from gold and Euro futures to Microsoft and their new CEO.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Chief Education, Products, and Services Officer and Instructor at Online Trading Academy Sam Seiden joins Merlin for a look at 2013, and to answer some of the MANY listener questions that have flooded our inbox over the past few days. Sam dives in to the importance of supply & demand analysis, and how it needs to be tailored to each traders personal style. Merlin and Sam analyze current market as well as break down some currency charts including the British Pound.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Darek Zelek in the House!
episodes.summary: Master instructor Darek Zelek joins Merlin for a look back at 2013 for his biggest takeaways as well as sharing his best and worst trades. The duo also take a look at many different securities per listener request, including: Gold futures, Cisco, Natural Gas and more. Darek emphasizes the importance of having a routine for identifying supply & demand zones, allowing you to discard bad zones and risky trades.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: January got off to a rough start with 2 down days, which statistically, should have been positive trading days! Is this an ominous sign for 2014?! John and Merlin talk about this as well as many other aspects of the market. Including the current economic data coming in from around the world which does not paint the rosiest path to the next bull market! John also offers his insights into the current trend of gold before announcing the latest Power Trading Radio gold coin winner!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning for 2014 with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at what traders and investors should be planning for in 2014. From typical allocations in 401k’s and Ira’s to income generation with Options, Tillie offers insights into increasing your Rate of Return! Tillie also bring a big stack of her new DVD: How To Retire With More Money Than You Need” to give away to all callers during the show!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Final Power Trading Radio Show for 2013 !!!
episodes.summary: Marty Dim joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at what were some of his biggest takeaways from 2013, and how they will be implemented in 2014. Marty also shares with listeners his best trade of 2013, which was something he never traded before! After sharing a couple student stories, Marty takes a look at what he will be focusing on in 2014. Finally, last week’s gold coin winner is announced!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What Happened in 2013 and Whats Next?
episodes.summary: Merlin and Joh n O'Donnell take us through the best and most interesting facets of 2013 and also look ahead to what potential lies in store for all of us. Bullish or Bearish? Listen and you will have more insights into how John and Merlin really look at the markets

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Boxing Day Knockouts with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: The day after Christmas brought some nice market gains, adding to a robust year! Market veteran Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at what her biggest takeaways were for 2013, and some insights into what she expects for 2014. From shorting Gold to using options for a less risky rate of return, Tillie has many helpful insights that have worked for through 2013 and may help you through 2014.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Year In Review plus 2014 Projections with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: As this great year of 2013 comes to a close, Mike McMahon joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look back at what were some of the highlights and major takeaways from the year. Mike takes a look at emerging markets as a catalyst and fuel for the markets going forward. He also shares his worst and best trade of 2013 before offering his insights into what may happen in 2014.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Andrew Huszar
episodes.summary: Former Fed trader, Andrew Huszar joins Merlin and John for a great look behind the veiled wall of secrecy that surrounds the Fed and their doings. Andrew was tasked to head up the buying of 1.25 trillion dollars in bonds in an attempt to offer stability and growth to the markets. They buying went as planned, the results did not! This show focuses on what some of the fundamental problems were with the purchasing and what the prognosis is for the future, including upcoming tapering! The lastest gold coin winner is also announced.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bursting Bubbles with Peter J. Wallison
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell joins Merlin and special guest Peter J. Wallison for a look at the root cause of the housing market bubble. Most perceived it to be the lenders and the banks, but Peter was behind the scenes and offers the truth behind it all. This rings loud and clear after the fact, and frightening now because the situation has not been resolved! There are also other areas in our current markets which are approaching “bubblish” levels! John and Merlin also take a look at the Fed tapering news and how it might impact the markets going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Protection for Fed Meeting with Options
episodes.summary: Steve Moses joins Merlin for a look at how the Options market is shaping up ahead of the all important Fed meeting tomorrow afternoon. Vix is rising, and many are rushing to Options for protection and profit, but is it a risky proposition? Steve lays out the risks of trading the December options during a major announcement and expiration week. Steve also talks a little about his personal style of Options trading which is very focused in its scope.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday with Merlin
episodes.summary: Merlin breaks down Monday’s trading session and gives some insight as to what to expect for the week ahead. This weekend say many questions pour into the mail bags here at PTR, and Merlin answers many of them on the show. From trading styles to market filters, asset classes to fed announcements, this show has a little of everything!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: A quiet session ended a very volatile trading week ahead of a significant Fed meeting next Tuesday and Wednesday. Economist Dr. Mark Thornton joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld to look at some macro market issues including the growing legalization of Marijuana and its economic impact. Later focus shifts to the current market and potential bubble situation brewing among many different asset classes. Mark also shares the Austrian School of economics perspective of the darling new alternate currency: Bitcoin. Finally, the latest gold coin winner is announced for the Power Trading Radio free Gold Coin contest.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Long Term Investing with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by long time market veteran to break down a couple big misconceptions with regards to long term investing. IN response to listener questions, the duo takes a look at buying dividend stocks as well as making trades off of PE ratio’s, methods fraught with problems! Mike also shares his forecast on the markets which has taken on a decidedly bearish tone recently!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Wednesday Market Wrap
episodes.summary: Merlin starts the show off with a look at a couple listener questions pertaining to Altera and Amgen before moving into the fundamentals of Market Timing. This leads to a quick discussion of product awareness, primarily understanding when to roll over into the next futures contract! Debbi Hague joins the show for a quick look at where she things the markets are headed and what clues the major indexes are giving us.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currency Rundown
episodes.summary: Tuesdays show opens with a look at the  upcoming implementation of the Volcker rule and what it might mean to the markets, followed up by a look at how the recent split announcement of Mastercard will impact shareholders. The focus turns to the currency markets for a look at some potential trade setups with the Euro, Pound, Aussie and more. Most of the analysis is offered in response to listener questions, so send in your trading questions at www.PowerTradingRadio.com or on twitter to @TraderMerlin

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Market Machine with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Monday’s are normally reserved for Stocks, but this show is shattering that assumption! Merlin starts off with a look at the fed fund rate: what it means and how it impacts the markets. Scott McCormick joins the discussion adding his perspectives on the topic and diving into some long term charts for greater understanding of market cycles for clues to future market direction. Later the duo answer several listener questions pertaining to currencies, commodities, futures and market correlations.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John and Merlin start with a look at the legacy of Nelson Mandela, and share thoughts on the current economic issues facing South Africa. Next, Merlin bring up compelling charts of the Feds previous action to slow down the markets, and shows why he believes a Massive bubble is forming. John looks at the current employment data and shares a couple of charts to show some startling figures the media is not talking about! Finally, the duo announce this week’s latest gold coin winner!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Back in the USSA with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Having spent the last few weeks teaching in Dubai, Master Trader Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at what the long term picture looks like for the markets. Tillie answers several listener questions about ProActive investing and the use of Options for long term accounts. This involves both buying and selling puts & calls. Tillie always gives away her new DVD: “How To Retire With More Money Than You Need” to all callers during the live broadcast.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Seasonality with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: With so many market mantras flying around, all eyes are focused on the Santa Claus rally. Many analysts writing this off as a foregone conclusion! Veteran floor trader Craig Weil joins Merlin for a look at this market phenomenon and many others. Some of which can offer high probability, low risk trading opportunities. Lots of statistics are looked at with regard to year end gains, and several trades outlined.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Santa’s Xmas Present
episodes.summary: While most traders work all year to make the most they can, Michael Atias spends the year helping traders make the most of what they have! With a great insight into all the specific rules and regulations for taxation, Michael answers several listeners questions pertaining to Mark-to-Market accounting and setting up a trading entity.
