He also addresses the major things every trader should be doing before the year ends!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: December Kick Start with Michael Young
episodes.summary: With the final trading month of the year finally under way, Merlin looks to seasoned market veteran Michael Young for his insights at to what we can expect going forward. Will there be a Santa Claus Rally? Are there special segments we should be focusing on? Merlin and Michael look at this as well as answer several listener questions about Stocks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures with Steve Bobbitt
episodes.summary: On this quiet holiday week, the markets still had a nice lift from the Tech sector. Steve Bobbitt joins Merlin for a look at how he has been trading this holiday week, and offers us some insights for the remainder of the year. Steve also address the liquidity aspects of the markets as a listener wanted to know about how illiquid the futures markets actually are. The duo also look at crude oil and the recent sell off for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Social Media Tuesday with Zenobia
episodes.summary: For the last few weeks, Zenobia has been collecting many listener questions from twitter (@traderMerlin, @PowerTradingRD, @TradingAcademy). Tune in to see if your question  was answered by the Power Trading Radio team!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Market Monday with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Mike McMahon joins Merlin for a look at all the current market updates and potential trading opportunities. Merlin and Mike start with a look at Leveraged ETF’s and their detrimental attributes when added to long term trading accounts. After a quick talk about gambling tendencies in trading, the duo looks at Tesla and future market direction. Mike has been openly bullish since August of 2010, is he still? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Alan Hall
episodes.summary: Alan Hall of Elliot Wave International joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at how socionomics is impacting our current markets. He shares several charts with viewers which illustrate how the social mood actually leads markets. Later John and Merlin take a look at Gold and its current downtrend. This culminates with the announcement of a new gold coin winner for the week!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Breaking the Code with Haim Bodek and Peter Zhang
episodes.summary: Running a High Frequency Trading firm is no walk in the park! It’s even tougher when others are given a competitive advantage! Haim Bodek (former CEO of HFT firm Trading Machines) and Peter Zhang (Head of Risk Management at Sang Lucci Hedge fund), Join Merlin for a look behind the curtain on the HFT world and the mystery of secret order types which allow other firms to jump order cue’s and exploit rules put in place by the SEC. Haim also talks about his recent film “The Wall Street Code” (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kFQJNeQDDHA), which addresses many improprieties in the financial markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Timing the Market with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: 2 out of the last 3 days have seen sharp selling to end the trading session, prompting some to forecast a broader selloff in the coming weeks. Debbie looks at current markets and shares her thoughts on where things may be headed, as well as shed some light on historical price levels. The duo look at exactly how far back one should look to find significant supply and demand levels which may turn price. They also offer some trading insight on the Aussie Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies: Fiat vs. Electronic with Bert Antonik
episodes.summary: Teaching a Market Timing event in Indonesia, Bert Antonik joins Merlin for a look at the current status of the global currency markets and analysis of several currency pairs. Bert and Merlin look at EURUSD, GBPUSD, and the latest entrant in the currency war: Bitcoin!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Kick start with Brandon Tristan
episodes.summary: A bipolar trading started off quite and ended with a wicked selloff. Brandon Tristan joins Merlin for a look at what he and his XLT students were looking at, and the trading opportunities this session provided. Brandon stresses a multiple time frame analysis approach which opened the door to making some great intraday trades in today’s XLT session. Brandon and Merlin offer their insights into trading holidays and what the market may hold going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: The weekend edition is chocked full of macro market information! From the relentless surge upward to inflationary pressure, John and Merlin look at things from 30,000 feet! Later, Merlin brings up a great chart which shows the rate hikes and cuts over the last 10 years and points out a very interesting void in fed action which may act as MASSIVE bubble fuel going forward. Finally, the latest gold coin winner is announced!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Credit and Housing with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: More attention is pointed at credit scores each day, yet most know little about theirs. Diana Hill joins Merlin for a look at what the average person should know about their credit, and discuss her latest DVD which covers all aspects of credit and illustrates the fastest way to improve your credit score! This evolves into a discussion on the housing markets which have continued to post some significant gains across many US markets. Lastly, the duo look at the fed funds rate on a market chart to show a very disturbing problem in the works!! Tune in and find out what it is!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Perfect Timing for Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Steve Moses joins Merlin for a look at his most recent travels to London to teach Options in the UK. He starts out with a look at the unnecessary risks most traders take with regards to trading earnings announcements using options. Later, a quick look at the current market leads to a discussion on spread trading and how to take advantage of sideways markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Matt Gildea
episodes.summary: Matt Gildea brings some of his students up to the studio for a live show with Merlin. The duo discuss the options market, specifically the risks and rewards of currency options which have been getting a lot of attention recently. Later, Matt offers his insights as to where the markets may be headed based off of the Fed and prospects of tapering in the future. Lastly, they offer analysis if the British Pound as several listeners had questions on this currency.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Stocks with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Scott McCormick talks to Merlin about his current ProTrader class in Charlotte NC, which spent a good part of the day practicing order entry types on a flat market day! Scott also takes a look at how one finds areas of supply in this market when nearly all indexes are at historical highs. This leads to a discussion on Sectors and ultimately a look at the currency market and the UUP for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live From The San Diego Grand Opening Event with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld broadcast live from the large classroom at Online Trading Academy’s newest brick and mortar education center in San Diego California. This show is done with a large live audience, and is very interactive!!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Big Picture with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Hosting the show solo, Merlin takes a look at major market factors which may play into your short term, and long term agenda! Focus is on the ECB cutting rates, US GDP and market selloff, recent IPO of twitter and other ProActive Investing topics. This show also includes a segment on sector rotation and market analytics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Irfan Patel
episodes.summary: Master trader and instructor talks about his evolution as a trader on this exciting episode of Power Trading Radio. Having started off as an Online Trading Academy graduate, Irfan quickly rose through the ranks to land at one of the top instructors for the XLT trading community. Merlin and Irfan take a look at what were some of the greatest learning lessons for all traders making the transition to trade professionally. Later, they look at the Euro currency pair and answer several listener questions on a variety of trading topics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: The war is on as governments and central banks battle to have the weakest currency. Will this fuel the next bubble, the mother of all bubbles? Steve and Merlin take a look at the potential impacts of our reckless policies on several currency pairs including the Euro, Yen, Pound and much more. Merlin also takes a look at several stocks for analysis including: Blackberry, tesla, Etrade and more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trader Psychology with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Author of “Mastering The Mental Game”, Dr. Woody Johnson joins Merlin for a look into the psychological impacts trading can have on a person. Many listener questions are answered including a great one on how learning to many tools can actually hinder your performance. From establishing rules and tactics to details about journaling your thoughts & emotions, Merlin and Dr. Johnson cover many topics that will apply to everyone! The latest gold coin winner is also announced.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Walter E. Williams
episodes.summary: Dr. Williams is the author of over 150 publications which have appeared in scholarly journals such as Economic Inquiry, American Economic Review, Georgia Law Review, Journal of Labor Economics, Social Science Quarterly, and Cornell Journal of Law and Public Policy and popular publications such as Newsweek, Ideas on Liberty, National Review, Reader's Digest, Cato Journal, and Policy Review. He has authored ten books:America: A Minority Viewpoint, The State Against Blacks, which was later made into the PBS documentary "Good Intentions," All It Takes Is Guts, South Africa's War Against Capitalism, which was later revised for South African publication, Do the Right Thing: The People's Economist Speaks,  More Liberty Means Less Government, Liberty vs. the Tyranny of Socialism, Up From The Projects: An Autobiography, and Race and Economics: How Much Can Be Blamed On Discrimination?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Playing Probability with Eric Ochotnicki
episodes.summary: Aquaman and Superman open the show with a look at the current market moves and feedback on a couple listener questions. Second segment starts with former floor trader Eric Ochotnicki who walks us though his trading background and how the investment has changed over the years. The duo talks about dividend stocks as an incorrect way to invest, offering a different solutions including the “End of Month Trade” which has a high degree of accuracy!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking to the Future with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Fresh off a UK tour, Debbie Hague joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at what her market timing classes have revealed about our markets going forward. She shares one interesting fact that may lead to some heavy selling pressure going forward. Debbie and Merlin also look at the Aussie Dollar futures for potential levels, and help a listener with a troubling trade on the Cotton Futures.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stocks and Currencies with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: With some major companies rolling out earnings and the Fed meeting just one day away, Joann Farley joins Merlin to look at these issues and a several listener questions on this episode of Power Trading Radio. Joann starts with a look at a great moment from today’s XLT program with Gabe Velazquez, then moves into a great discussion about trading vs. gambling. Later, the duo take a look at the charts of Visa and Facebook for potential buy and sell points.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Stocks with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Monday kicked off with a quiet trading session with little movement. Perhaps this is setting up for Wednesday’s Fed meeting which many feel will NOT include any tapering. Professional trader Scott McCormick joins Merlin to help make sense of this topic as well as analyze several stock charts per listener requests.  Stocks include: Peabody Energy, Goodyear, Apple and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Peter G. Klein
episodes.summary: Executive Director at Mises.org and Professor of Applied Social Sciences at the University of Missouri, Peter G. Klein joins Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell for a look at how the current market situation looks and what might be some remedies to get this country back on track. The trio also look at the impact of Janet Yellen’s nomination for the markets as well as the debt ceiling issue. Peter also talks about what a government default may look like and what its effects will be. The latest gold coin winner is also announced.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Take Control of Your Future with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Veteran trader, Paul Orme joins Merlin for a look at some the key steps everyone should be making to secure their financial future. This involves Using a variety of asset classes to time the markets, and use non-traditional investment techniques such as Options to increase your rate of return. This is very different than using the traditional Dividend and Bond plays for Income. Merlin also gives away Tillie Allison’s new DVD titled: How to Retire With More Money Than You Need to all callers during the live show!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Instructor of the Year! – Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: The new King of trading instructors, Jose Blasco joins Merlin for a look at the potential top for the markets through an analysis of many charts. Jose discusses his General Session he hosted this morning for 200+ members of the Online Trading Academy XLT mentoring program. This session involved looking at 35 different markets for correlation and potential trading opportunities. Merlin and Jose take a look at a couple of these instruments and offer insights into where they see the markets heading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Ilya Spivak
episodes.summary: DailyFX.com currency strategist Ilya Spivak joins Merlin for a look at global markets and the important economic data recently released. The duo take a close look at the unemployment data that was released today for clues as to what the fed may be looking to do going forward. After breaking down the $DXY and $USDOLLAR charts, the show wraps up with analysis if the Euro and potential upside targets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Jumpstart with Gabe Velazquez
episodes.summary: Trader Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin for a look at the equity markets and their recent surge to the upside. Gabe addresses some statistical calculation that reveal a very overbought market and some other signs that the party may be ending soon. Later, Merlin and Gabe answer some listener questions, in particular one about JC Penny. Gabe also sheds some light on the myths behind market timing and informs listeners how they can time the markets with a higher degree of accuracy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Pete Kendall
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld interview Elliott Wave Internationals Co-Editor Pete Kendall. Pete takes a look at several charts to help break down the current status of the market and warn of problems ahead. Topics discussed include the debt ceiling, value of the US Dollar, risk tolerance, emerging markets and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Twitter Show
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and Zenobia Noor had a show dedicated entirely to the questions that have come in over the last month on Twitter. If you have questions that you would like answered by an active professional trader on November’s Twitter Show, send them in! The twitter names to send questions to are: @TraderMerlin or @TradingAcademy

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Orchestrating Trader Success with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Today’s show pays homage to those who work diligently behind the scenes to make prospective traders dreams true at Online Trading Academy. Joann Farley, has been trading for years and spends a tremendous amount of time supporting new traders and creating a great a great trading community in the XLT and Mastermind community. Joann and Merlin also look at a listeners question regarding a phenomenal call in the ProPicks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Several frustrated traders sent in questions that revolve around the psychology of trading. To help Merlin break it down is the author of “From Pain to Profit: secrets of the peak performance trader”, Dr. Woody Johnson. From handling greed to proper journaling of trades, the Doctor offers suggestions which may help trader get back on the path to financial independence.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Sir Charles Vollum
episodes.summary: To cap off a very volatile trading week, John O’Donnell invites the creator of PricedInGold.com, Sir Charles Vollum for some perspective as to how pricing assets in gold smoothes out these fluctuations. The trio take a look at home prices, college tuition and other areas all priced in gold with great charts to back it all up. Later, John and Merlin announce the latest gold coin winner. If you have not put in your forecast for next week’s free gold coin, do so at www.powertradingradio.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: To help promote her new DVD: How To Retire With More Money Than You Need, Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at what factors are moving the markets. She also talks about why she recently opened long positions on the major indexes based off of ProActive investing indicators. Tillie emphasizes the importance of ProPicks, and how she uses them to help strengthen her trades in a variety of asset classes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Jeffrey Hirsch
episodes.summary: President of Stock Trader’s Almanac, Jeffrey Hirsch joins Merlin for a look at what he feels the impacts of the Debt Ceiling, Government Shutdown and potential Default will do to our markets. He offers 3 scenarios which we you can start building trading strategies around to capitalize and increase your rate of return. Jeffrey also talks about some interesting market statistics, which were taken out of the amazing Stock Trader’s Almanac!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from Online Trading Academy’s International Conference 2013 Day 2
episodes.summary: Scott Greer & Darek Zelek join Merlin for a look at what they are learning at the conference, what they see in the markets, and answer listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from Online Trading Academy’s International Conference 2013
episodes.summary: Brandon Wendell & Rehman Moledina join Merlin for a look at what they are learning at the conference, what they see in the markets, and answer listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell & Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: Senior fellow at Ludwig von Mises Institute, Mark Thornton joins the weekend edition of Power Trading Radio for an Austrian School of Economics perspective of what our current predicament in the US looks like. Mark and John look at potential likely outcomes, and propose others which may help the US get out from under its current mountain of debt.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Diving Into the Mail Bag
episodes.summary: Solo on set, Merlin Rothfeld answers a variety of listener questions ranging from the Government shutdowns impacts on the markets, to the trajectory of the US Dollar. Also mentioned on this show is algorithmic trading systems and scanning techniques for trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Joining Merlin in studio to celebrate her new DVD, “How To Retire With More Money Than You Need”, Tillie Allison helps break down the current events in the markets and how its impacting her trading. Tillie talks about using different asset classes to trade volatile, choppy markets, using some current trades for reinforcement. The duo answers several listener questions pertaining to specific stocks and markets including Autodesk, Micron Technologies and market scanners.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Gridlock with Jasmine Wang
episodes.summary: Master instructor and mentor, Jasmine Wang joins Merlin for a look at the global currency markets. Jasmine talks about several levels that hit in the Mastermind community today and what the outlook is for several currency pairs including: the Euro, Yen, Dollar & Pound. The show has great analysis of market levels and potential trading opportunities as well.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Breaking Down the Shutdown with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: With the Government shutdown looming at Midnight, Mike McMahon and Merlin take a look at what we should really be worried about. Historically, it hasn’t been so bad for the markets as the charts will show! Mike and Merlin also take a look at Office Depot and Exxon Mobile for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Walter Block
episodes.summary: Dr. Walter Block joins Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell for a look at pressing Government and political issues facing our financial markets. Dr. Block analyzes our current predicament from an Austrian Economics perspective, looking for a solution that will make America a better place for years to come. John and Dr. Block look at unemployment, debt ceiling, the defending of dying industries and much more on this installment of Power Trading Radio!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing For Q4 with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: To help break down a listeners question about company sponsored 401k programs, Merlin enlists the help of Tillie Allison to get to the bottom of the question. The duo talk about the many paths one may take to choose the correct investment vehicle, as well as asset class selection. Every situation is different, yet there are some basic steps that are universal. Later, Tillie and Merlin discuss the current economic situation and what we should be looking for as we roll in to Q4.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bumping Your Head on the Debt Ceiling with Steve Bobbitt
episodes.summary: The deadline for the debt ceiling is very quickly approaching and the markets appear to be starting to price it in. Steve Bobbitt joins Merlin to break down some of the major market moving events that are nearly upon us, analyzing their potential market impact. The duo look at the current situation with the S&P500 as well as how the US Dollar will be a major player in the market’s direction going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Justin Krebs
episodes.summary: Master trading mentor, Justin Krebs joins Merlin for a look at how the currency markets have been impacted by the recent fed decision to not taper. This will have some significant impacts on all currencies depending on what levels of supply and demand are nearby. Justin and Merlin take a look at several currencies for hot levels which may provide trading opportunities followed up with a look at what some of his students have been looking at in the Online mentoring room.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How To Retire With More Money Than You Need
episodes.summary: Joining Merlin to talk about her new DVD, Tillie Allison shares some insights into ProActive investing as well as giving away free DVD’s to listeners during the show. Tillie also takes a look at correlation and the use of commodities to help one time the markets with a greater degree of accuracy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: After a roller coaster week in the markets and surprises from the Fed, Traders are left wondering where the markets and their trades will go! John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at these macro issues as well as breaking down several different stocks including: Facebook, Hewlet-Packard, Blackberry and more. Merlin also announces this week’s gold coin winner.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Current State of Housing Market with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: Housing markets continue to show strength, helping support our financial markets. Diana offers some insights into the current mortgage rates from a historical perspective, emphasizing that we are still near historical lows. This leads into a discussion of how to evaluate properties from both a residential and commercial perspective, before Diana wraps up with some thoughts on what areas of the US are looking good going forward!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Sleight of Hand with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: Market Magician Ben Bernanke pulled a fast one on the markets today, not doing any tapering when he had been teasing it for months. This sent the markets rocking to the upside, and into uncharted territory! Veteran trader Craig Weil joins the show to talk about how he and his students traded today, and what are the lessons that he wants everyone to take out of today’s activity. Craig also talks about market relationships that he looks at to increase probability.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Calm Before the Storm with John Kicklighter
episodes.summary: On the eve of one of the more pivotal announcements this year in the financial markets, Senior Currency Strategist at DailyFX.com, John Kicklighter joins Merlin for a look at what to watch out for. John offers some insights into what may transpire with regards to tapering and its effects on the markets, then analyzes a couple currency pairs at listener request. The Loonie shows some interesting lows in a wide range, and the EURUSD is challenging a recent supply level, again! Tune in to get some ideas which may help you manage risk, and find higher probability trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using Sectors to time the Markets with Brandon Wendell
episodes.summary: CMT Brandon Wendell Joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at ways to use sector rotation models to help spot market turning points. This technique uses historical sector rotation models to spot money flowing from one industry to another. These relationships help identify turning points and thus increase probability of being on the right side of the trade! Brandon also takes a look at Fibonacci numbers and his upcoming teaching tour of the US.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Alan Hall
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell, Merlin Rothfeld and Alan Hall take a look at Socionomics and how social mood is steering markets around the world. This timely discussion focuses on the current global conflict situation, in particular the social mood toward a war with Syria. Mr. Hall offers several charts to help illustrate his points and offer insights as to where we may be headed from here!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Russ Allen
episodes.summary: Master Mentor Russ Allen joins Merlin for a look at strategic asset allocation models and how to partition ones portfolio to both achieve the greatest returns & manage risk. Russ and Merlin talk about commodities as a part of one’s portfolio, as several listeners voice frustration with this asset class. The duo also stress that there are no clear “Cookie-cutter” formulas for retirement portfolios and everyone must work to build one that suits their unique situation.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Master instructor Steve Moses joins Merlin for a look at some options plays for the current market. Steve talks about a couple different trades he and his students made in class today, utilizing volatility and supply & demand principles. Later, the duo look at trades on Tesla and offer insights into the current demise of Apple.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex with Bill Henner
episodes.summary: Long time floor trading veteran Bill Henner joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how the global currency markets impact nearly every other asset class. From commodities to stock markets, money drives them all! Bill takes an in-depth look at the Aussie for a listener, and points out that there may be more upside potential for the pair, offering many points of economic data to support the call. Later, Bill and Merlin breakdown the USDJPY.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Market Monday with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: Professional trader, Scott McCormick joins Merlin to help analyze several listener questions that range in topics from trading gaps, to using chart patterns for confirmation. The duo take a look at Facebook, Apple, Molex and other stocks as examples. Both share their thoughts on how to handle different trading situations and apply personal experiences to drive home concepts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Paul Buzby
episodes.summary: Director of Economic Research at Rare Coin Wholesalers, Paul Buzby, joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at how some of the major issues are going to impact the markets and commodities going forward. The potential for air strikes with Syria, make gold an interesting play, and the fed’s meeting next week poses some serious threats to the market uptrend. Add to that the uncertainty of the Debt Ceiling crisis and you have some very volatile markets ahead! Tune in and find out where things may be headed and the announcement of our new Gold Coin winner!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing Listener Questions
episodes.summary: With no guest on the show, Merlin attempts to tackle several listener questions with regards to their long term trading and goals. Issues focus on risk of trading Forex options, asset allocation models, how the fed is influencing the bond market, and how to find out what fees you are paying in your retirement account.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodity Futures with Michelle Volmering
episodes.summary: Having grown up on a farm, Michelle walks us through how her family introduced her to commodity futures and their functionality. She progresses to breakdown how futures are used in modern situations, an offers some insights into specific trading tactics. Michelle and Merlin also talk about trading the open and what one would want to look at in order to increase confidence and profitability.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies and Trends
episodes.summary: Fresh off a teaching trip to India, Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a look at international markets. Tillie starts off with an analysis of the differences between efficiency and transparency in international markets and some of the advantages of trading in Dubai. Later, Tillie and Merlin talk about trend trading vs reversion and consolidation trading, with an example on the Japanese Yen. Finally, a quick analysis of the Euro and a discussion about how to use fundamental data.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Learning About the Fed with Jim Bruce
episodes.summary: One area that most Americans are completely in the dark on is the role and responsibilities of the Federal Reserve. Jim Bruce is the Writer/director/producer/editor of a new movie which sheds light on this elusive club! John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld dive into the mystical abyss of the Fed in an attempt to understand exactly what role they play and how their actions have been slowly chipping away at the financial wealth of the average American. Jim also announces many premier showings in select cities across the US. Finally a new gold coin winner is announced.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Traders Psychology with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Dr. Woody Johnson shares some insights into why most traders struggle with fear in the markets. This fear can come in many forms, but can be tackled with one simple step. Later focus shifts to a listener question about trading as a team and working together to address problems. Merlin and Woody address these issues and more on this great episode of Power Trading Radio!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Commodities with Don Dawson
episodes.summary: Commodities master, Don Dawson joins Merlin for a look at some of the pressing topics with trading commodity futures. This includes a look at using adjusted vs. unadjusted data and the impact it can have on your charts. Next Don offers some insight into the chart formation on the Yen futures before addressing Cotton futures. Don offers some suggestions as to what traders should be looking for with regards to correlation to individual securities as well.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Ilya Spivak
episodes.summary: Currency strategist at DailyFX.com, Ilya Spivak, joins Merlin for a look at a variety of global currencies from both a macro and fundamental perspective. Things kick off with a look at the Euro which has been toying with recent supply levels. Next focus shifts to the AUDUSD, which presents a some interesting arguments for going long (Ilya is presently Long AUDUSD). After discussing Gold, Oil and Aussie relationships, focus shifts to the GBPUSD before Ilya talks about one of the single most important items he looks for when breaking down trading plans.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking Stocks with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: On a whirlwind teaching tour of Southest Asia, Master instructor Jeff Manson takes some time to talk to Merlin about trading the stock market. Jeff has been spending significant time in the Master Mind trading community helping improve trading skills in a variety of areas. Jeff helps Merlin with some technical analysis of listener stocks including: JBL, FB, IBM and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at a coffee futures again, this time using adjusted and unadjusted charts to paint two very different perspectives on the recent demise in the price of coffee. From there they take a look at 6 possible ways to make trades off of a potential rise in the caffeine laden commodity. Later, analysis is given on the current market levels and when might be the most opportune time to start opening a short position.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Breaking Down Bonds with Bob Heitner
episodes.summary: As the bond market looks like a safer place to put your money if the market crashes, Bob Heitner and Merlin Rothfeld break why this is not necessarily true. Bob explains how and why to use bonds, then walks listeners through the various types of bonds available to the public. The show wraps up with a look at why bonds may be one of the riskiest investments currently, and what investors should do to ProActively manage their money.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures with Bob Dunn
episodes.summary: Former CME floor trader, Bob Dunn, joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at today’s events in relationship to the futures markets. To begin with, he addresses how he trades the market when announcements like today’s FOMC Meeting Minutes are released. This is followed up by a lesson on why NOT to add to losing positions. Coffee futures have been falling for an extended period of time, and the duo looks at how this might be traded across multiple markets including stocks and options.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Bert Antonik
episodes.summary: With several currencies arriving at key supply and demand levels, Merlin Rothfeld welcomes Bert Antonik to help break down the key currencies. Analysis begins with the Japanese yen which has been forming some interesting technical patterns that may give some clues as to where its headed in the near future. Next the duo look at a listener question about the pound and its potential direction going forward, which both Bert and Merlin voice concern. Finally, focus shifts to the Euro, which is rallying into some significant levels that could impede current trajectory.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Market Roundup with Darek Zelek
episodes.summary: Darek Zelek joins Merlin for a look at several important factors facing our current markets which are pointing toward a lower future. The duo then break down several listener questions regarding a variety of stocks, including: Vale, Exxon, Flotek industries, IBM, Apple and more. Tune into this technical analysis heavy episode of Power Trading Radio!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Lowell Ponte
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell, Merlin Rothfeld and special guest Lowell Ponte discuss the government intervention in place and its impact on our currency and global purchasing power. Lowell, author of several financial books, paints a grim picture precipitated by reckless spending and printing of money. This episode is full of great facts and figures which will open your eyes to a very pressing problem, as well as stress the importance of planning your future rather than just being caught up in it!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Numbers Behind Housing
episodes.summary: Diana Hill joins Merlin Rothfeld for a show full of charts which attempt to explain the current housing situation. Just like a trader who is anticipating supply and demand, the housing market is also driven by these two forces. Diana and Merlin look at housing inventory numbers over the last 6 years to get a clue as to what the S&D looks like and where it may be headed. Later, Diana breaks down what impact has on the CPI numbers which are a great measure of inflation for our markets. What are the major trends? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 1 Bull, 1 Bear, 1 Condor
episodes.summary: In response to a listener question about preferred trading strategy, options master Steve Moses joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at a current trade his is in. This trade incorporates several options strategies including Bull Puts, Bear Calls, and Iron Condors. While this may seem like something out of your local zoo, they are ways to define risk & reward while ultimately anticipating price remains in a specified range. Steve puts an emphasis on spread trading as his primary style, and explains why.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: In a quick stop before his London trip to teach a couple trading classes, Steve Misic joins Merlin for a look at what is hot in the global markets. To begin with, he looks at the Japanese Yen and the Nikkei 225 index, commenting on volatility and tight correlation. Later focus shifts to the pound and the impact of the BOE statements this week. After a brief explanation on TIC Long Term Purchases, Steve and Merlin take a look at the US dollar for clues of future market direction.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Market veteran, Tillie Allison talks about her upcoming trip to Dubai to teach the ProTrader class, followed up with a segment on account types and trading styles. Later the duo looks at defining correlation and how it impacts trading decisions. This is done with several examples of trades where the consolidation is beneficial and others where it could be viewed as detrimental.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pricing Things in Gold with Charles Vollum
episodes.summary: Having a common denominator is a key factor in tracking asset values over time. Charles Vollum, owner of PricedInGold.com joins Merlin and John to talk about his website which is devoted to tracking a wide variety of assets using gold as the denominator. From housing prices to college education, the trio take a look at some charts which really drive home the erosion of our global purchasing power with the dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Dangers of 401(k)s with Bob Heitner
episodes.summary: News agencies abound are talking about the perils of these heralded retirement vehicles, often pointing out that they may actually be taking your money rather than making you money! Bob Heitner, master instructor at Online Trading Academy discusses what some of the facts are pertaining to these plans, and offers solutions for investors to self direct their money and keep more of it. Bonds are also an area of concern which the duo addresses while looking at alternative ways to generate consistent income. Bob also offers some insight into what his current positions are for the market in the PAI portfolio.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Sprinkle of Everything with Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: Fresh off an intense teaching tour of Dubai, India, Singapore, Indonesia and more, Professional trader Jose Blasco joins Merlin to talk about his market observations and analysis. This ranges from a comparison of the Indian Option markets vs. US options market, to the benefits of trading commodity futures. Jose also offers some insights into where the Euro may be headed as well as the current position of the S&P500 going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currency Breakdown with John Kicklighter
episodes.summary: Senior currency strategist at Dailyfx.com, John Kicklighter joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at some of the major factors impacting the currency markets. To begin with, John looks at a fundamental and technical view of the Euro before offering an explanation of risk assessment and how it impacts his analysis. Later, John offers commentary on the Aussie and Pound for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Master trader and author Debbie Hague joins Merlin for a look at her upcoming Market Timing event in London. This class is designed to make individuals aware of how the markets truly operate, and what individuals can learn from the big institutions to tip the odds in their favor. Merlin and Debbie take a look at a listener question which focuses specifically on market timing and its application to market gaps. Later, Debbie addresses the differences in timing individual securities, and market indexes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Jim Puplava
episodes.summary: Jim Puplava's professional designations include Certified Financial Planner; FINRA Series 7 and Series 24; and Life, Disability and Variable Insurance licenses. Mr. Puplava has been President of Puplava Financial Services, Inc. (PFS) since 1985. For twelve years, James Puplava held a position as Branch Manager for LPL Financial Services, LLC. In 1996, Mr. Puplava established the broker/dealer firm, Puplava Securities, Inc. (PSI) and is its President.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Michael Lewitt on Power Trading Radio
episodes.summary: Mr. Lewitt has over 20 years of investment experience and successfully managed large credit portfolios through the 2001-2002 and 2008 credit crises. Mr. Lewitt co-founded Harch Capital Management, LLC in 1991, where he was the co-lead portfolio manager (1991-2001) and lead portfolio manager (2001-2011) for all of the firm’s credit portfolios including separate accounts, hedge funds (long and short), collateralized debt obligations and mutual funds focused on the less-than-investment grade debt markets for U.S. and non-U.S. clients that included, among others, LACERA (Los Angeles County Retirement Association), Texas Teachers Retirement System, Investec Bank (UK), Goldman Sachs Asset Management, JPMorgan Chase Asset Management, Highbridge Capital Management, Investcorp, Onex Corporation and Omega Advisers, Inc. Since 2001, Mr. Lewitt has edited and authored The Credit Strategist, a newsletter that covers economics, politics and the financial markets and that is widely read around the world. Mr. Lewitt is recognized as one of the few investors and strategists who accurately forecasted and successfully managed client assets through both the 2001-2 credit crisis and the 2008 financial crisis. Mr. Lewitt serves as a regular financial columnist for the Spanish newspaper El Mundo and has written for The New York Times, The New Republic, Trusts & Estates and other publications.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tom Sosnoff on Power Trading Radio
episodes.summary: Tom Sosnoff, CEO of tastytrade and host of “Get Tasted,” is a recognized online brokerage innovator and sought-after financial educator. Tom founded thinkorswim in 1999, before the options market was electronic. Leveraging over 25 years of experience as a market maker for the Chicago Board of Options Exchange (CBOE) and one of the original OEX traders in the S&P 100 Index pit, Tom pursued a vision to educate retail investors in options trading and to build a superior software platform at a brokerage firm that specialized in options. His efforts ultimately changed the way these instruments traded by pioneering single click trading functionality for complex spreads.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell & Harry Dent
episodes.summary: Harry S. Dent is a world renowned economist who studies demographic and historic trends to see major events unfolding long before the mainstream media's even has them on their radar. He accurately predicted the 1990-92 recession, foresaw the biggest Bull Market run in US history as well as Japan's Lost Decade and, most recently, sounded the early warnings about the 2008 financial crash.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Saving Money with Tax Planning
episodes.summary: Michael Atias of OTA Tax Pros joins Merlin for a look at several popular trader questions. To start off with, they discuss the methods which one can trade their retirement accounts and what are the benefits. Later Michael talks about Traders Status; how to declare it and what the impacts can be for an individual. Michael also looks at how one can pull money out of their retirement accounts without incurring penalties.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Making Detroit a Free City
episodes.summary: Professor Patrick Barron joins John and Merlin for a look at the radical idea of making Detroit city, meaning no minimum wage, no government help, guns for everyone, no taxes and much more. Is this some ridiculous idea or a possibility given the fact that nothing has seemed to work so far? Later, John and Merlin take a look at ETF’s for international markets as well as the gold market to announce the latest gold coin winner.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Who to Trust with Your Money?!
episodes.summary: ProActive Investing instructor Paul Orme joins Merlin for a look at some of the leading headlines which point to a greater lack of faith and trust in major financial institutions. Paul, a staunch advocate for self directed investing, explains why this erosion in confidence and what one should do about it. Part of the solution is Market timing and using non-traditional investment techniques. Techniques that major institutions will generally tell you NOT to do. Later, Paul offers his outlook on the markets and what would be the safest course of action for investors.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Matt Gildea on Trading Options
episodes.summary: Options instructor at Online Trading Academy, Matt Gildea, joins Merlin for a look at the current earnings season numbers and offers some insights as to what to make of it all. Later, the duo talk about a couple of different options strategies which may be used for a variety of different market conditions, including directional and spread trading. To wrap things up, Matt offers his analysis of the market levels by year end. Lower or higher? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies with Bachir Chaaya
episodes.summary: Master trader and Currencies Mentor, Bachir Chaaya joins Merlin from Lebanon to talk about some of his major learning lessons that have taken him from novice trader to Master instructor of Online Trading Academy’s XLT currencies program. This is followed up by an analysis of the Euro and the Pound for potential trade setups on a variety of different time frames. The duo also discuss the amount of time a trader needs to spend in front of a computer to facilitate the learning process.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning and Routine with Scott McCormick
episodes.summary: While teaching a ProTrader class in New Jersey, Scott McCormick takes time out of his day to share his thoughts on trading routine and market behavior. International markets are essential for determining trends, market behavior and patterns. Scott and Merlin take a look at these elements and offer suggestions as to what to watch out for. Scott and Merlin then take a look at several listener questions regarding several specific securities including Penn Virginia and Digital Generation.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: With Detroit’s recent bankruptcy filing, John and Merlin take a look at what might be the ramifications for residents and the city as a whole. This spills into a discussion on the riskiness of Municipalities and how investors should approach them with caution, as this once safe investment vehicle is now fraught with problems. To wrap up the show, the duo takes a look at Gold and announces Power Trading Radio’s most recent gold coin winner! Haven’t entered yet? It’s free! Register at PowerTradingRadio.com today!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking at the Big Picture with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Detroit files for bankruptcy, many investors stand to lose 90% of their investments, and those reliant on pensions may get just a fraction of what they thought they were getting! Tillie Allison joins Merlin to take a look at what one can do to ProActively plan their financial future. This includes taking a look at several “taken for granted” retirement vehicles which we should remove from our planning. Tillie and Merlin also take a look at Gold and its recent fall from grace, offering listeners insight into how to trade the precious metal.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Master Mentor Jasmine Wang
episodes.summary: One of the few architects of the Mastermind Community trading matrix, Jasmine Wang walks listeners through a day in her trading life.  From market analysis to establishing levels and filling out the level grid, Jasmine breaks down what it is that she does daily to set up high probability, low risk trading opportunities. Later, she shares her trading desktop with viewers and illustrates how these supply and demand levels panned out.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Currencies with Rehman Moledina
episodes.summary: To kick things off, Rehman Moledina and Merlin take a look at the current decline of Gold and analyze the recent demand zone that it fell into. Is it strong enough to reverse the downtrend, or just a momentary bounce back to the upside? Later, the duo take a look at the EURUSD and the AUDUSD for key supply and demand zones and some answers to listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Path to Success with Bachir Chaaya
episodes.summary: Back in 2008, Bachir was an Engineer looking for more information on the financial markets. He attended an Online Trading Academy free workshop in Dubai that forever changed his life. He has been applying what he has learned successfully for the past few years and his skills have landed him the coveted role as XLT instructor.  Joining Power Trading Radio remotely from Lebanon, Bachir walks listeners through his history and some of the basic steps he had to take to become a professional trader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with L. Todd Wood
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld welcome Author L. Todd Wood to the show for the second to talk about his new book titled “Sugar” Sugar is a novel about the energy industry and touches on many volatile topics, including: Fracking, Jobs, Government Stonewalling, Keystone XL pipelines and much more. The trio discuss many of these issues as the face the real world markets, and offer suggestions as to the biggest winners and losers which may evolve out of the US oil and natural gas discoveries.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: ProActive Investing with Paul Orme
episodes.summary: Rate of Return can be one of the major factors in retiring comfortably! Paul Orme joins Merlin to take a look at what are some of the factors which investors can do to become more ProActive in their investing, and what they can do to increase their rate of return. Later, Paul looks at using Options in a different manner in order to increase ROR even more. Without this type of planning, most Americans will never be able to retire!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Globe Trotting with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: After a whirlwind tour teaching in South East Asia, Debbie Hague returns to the states to share some of the things she learned while traveling, and give us insights as to where the markets may be headed. The duo take a look at a listener question regarding news driven events and quickly focus on real market movers, such as the US Dollar! Later in the program, Debbie talks a little about her new book “how to trade like a pirate”, and offers insight to the major market indexes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currency Rundown
episodes.summary: Merlin takes a look at several of the most requested currency pairs. To start off with , The Euro takes center stage as its fallen right into a decent demand level. Is this the time to go long or short? Merlin breaks that down as well! Later focus turns to the Pound which has a very similar situation happening on the charts. Next the Aussie has also experienced a nice decline, but is not at an interesting point technically. Finally, charts of the USDJPY are analyzed for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Analysis with Marty Dim
episodes.summary: Veteran trader, Marty Dim joins Merlin for a look at several equities and futures that listeners had questions with. Marty begins by walking listeners through a recent trade on the Nikkei Futures, one which he has never traded before! Later the duo break down the charts of Netflix and Ford for potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell take a look at the current market situation and offer some insight as to where the money is going! Equity and Bond markets are in decline, money has to be going somewhere!! Later, John talks about his new show “John O’Donnell’s Chart of the Week” which is available for free on Youtube.com/tradingacademy. The discussion revolves around the use of gold as a measure of global purchasing power, or should you use the Dollar Index.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fireworks with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin for a split show focusing on Futures and ProActive investing. To start, Tillie looks at the areas in the futures markets which offer the most potential for fireworks going forward. After breaking down a Facebook question from a listener, focus turns to the Fireworks that may be facing ProActive Investors.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: Last month Steve Misic pointed out that USDJPY was hitting a good weekly demand zone and since then, it’s been a Monster move up! Steve and Merlin talk about this move and what is next for the Yen. Later the duo look at relative strength and methods of finding trading opportunities with their respective styles.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Michael Young
episodes.summary: 37 year floor trading veteran, Michael Young joins Merlin for an eclectic show focusing on many different topics! Asset class d’jour, bonds are touched on, highlighting the classical “Risk on. Risk off” mindset that has so many traders suck in losing trades. Then Michael, Merlin, and listeners evaluate a specific stock, before taking a look at where markets may be headed next.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Elliott Wave and Jeffrey Kennedy
episodes.summary: Chief Commodity Analyst at Elliott Wave International, Jeffrey Kennedy joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at how Elliott Wave principles help forecast markets. With his Bestselling book, Visual Guide to Elliott Wave Trading, Kennedy shows step by step implementation of R.A. Elliott’s principles on a variety of charts. This is also done on the show as gold is broken down to show the current selloff coinciding with Wave principles. Later the trio take a look at the Japanese Yen and the S&P 500 for clues as to upcoming direction.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing Markets with Diana Hill
episodes.summary: As housing prices soar and inventories dry up, the housing market is looking better every day. Is this just a short term fad, or is there more to sustain the rally? Diana Hill sheds some light on where these markets may be headed as well as offer some help for a listener looking to get into Rental properties.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bonds & Gold with Dan Sugar
episodes.summary: Veteran trader Dan Sugar joins Merlin for a look at the current status of gold from a technical level, taking into consideration chart patterns and trends as well as supply & demand levels. Later, Focus shifts to the 10-Year bonds which have been experiencing significant price declines and rate spikes. What does it all mean for the markets? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Markets Overview with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Master Instructor Jeff Manson joins Merlin for a look at a variety of asset classes and listener questions. After a quick look at Jeff’s intonation travels, the duo tackle several listener questions ranging from Silver & Gold stocks, to analyzing ways to increase ones win/loss ratio. The AUDUSD is also discussed as the aggressive decline has stalled, but will it rebound? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Fundamentals of Trading
episodes.summary: Most people think if the fundamentals as EPS, ROI, Growth Rates, Management and much more. While that is fundamental to a security, it doesn’t address you! Mark Patrick, Director of Support at Online Trading Academy, talks about some of the processes he and his team work on to help anyone identify their trading path. From trading styles, trading plans, setting goals and objectives, Mark uses a series of worksheets for individuals to have a better understanding of not only what their goals are, but how to best achieve them.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Unwinding the Fed with Mark Thornton
episodes.summary: Senior Fellow with the Ludwig von Mises Institute, Mark Thornton joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a look at the impending Fed move to curtail its market purchases and how they might transition into selling mode. The trio looks at what this might mean for the bond market as well as the housing markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 12 Year Old Traders & Market Timing
episodes.summary: Alex Weisenbach, 12 year old Options trader joins Merlin to share his brief, yet powerful trading experiences with listeners. Later, Tillie Allison joins the show for a look at what is currently happening in the financial markets, as well as a quick look at sector rotation and how it may not be the best option in current market situations

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Diversity of Options with Steve Moses
episodes.summary: Live from his class in San Jose California, Steve Moses joins Merlin for a look at the day’s trading activity and Fed statement. Steve answers several question s regarding options trade planning and what process traders should go through to find the right trade for each situation. The duo also takes a look at trading in retirement accounts as well as Binary Options.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies with Bert Antonik
episodes.summary: Having recently taught classes in Hong King, Singapore and Jakarta, Bert shares some of his thoughts on the current market action. Bert and Merlin take a look at several currency pairs including the Euro, Yen, and Aussie dollar. All of these currencies are approaching very interesting supply and demand zones. Watch Bert and Merlin map them out and give you some potential trading ideas!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading the Equity Markets with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Online Trading Academy’s Chief Education Officer, Sam Seiden, joins Merlin for a look at the latest and greatest on the trading and investing front as Sam and his team have been working nonstop to create cutting edge content. The first big step was the 3-day Market Timing course which introduces people to the Core Strategy taught at Online Trading Academy. From there, students can choose their path to financial freedom. Later Sam talks about his upcoming trip to Australia.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: This solo show is devoted to listener questions as many came on over the last few days. After a look at the macro picture, Merlin talks about the recent report which shows 57% of Americans have less than 25,000 saved for retirement. After outlining steps that we can each take to be ProActive, and plan for the future, he answers several questions ranging from trading plans and stop losses, to short selling.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On the Couch with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: Traders psychologist, Dr. Woody Johnson joins Merlin to help listeners address many challenges they face head on! The Dr. has worked with thousands of traders around the world to break down the core problems facing traders and help them achieve their A-game! The duo tackle several listener questions and offer suggestions to help fix the issues. This show has extensive discussions of fear & greed and how it applies to trading, stop losses, and life in general.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Technology with Stanley Dash
episodes.summary: VP of Applied Technical Analysis at TradeStation, Stanley Dash joins Merlin for a look at what the latest and greatest innovations are with the world’s highest rated trading platform. Stan talks about a new trading product, Mini Options, and what are the basics that traders should know. Later, the duo focus on screening and filtering the markets using radar screener as well as some of the other educational resources available on the TradeStation Website.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bracing for “Seismic Change” with John Kicklighter
episodes.summary: Chief Economic Strategist at Dailyfx.com, John Kicklighter joins Merlin for a look at several major focus for today’s traders. The duo start off by looking at the current market action and the flight to risk aversion which the market has recently demonstrated. This risk aversion could cause significant market moves as traders flock to safer investments such as treasuries and the US Dollar. What does this mean for the markets going forward? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fighting the Fed with Steve Bobbitt
episodes.summary: Steve Bobbitt joins Merlin for a look at the recent market action for clues as to its next move. Several significant events have happened recently which have Steve on a heightened state of alert for the next big move. Merlin and Steve take a look at the overall equity markets as well as a few individual securities including Blackberry, Finisar and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Todd Harrison
episodes.summary: Minyanville.com CEO, Todd Harrison joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for a show filled with heavy socionomic undertones. The tri take a look at several current market trends and social patterns which might shed some light on where the markets are headed. As always, the focus is about risk management and defining your own personal style as a trader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Preparing for the Collapse
episodes.summary: Former broker and lifelong economics geek, Michael “Woody” O’Brian talks about how our financial house of cards is teetering on the verge of collapse, and what everyone should do to prepare for it. This show goes far beyond the financial markets and looks at what live would be like when the fiat money system grinds to a halt. Are you prepared?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Path of an Options Trader
episodes.summary: Cory lane helps break down some options basics from disenchanted traders who took Wade Cook courses many years ago! He stresses the need for several strategies to accommodate all market phases: bullish, bearish, and neutral. Later, Merlin and Corey take a look at Tesla Motors for a listener. What’s the best strategy going forward with this stock? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currency Rundown
episodes.summary: Merlin takes a look at many listener questions pertaining to currencies around the world including: the Aussie, Yen, Pound and Euro. Merlin takes a look at the fundamental situations before diving into the charts for a clearer look at supply & demand levels as well as directional trades.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Adapting to Change with Craig Weil
episodes.summary: In response to a listener question regarding frustrating trading during these choppy times, Merlin invites 35+ year trading veteran Craig Weil to the show to talk about what traders should do in tough market conditions. Craig focuses on several key components including: Risk Management, Adhesion to a trading plan, and money management. With several examples, Craig explains he endured markets like the one we are in with good results. Later the duo take a look at several charts including: Home Depot, Wal-Mart and APOL.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
