The duo takes a look at couple different trading strategies which let you profit in sideways markets, just like Steve did with his Trade of the Week on Priceline. After a few questions about pricing options with Implied Volatility and Historical Volatility, focus turns to the fiscal cliff and the impacts it may have on the market.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies with Brandon Tristan
episodes.summary: Spending most of his day Trading and Mentoring other traders, Brandon Tristan takes some time out of his busy schedule to talk a little about what he is seeing in the markets at this time. Merlin and Brandon take a look at the Euro, Yen, and the Aussie on a variety of time frames. The duo also talks about what to do in preparation for storms or other events which may cause disruption to your trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Market Monday
episodes.summary: Merlin kicks off the week by looking at many listener questions. From Bearish Engulfing formations to the demise of Intel, Merlin analyzes the charts to see where some of the key levels are and what the trades should be. The euro’s strength, the dollar’s weakness, provides some nice trade set ups in the EURUSD and the EURAUD. Knight Capital Group and Research in Motion also get some attention as Merlin discusses why he purchased these two floundering companies.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bullish or Bearish? You Make the Call!
episodes.summary: Jim Puplava and John O’Donnell trade arguments for either side of the bullish/bearish debate. Both make some very compelling arguments that may help you craft a more precise plan for these volatile and uncertain markets. Jim Puplava, Professional money manager, advocates a much more proactive approach to managing ones assets, and using commodities and options to hedge should the markets turn against them. John and Merlin continue the discussion with a final emphasis on 5 key components that every trader and investor should implement to help secure their financial future.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 30 Minutes with the Instructor of the Year
episodes.summary: Live from Disneyland, the Happiest place on earth, Cory Lane joins Power Trading Radio to talk about the use of Options in ones long term investment accounts. This differs from the traditional “Leave it to Beaver” portfolio which goes unmanaged and is based primarily on age. A more proactive approach and market timing techniques can earn investors a better rate of return and help them attain their financial goals. Later, Cory and Merlin take a look at the impacts that the Fiscal Cliff may have on the markets as many will be selling winning trades to capitalize on preferential tax treatment.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Tips from A Pirate
episodes.summary:
Debbie Hague joins Merlin to talk about her “Almost finished” book titled “Trade like a Pirate: 67 Golden Nuggets to simplify your trading”

This book is filled with stories and examples of situations which cause traders to lose money. Merlin and Debbi talk about some of these common pitfalls that almost all traders face, and what can be done to overcome them. Later, the duo take a look at the S&P 500 for a prognosis of the current market and potential trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex Rundown
episodes.summary: Merlin takes a look at several currency pairs for trading opportunities and offering some advice for current listener questions. Currencies include EURJPY, GBPUSD, USDJPY. Other topics include BBY (Best Buy), RGR (Ruger), SWHC (Smith & Wesson) and crude oil inventories. Merlin also talks about some of the common mistakes traders make that causes them to wind up as failed traders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pay it Forward with Joann Farley
episodes.summary: Having struggled for years to find her way as a trader, Joann Farley shares some of the important lessons that have helped her make it as a professional trader. It is this dedication and “Addiction” to helping others that has landed her the instrumental role of helping all the XLT environments work together to help students achieve their financial goals. Joann shares some interesting stories from the XLT room which really go to support the idea that everyone should have a solid trading plan in order to succeed!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Anyone Can Manage Their OWN Money!
episodes.summary: After 3 years of steady declines, Jim Cramer recommended to the world to sell two securities which have dropped nearly 80%. This just goes to show everyone that many industry professionals have NO clue what they are doing. Merlin talks about “The Turtles”, a trading group founded on the principle that you can teach anyone to trade effectively if they have and follow fixed rules. With structured rules, like the ones taught at Online Trading Academy, traders can turn their back on the mainstream media and make educated, calculated decisions with their money. More importantly, traders and investors will know exactly what they are invested in and why! Every trader should have a plan that outlines all their rules and strategies to help them replicate success and achieve their dreams!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Taxmageddon!!
episodes.summary: Michael Atias of OTA Tax Pros joins Merlin for a very important episode on the impacts of the Fiscal Cliff. He points out several things that individuals can do right now in preparation for the impending tax increases. Michael also goes on to outline what traders should be doing to prepare themselves for the end of the year. Stressing that with a little planning and direction, everyone can get better returns with less stress. Later in the show, Michael answers several listener questions regarding incorporating their trading business for added savings or maintaining a sole proprietorship. Merlin discusses the new class on traders taxation designed by OTA Tax Pros as a great way for traders to understand how their specific tax situation should be handled going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday Rundown
episodes.summary: Markets soared on Monday on the heels of a much weaker dollar and better than expected housing data. Merlin Rothfeld looks at several components fueling the rally including the all important Apple, which was up over 7% on the day. Focus turns to dividends as companies move up their dividend payment date to get around the fiscal cliff problems. What impacts does this have for your portfolio? Later, Melrin looks at scans and filters traders can run to get around looking at thousands of stocks each day to find trading opportunities. This evolves into a brief look at Candlestick formation and their usefulness from a traders perspective.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld runs through the mail bag and addresses many burning listener questions pertaining to many aspects of the financial markets. John O’Donnell calls in from Las Vegas where he and Sam Seiden are presenting at the International Money Show. John shares some of his experiences over the past couple days at the show. Later, Merlin talks about his trading style, use of Candlestick formations, and his Forex trading tactics.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Closer to the Edge
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin to talk about the impacts that the “Fiscal Cliff” may have on your portfolio and many other topics. Teaching a Pro Trader class up in Seattle, Tillie is quick to point out that different traders need different goals. She emphasizes that investors need take a bit more bearish stance toward the market, and apply the rule based strategies from Pro Active investing class to minimize damage in down markets. Merlin and Tillie also look at gold and other alternatives for those worried about a demise of the US Dollar as a currency.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How to Make Your Learning Curve a Straight Line
episodes.summary: XLT Instructor and Online Trading Academy graduate Jasmine Wang joins Merlin to talk about some of the great trades and analysis that have been made in the online mentoring program. Jasmine shares her screens, showing us many examples of S&P, Nasadq, Dow, and Dax future setups and trades. From Mastermind community to Pro Picks, Jasmine prides herself on helping traders “Get It”, while learning from the mistakes of those that came before them. She chronicles some of her stumbles along the way, and is happy to share them with the hopes of helping achieve their dreams through trading.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Excellence with XLT
episodes.summary: Nothing helps traders excel in learning faster than having a mentor to guide them. Brandon Tristan, Instructor in the Extended Learning Track, shares some of the recent activity from the premier mentoring program for professional traders. Brandon and Merlin share experiences as young traders and point out some of the advantages the XLT program offers. Later, Brandon offers his thoughts on ZNDUSD, Dollar Index, and even gold.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Markets with Marty Dim
episodes.summary: Live from Castle Rock Colorado, Marty Dim brings his 35+ years of trading experience to the stage of Power Trading Radio. Starting with a Macro view, Merlin and Marty take a look at the election results and offer suggestions where these markets may be headed based off of technical’s with a sprinkle of fundamentals! Next, Apple takes center stage as the Behemoth has tanked 25% over the last 8 weeks. Will it continue? If so, what are the implications for the markets. Later, Marty shares his thoughts on Tick, and other overbought & Oversold indicators.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O’Donnell
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at the dominant issues facing the markets. To start things off, the duo welcomes Larry Jacobs, editor of Traders World Magazine, to talk about the upcoming online expo. Larry informs listeners about a great free online resource where viewers can listen to hundreds of presentations from top traders from around the world. Later John takes a look at the aftermath of the election and the implications for the market going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Is It Too Late To Jump Ship?
episodes.summary: Paul Orme joins the show to talk about the current status of the markets. Over a month ago, every ProActive investor instructor on Power Trading Radio was talking about moving assets to cash in preparation for a market correction. Since then the markets have dropped almost 7%. The looming question is: “Now What”? Is it too late to convert to cash? Or should we be looking for buying opportunities? Paul and Merlin discuss this and several questions from listeners regarding employer stock offers and 401k programs.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Discovering New Toys
episodes.summary: Stanley Dash, VP of Applied Technical Analysis at TradeStation joins Merlin for 2 segments showcasing some very cool features of the TradeStation Trading Platform. Stan talks about filtering time data as well as looking at COT, Commitment of Traders, report to get a better idea of where money is headed in the futures market. He also shows a couple of custom tools he built for COT that are free to TradeStation users. Later, Merlin looks at 2 hypothetical portfolios he built based off of either candidate winning the election. The results after 1 day are pretty surprising! Tune in to find out what the portfolios are and which securities in those portfolios soared with Obama’s victory and Tanked with Romney’s loss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Excellence in XLT
episodes.summary: Jose Balsco, master trader and XLT instructor,  talks about “Location” and what it means to traders of all asset classes. The “Location” or “Curve” is crucial to the planning stages of trades and allows us to quantify risk and reward at multiple points, ultimately settling on one point which offers the best reward/risk ratio. Jose and Merlin also take a look at Multiple Time Frame Analysis, and its uses for different trading styles. Jose gives an example of this with a recent ProPick he made on GBPJPY using longer term time frames. Jose also talks about some of the free seminars he will be hosting for FXCM across the country. To find out more, or to book a seat, call 888-304-8723

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Trading Master Jeff Manson joins Power Trading Radio to talk about his recent interaction with the students of the Mastermind trading community. Jeff glows with pride as he talks about traders teaching themselves, and working in a collaborative environment to perfect their craft and make money! Jeff also walks us through one of his recent ProPicks, and talks briefly about the methodology he uses to make his picks. Jeff and Merlin stress the importance of Multiple Time Frame Analysis, something which Jeff will be presenting in his Hour With The Pros this Thursday.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Peter Navarro
episodes.summary: Producer of the new movie “Death by China”, Professor Peter Navarro joins Merlin Rothfeld & John O’Donnell for a very special edition of Power Trading Radio. Peter talks about his film and the reaction it has been getting from viewers all over the country. Take a look around you right now, how many products are Made In China? Probably most of them! This show focuses on what the impacts of our dependence on China and our manufacturing decline in the USA. For more information on this movie, go tohttp://www.deathbychina.com/

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Doctor Is In The House
episodes.summary: Dr. Woody Johnson helps out traders with some personal trading issues live on this special edition of Power Trading Radio. The Doctor also talks about his recent article in Lessons From the Pro’s, Online Trading Academy’s free weekly newsletter. This article discusses the self journey that many traders go on, and what we can learn from others. Trading is not just a battle of you vs the market, in many cases the toughest battle is you vs yourself! Dr. Woody Johnson and Merlin try to help overcome the personal obstacles.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Markets Back Online
episodes.summary: After being closed for 4 days, the equity markets reopened to a good amount of volatility. However, things are by no means back to normal! Millions are without power and the markets are fueled by limited participants. Craig Weil joins the show to talk about how to quantify risk in all aspects of our trading. Craig briefly touches on the new Futures Trading content taught at Online Trading Academy, and how it has opened the doors for many traders looking for diversity and leverage. Later the duo looks at where the markets may be headed next based off of the current chart setup.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Long Till “You Get It”?
episodes.summary: As Sandy rolls over the east coast, most markets closed as a result. Tillie Allison joins Merlin to take a look at what one needs to do to get over the novice hump and achieve success in trading. Regular listener Erin, has been struggling with consistency issues and reaches out to Tillie and Merlin for help. The duo walk through some of the major issues they faced early on, and offer suggestions to help get over the novice blues. Tillie also talks about her “Hour with the Pros” sessions she has been doing for Online Trading Academy Graduates, which have been getting rave reviews!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The John O' Weekend Show
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell spends some time with Andrew C. "Ranting Andy" Hoffman. Andy Hoffman is the Marketing Director at Miles Franklin Ltd. John also interviews Yaron Brook who is the president and executive director of the Ayn Rand Institute. Join John and his guests for this special weekend edition on Power Trading Radio.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Buy, Sell, or Hold? What to do With Your Home
episodes.summary: Diana Hill helps several listeners out with their housing question. With the recent Fed action, many are wondering what stability that may do to the housing market, and if this will cause prices to rise from here. Diana points out a more significant driver which is inventory. Emphasizing that each market will be different and suggests using specific tools and techniques to find out what your market looks like Next conversation turns to Brokers vs. self selling, and how to get a quality estimate on what your house is worth. Big hint: ITS NOT ZILLOW!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking to the Future
episodes.summary: Dan Sugar joins Merlin for a show full of Risk Management strategies. Several listeners sent in questions illustrating their struggle with stop losses and drawdown’s. The duo talk about what they do to help limit downside risk for several different trading styles. Dan shares his money management techniques with listeners before diving into the S&P500 to identify key Supply and Demand levels that lie just ahead. Both traders offer their insights as to how we should play the market going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Focusing on Forex
episodes.summary: As the election gets closer, international market volatility has been increasing! This show is dedicated to listener questions which have come in over the past few weeks regarding a variety of global currencies. Merlin walks listeners through his trade on the GBPUSD (which he is currently in), illustrating the correlation between the Russell, S&P500 and the US Dollar to help manage the trade. Other currencies include AUD, EURUSD, EURAUD, and several others. Lastly, Merlin shares his methodology for planning trips based off of strong dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Shortening the Learning Curve
episodes.summary: Master XLT Instructor Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin Rothfeld to talk about how his teaching and mentoring is helping traders shorten their trading learning curve. With guidance from XLT instructors, traders formulate specific rules which yield low risk, high probability trading opportunities, while reducing the emotions involved! This is done with the use of Odds enhancers, which is a checklist of specific criteria designed to remove personal opinion and emotion. Gabe talks a little bit about his routine and how much time he dedicates to prep for the next trading day, then the duo dive into a listener question about CNBC stock picks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison sits in for John O’Donnell for this special weekend edition of Power Trading Radio. Highlights include the announcement of the winner for our 3rd Gold Coin giveaway, a brief history of the financial market revolution, and product selection. Tillie and Merlin talk about the differences between traders and the importance of understanding what you are attempting to accomplish early on, and put it in your trading plan.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Analysis with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: Jeff Manson joins Merlin to talk about the Google mistake and the impact it may have on the financial markets and transparency. Jeff talks about some of the seasonal patterns he looks for when making long term investment decisions, sharing with us his CAT comments which he posted on Power Trading Nation. Later, the duo takes a look at the current market situation for potential trading opportunities based off of the S&P500. Jeff also shares with us his forecast for markets going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mentoring with Jose Blasco
episodes.summary: In just a few short years, Jose Blasco has gone from novice rookie trader to the peak of the trading and education pyramid. Nominated for Instructor of the Year at the Online Trading Academy International Conference, Jose spends his days trading and mentoring students in XLT trading rooms and the elite Mastermind Community. This collaboration has helped shape some of the most successful graduates ever! Jose talks with Merlin about some of the analysis he and his colleagues are doing in order to find high probability, low risk trading opportunities. The duo takes a look at several different asset classes and trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Online Trading Academy's International Conference 2012
episodes.summary: For the second straight day Merlin is broadcasting live from the Online Trading Academy International Conference, in Newport Beach California. Steve Misic joins Merlin to talk about a wide assortment of currencies and economic announcements. Steve talks about the current TIC numbers and why they support a much more bullish market going forward. Merlin and Steve talk about several other indicators which are having an impact on current market direction. Later in the show, the duo talk about the Aussie, Euro, Yen, Pound and other currencies including a brief discussion about crosspairs. Tune in and join in the discussion!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mapping Out Trades with Rehman Moledina
episodes.summary: Broadcasting live from the Online Trading Academy International Conference, Merlin Rothfeld and Rehman Moledina pull back the curtain on this years events. Major content changes and educational improvements as well as new social media outlets topped the instructor agenda, with many new announcements to follow. Rehman takes some time to walk listeners through his thoughts on Apple as well as the trades he is currently in. Later the duo talk about Gold, and again, Rehman talks about his outlook for the precious metal as well as share the trade he is currently in with respect to GLD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: As earnings sour, and economic data comes in pointing to economic contraction, Citigroup issues a Strong Buy recommendation for the US Equity markets. Are they onto something, or just looking for a patsy to sell their shares too? John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld take a look at this subject as well as announce the second winner of the Power Trading Radio gold coin contest.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Wealth Management with Tillie Allison
episodes.summary:
Tuesday night, Tillie and the Online Trading Academy in Stamford Connecticut hosted a free, graduate event going over the concepts and principles of ProActive investing. These events are designed to help promote Community, Sharing of Ideas, Enforcement of Discipline, and they are free to Online Trading Graduates. Tillie turns her attention to Emerging markets, addressing a listeners question about EEM, then turns to diversification and commodities to help mitigate the risk of equity heavy portfolios.

Tillie and Merlin also talk about the short setup on the market and how they would approach it in a Long term trading account vs. a short term account.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Gaining Security with Options
episodes.summary: As the market shows signs of topping out, investors are nervous with their long term holdings, and rightfully so! Steve Moses joins Power Trading Radio to help several listeners with their portfolio questions. From buying insurance on a large SPY holding to using complex strategies like Iron Condors, Steve uses clear examples to help the listeners find solutions to their problems. Steve and Merlin emphasize the importance of consistency and probability. Often sacrificing the big, high risk trade for the higher probability, low return trade is the better go for those who want to survive in the trading game.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From Student to Mentor
episodes.summary: Jasmine Wang began her trading career many years ago like most... Struggling! Trying to take the cheap way to success by reading books. She quickly learned that this was not the path to success. Jasmine talks with Merlin about her transition from aspiring trader to full time trader and one of the top instructors in the Online Trading Academy XLT mentoring room. After a walk through of her progression, focus turns to asset classes and the establishing of levels to get a higher probability trade setup. Jasmine also shares her thoughts on the currency markets and the impact of the dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: In Studio with Scott Greer
episodes.summary: Back in 2007, Scott Greer was looking for a career change and found himself in a class at Online Trading Academy. Having applied his education to a real trading account, and following diligently the XLT program, he met his financial objectives in just under 2 years. Scott talks about how he achieved success, and offers listeners some key pointers as to how they can achieve success as well. Scott has also gone on to be a sought after instructor at Online Trading Academy! The duo take a look at the current market for signs as to where it may be headed as well as key buy points. Later, focus shifts to currencies and how to use them as leading indicators for the equity markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Robert Murphy
episodes.summary: Economist Robert Murphy joins John and Merlin to talk about how many of the current “remedies” our government has implemented simply are not working. Before we understand how to fix these problems, we must first identify what the impact of our previous actions has been. This allows us to isolate areas of the economy, adopt a new policy and get things working again. Unfortunately many of the suggestions fly right in the face of the Keynesian economists in power! The trio also takes a look at the gold standard,  and the looming question regarding devaluing currencies and international trade.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What to do with your Portfolio?
episodes.summary: With so many different opinions about where the markets are headed, should you just cash out and wait? Russ Allen joins Power Trading Radio to talk about how true portfolio diversification will help investors regardless of where they think things are headed. Russ and Merlin address several listener questions as they try to help them focus on the correct portfolio allocations and investment ideas. Russ offers his suggestions for those who have not have much saved for retirement, drawing their attention to free online calculators which can help them plan for the future. .The key is, Start Today!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading With Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Purposefully avoiding the news may seem like a bizarre thing for a trader to do, yet Debbie Hague does just that! She focuses on price action and the charts to tell her when and where to trade. Sprinkle on that confirmation tools like Fibonacci, and she has crafted a winning trading style. Merlin and Debbi take a look at High Frequency Trading and weigh the impact of this hotly debated topic on their trading results. Later, a listener question regarding position sizing and scaling out is answered by these 2 veteran traders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The View from the Southern Hemisphere
episodes.summary: Bert Antonik joins Merlin live from his home in Singapore. With the newly opened Online Trading Academy office in Jakarta, Bert has been exceptionally busy teaching and trading. He shares his thoughts on emerging markets with some interesting points about the old school BRIC countries and the emerging CIVITS countries which may shape the future of growth and consumption. Bert also talks about his preference to trade the Euro currency, and offers a hypothesis about where it may be headed in the near future.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Around the World
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison is back on the air after teaching in India for the past 5 weeks. Tillie talks about how she transitioned to trading the Indian markets, which to her surprise, acted just like any other market. Tillie talks briefly about how some traders become frustrated with consolidation & basing, a topic which she will dive much deeper into when she hosts Hour With The Pro’s on October 4th. To wrap things up, Tillie and Merlin give their thoughts on where this market may be headed.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Lew Rockwell
episodes.summary: Lew Rockwell, president and founder of the Mises Institute joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for this engaging weekend edition of Power Trading Radio. Focus points to Keynesian vs. Austrian economic policy and the impact these two economic philosophies have on financial markets. The trio looks at the gold standard, jobs, bond vigilantes and many other topics on this fun filled episode. Tune in and find out where these three stand.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing: Climbing Out of the Deep End
episodes.summary: Diana Hill joins Power Trading Radio to talk about the current status of the housing market. For the last few months, the sun has been shining on housing, with economic data showing increasing prices and stability in many markets around the USA. Does the recent Fed action support a continuation of this trend? Diana and Merlin discuss this topic as well as Diana’s recent article in “Lessons from the Pros” regarding buying houses out of state. We also revisit homebuilder stocks which Diana was openly bullish on for the last 18 months. Is she still Bullish after their 100%+ up move? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading The Plan
episodes.summary: Craig Weil joins Merlin to talk about how he has created, implemented and maintained his trading plan over the years. One issue that is troubling many listeners is “how to get back on track if on a losing streak”. The duo adds their 2 cents on how they personally deal with these issues. Craig goes over a couple rules he has in his plan, as well as giving examples about how he has modified these rules over the years. If you are struggling to get your plan in place, this show will offer you some solid suggestions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: XLT with Brandon Tristan
episodes.summary: Brandon Tristan catches Merlin up on some of the new happenings in the XLT mentoring & Trading environments. Students can now access an area where they can all share their screen with live trades, and work collectively to trade better. This is NOT done alone, as there is generally an instructor in the room to help lead discussions and correcty trading issues. Brandon and Merlin weigh in on a comment from a listener who thinks that traders need to "catch-up" for flat or losing days, thus putting more pressure on them to succeed. Let Power Trading radio know what your thoughts are on this topic! Power Blast your responses to www.PowerTradingRadio.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Kickoff!
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld runs though some of the more entertaining headlines that have piled in over the weekend, and adds his cynical twist as usual. Without a guest in studio, Merlin focuses on listener questions. Topic range from Currencies to Futures, with Merlin adding his thoughts on several positions. More details are also given about the Free Gold Coin Contest.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld introduce the Power Trading Radio gold coin give away! This is a free contest which allows listeners to bid on the price of gold for the coming week and potentially win a free gold coin! The duo also talks about the Fed and the recent announcement of QE3, specifically the MBS portion and how it might impact home builders and the housing market. John points out 2 areas in the market that he is bullish and bearish going forward, which might present some trading opportunities for listeners.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking at the Long Term
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld takes a look at several issues facing investors in these turbulent market times. Are Emerging Markets a good bet going forward? Or should you avoid them like the plague? How does one go about creating sector watch lists to help with relative strength analysis? Should we be paying attention to sector rotation models? Europe slipping into recession? These questions and much more on this packed edition of Power Trading Radio!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Opting For Options!
episodes.summary: Steve Moses helps listeners understand several options strategies which could be very useful in the coming weeks. Topics focus on Married Puts, Credit Spreads, Debit Spreads as well as the current market volatility. These tools, while seemingly complex, present traders with the ability to limit risk and increase rewards. As this market stalls, these strategies could add some protection to your account as well as generate some income should they fall!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies with Steve Misic
episodes.summary: Steve Misic joins Merlin for an in depth look at several major currency pairs. To start things off, Steve offers his opinion about the recent Fed action, and what it means to the dollar. After that, focus shifts to the Euro which has been on a pretty big rally over the 2 months. With the global currency war heating up, will Japan be the next country to dilute their currency with more easing? Steve and Merlin look at this as well as the prominent supply level facing the Pound! Tune in and leave feedback!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Funky Cold Moledina!
episodes.summary: Rehman Monedina joins us from north of the border to share his thoughts on current market conditions and trading activity. Conversation focuses on shorting rallies of extremely strong stocks like Apple. Is this a solid strategy or a crap shoot?!? Then the duo looks at patterns and indicators as decision support tools which helps decision support tools. Last time, Rehman was bullish on the Euro (which rose 800+ pips!!) and SBUX (which rose over 13%)! So what is on his radar this time? Is he bullish or bearish? Tune In and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld for a special weekend edition of Power Trading Radio focusing on the Feds Quantitative Easing initiatives. From step one, the hosts talk about what QE is, and then continue down all 3 rounds of QE and operation twist to gauge their effectiveness. Will Inflation or Deflation be a factor? Will mortgage rates plummet or rise? What will happen to commodities? Tune in and find out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Wealth Management - Check Your Head!
episodes.summary: Markets vault after the much anticipated QE3 is dropped, causing much speculation about what’s next! Dr. Woody Johnson joins the show to handle a wealth of listener question pertaining to traders psychology, and peak performance. Many traders have issues, problems which prevent them from ever reaching the elite level they so desperately seek. The Doctor helps clarify some of the key steps to help identify, address, diagnose, and overcome these common issues.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Opting for Options
episodes.summary: Corey Lane joins Merlin Rothfeld for a look at current market conditions with a focus on Options trading. Several listeners sent in questions talking about selling options at these levels, to which Corey has the opposite opinion. He goes on to point out that one of the tools of an options trader is to sell volatility, which has been very low the last few weeks. Volatility, theta, time decay all come up in this engaging discussion. Corey also shares his personal techniques for trading this market, and ultimately spills the beans about where he thinks it’s going! Tune in to find out more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Breaking Down Global Currencies
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld takes a look at several of the major currencies with a mixed focus of Fundamentals and Technical’s. Currencies include: Euro, Pound, Aussie, Yen, Dollar and the ultimate currency, Gold! Major global news has created some significant swings recently which translate to great low risk, high probability trading opportunities. Listeners also ask about Marriot, Kraft, as well as several questions about profit targets and strategies.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: With her Futures class in tow, Debbie joins Merlin live in the studio to talk about the current media hype. Retail media outlets are running big headlines promoting a very bullish move and talking about how you should be a part of it. Is this just a ploy to get you in before a big selloff? Debbie and Merlin pull from their collective bag of experience to see if a Breakout Trade or Reversion Trade is more suitable in this market environment. Debbie also tackles a listener question about the frequency of trading in relation to a trader’s experience level.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: The market had a huge move this week, and held it going into the weekend. Merlin takes a look at what fueled the rally and offers some thoughts on where it might be headed next. John O'Donnell calls in from San Jose California where he is doing a series of free workshops at the local Online Trading Academy office. John breaks down the 5 key components that people need to improve their probability of success in the markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Is Now the Time for Commercial Real Estate?
episodes.summary: Real estate veteran Diana Hill joins Merlin to talk about some of the pros and cons of investing in commercial real estate. Much like trading stocks, commercial properties have many different segments, and not all are doing well! Later, the duo takes a look at performance of some ETF’s which have clearly been beating the pants off the market with a specific focus on Commercial Properties.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Defining your Niche
episodes.summary: Long time CME floor trader Bob Dunn joins the show to talk about current market conditions and his trading style. Bob is the first to admit that he does not care at all about news, and just trades off of price action. He does this with a unique style of using daily charts to plan out his trades, not 5 minute charts as expected. Bob and Merlin also talk about currencies, futures, and interest rates.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Transforming Lives Worldwide Through Exceptional Trading & Investing Education
episodes.summary: Online Trading Academy COO Gene Longobardi joins Merlin to talk about the undeniable power of education. Whether your learning a different language, computer program, or trading, education only increases your chances for success in life. Trading and investing education is probably the most significant due to the fact that you are essentially running your own business. Mr. Longobardi shares his experiences as well as some of the steps taken to help Online Trading Academy graduates succeed.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Journey to Jackson Hole
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell calls in from Jackson with an update from the Central Bankers love fest! John and Merlin weigh in on Bernanke’s comments, and offer their own realistic ways to get the economy back on track. Job creation has taken center stage for both parties, with pipe dream rhetoric designed to capture votes! John takes a look at what every American should do to empower themselves to secure their financial future, and drop their dependency on the government.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fixing Your Brain
episodes.summary: Dr. Woody Johnson joins the show to help traders and investors with their mental issues. All traders have some entrenched issues that must be dealt with to achieve peak performance. Merlin and the Doctor talk about overcoming the “analysis paralysis” syndrome, fear of losses, and how to overcome personal roadblocks. If you have an issue, send it in and let the Doctor help you out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Opting for Options
episodes.summary: Steve Moses joins Merlin for a show focusing on market nuances during Options expiration week, Volatility and current market analysis. Steve stresses the importance of understanding volatility in the markets and more specifically how Options react to that volatility. While the Vix may help traders understand it a little, there are still inherent problems with Vix that traders should be aware of. Steve also walks listeners through a trade he made with his students in Conneticut today in QQQ.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Money Management and Forex
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld takes a look at “Pyramiding” as a method of scaling into trades. The main emphasis is on proper risk management and following ones plan. Despite the potential for tremendous returns, there is also the possibility for massive losses. Later, focus shifts to the Dollar index and its construction. While not a currency, Oil is back in the spotlight as well with hurricane  Isaac rolling into the gulf. Merlin also looks at the Aussie, Euro and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Best of the Best
episodes.summary: Online Trading Academy Instructor of the Year in 2009 Roger Best joins Power Trading Radio to talk about trading styles and routines. Data analysis was essential for Roger to not only find trading opportunities, but to manage risk as well. From trading times to securities average volume, data told him what was working and what wasn’t. Later, the duo take some listener questions on LRCX and USO.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Gold takes the center stage in the markets, seeing a sharp jump in price in just a few days. Market uncertainty and talks of the “Gold Standard” have fueled this move, and John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld add some clarity to the topic. Today’s show  talks about What the Gold Standard is, why we went on it, why we came off it, and what might happen if we go back on it! The duo also take a look at the potential Greek exit from the Euro and what the fallout might look like.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Tax Plan
episodes.summary: Trading Tax professional Michael Atias joins Merlin for a show dedicated to trader taxation. Listeners get their fix with a bunch of questions ranging from: Do traders really need an LLC, S-Corp, or a C-corp? Which state is best to incorporate in? What is “Trader in Security” status, and how does one get it? And the most important of all, the importance of a taxation plan! If you have any other questions regarding taxation, just send them in for the next time Michael is on the program!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning With Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Over the past few days, many questions have come in regarding how to map out a trading plan. Debi has been working with the Online Trading Academy educational team to implement trade plan materials directly into the course content in an attempt to force students to build their plan. Debi and Merlin discuss some of the details of the new content, as well as what students should do on their own. Later focus shifts to the current low liquidity markets and modifying ones trading plan to accommodate.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: When Global Currencies Matter
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld takes a look at why currencies matter, especially to those who have no interest in trading them. This will hit especially hard for those who are planning trips outside of US borders! Topics on this show range from trade planning, to using decision support tools to help improve probability. Merlin also takes a quick look at the Yen, and Canadian dollar per listener requests

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On Set With Darek Zelek
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld is joined live in the studio by Darek Zelek who is in Irvine California this week teaching ProTrader. With a live studio full of students, Merlin and Darek talk about the mood in Europe as Darek recently returned after a month of travel. After a discussion of how this may impact domestic markets, focus turns to a listener question regarding placing orders online. This blossoms into a discussion about: Analysis, Planning, Execution, Management. Topics also include Apple’s record breaking feat and trajectory, Facebook and the end of insider share lockup.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Ambassador of Opportunity & Ranting Andy Hoffman
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell Inverviews “Ranting Andy” Hoffman on Precious Metals and Why Gold? Why Now? Role of fiat money vs real money and the Dow/gold ratio, gold/silver ratio, etc.  Foreign vs domestic storage plans pro/cons.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning for the Future
episodes.summary: Paul Orme joins Merlin for a show that looks at some new disclosure rules which will give you a better look at what you are paying in fees to the company which manages your 401k. These rules should be an eye opener for employers as well as employees! These fees have been eating away at your returns for years, far more than you might have thought. Then the discussion turns to dividends and the looming question of their use in your portfolio. Its your future, plan for a good one!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodity Spotlight
episodes.summary: Commodity expert Don Dawson joins the show to talk about some of the current happenings with copper, coffee, and several others. This show is focused on knowing the contract specifications for your contracts so as to not take on more risk than necessary. Things like Limit Up/Down, Margin, Spreads can reap havoc on new traders who are ill prepared for their asset! Tune in and find out what you should be looking for.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Market Analysis
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld hosts a solo show focusing on risk management and currencies. After a look at the overall market trading activity on Tuesday, Merlin shifts his focus to some listener questions regarding Trading the Pound, Aussie, Dollar Index and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From Account Manager to Private Trader
episodes.summary: Rehman Moledina shares the story of his journey from working with a very large financial firm, overseeing clients accounts, and ultimately transitioning to trading his own account with consistency. Rehman walks us through some of the trades he is currently in, pointing out why he is in the position, as well as where he feels it might head. After tackling a listener question regarding Options on SPY, SH, SSO, SDS, attention turns to currencies and the plight of the Euro.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell joins Merlin Rothfeld for our weekly roundup of some of the issues facing the market. Gold and precious metals tell us significant information about which way the markets are headed, but not all metals are the same. Rolling on, John points out some of the recent housing market statistics that Gary Shilling recently released which point to more downside movement, to the tune of 20%. Going forward, the markets promise to add more moves, volatility and opportunity for all who know the rules!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning for the Future with Bob Heitner
episodes.summary: ProActive Investor Instructor Bob Heitner talks about the outdated methodology of investing using traditional portfolio theory, adding that different times call for different tools. Merlin and Bob talk about a hybrid system which incorporates Options and taboo topics like Market Timing. Focus shifts to the pros and cons of diversification followed up with results from the PAI XLT mentoring room. Proof that consistency is one of the cornerstones of account growth.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Dipping into the Mail Bag
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld dedicates an entire show to answering listener questions. Topic range from Habits of Highly successful trader to Establishing Supply & Demand Levels, Risk-on/Risk-off markets to Shadow Economies, Trading Gaps and Market Correlation. If you have questions, send them in at www.PowerTradingRadio.com

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Evolution of Markets with Trey Lazzara
episodes.summary: Long time market insider Trey Lazzara joins Merlin to share some the changes he has witnessed over the last 15 years. Trey started as the chief technical officer on the largest retail trading floor in the western US before moving on to start his own brokerage firm. During that time, he also became proficient at trading Options, Futures, Stocks, and currencies. Trey talks about some of the automated systems and trading strategies that he offers his clients, all displaying actual trading results, not hypothetical profits. The duo also talk about some of the problems with some Forex trading firms and the fact that they take the counter of your trade. Trey works with reputable firms who offer cutting edge software and execution such as FXCM and NinjaTrader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Face to Face with an XLT Master
episodes.summary: Back in the Classroom, Gabe Velazquez joins Merlin for a show focusing on common trading problems, and mentoring. Gabe has spent significant time mentoring students in the Online Trading Academy XLT program, as well as writing articles for financial publications including the award winning “Lessons from the Pro’s”. Gabe talks about what happened on this very calm Monday trading session, as well as what were some of the major his students were experiencing with regards to Order entry and routine. Gabe and Merlin tackle many listener questions ranging from Wal-Mart, Oil, S&P 500 and much more!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Dr. Tom Woods
episodes.summary: NY Times bestselling author Dr. Tom Woods shares his vast financial market insight with John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld with a primary focus on bubbles. Mr. Woods new film due out in September, “The Bubble Film” offers answers for many of the problems Americans currently face and is chocked full of prominent market figures such as: Ron Paul, Peter Schiff, Jim Rogers, Doug Casey and much more. Later, John and Merlin break down the role of the Federal Reserve and some of the misconceptions pertaining to it. Great content, and ample laughs for the weekend edition!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Buying In The Top 10 Housing Markets
episodes.summary: Diana Hill talks about her latest article in “Lessons from the Pro’s” regarding the “Ten Top Metro Areas to Buy Real Estate”. Whether looking for a personal home or an investment property, these cities offer some attractive benefits which should keep prices stable at the least. Merlin and Diana look at these factors and talk about a couple other areas which are appealing depending on what you’re looking for. After taking a listener question regarding Short Sales and how to do them, the discussion turns to REIT’s as potential investment vehicles as opposed to buying physical property.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Madness and EOM Trading
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins Merlin to talk about how she is trading the markets with all the news flooding the street. More importantly, which news is relevant, and which to ignore. Later, Tillie talks about how she sets up her EOM (End of Month) trade. This trade utilizes some predictable market variables to help set up a high probability, low risk trade. To round things out, the duo take several listener questions live on the air to help shed some light on their concerns.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Calm Before the Storm
episodes.summary: Steve Misic joins the show to take a look at the impending announcements from a variety of big countries! The Bank of England, European Central Bank, Federal Reserve will all be creating waves this week, the question is how big, and which direction! After giving their hypothesizes of what the news will entail, Steve and Merlin move on to look at Supply and Demand levels and why they hold for long periods of time, as well as indicators which may help support these key levels. Later, Steve gives his thoughts on the Yen and the Euro for trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing with Jeff Manson
episodes.summary: While out in California teaching a Futures class, Jeff takes a little time out to come up and join Merlin in the studio of Power Trading Radio. Merlin prods for details on how Jeff trades weeks like the current one, which is filled with Major significant announcements. Jeff stresses following your trading plan, and passing up on opportunities which are too speculative. Using things like Globex session, tick charts, Fibonacci and more help him map out all aspects of his trades from entry & Stop losses, but also forecasting targets as well. Join us for an informative show! PowerPick: CL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Special guest Daniel Amerman, CFA joins the show to talk about the trends in Debt, Growth, Population and much more. The data shows clear market trends which we have seen many times in the past. 26 times since 1800 to be precise. John O’Donnell & Merlin Rothfeld look at the numbers and try to offer some insight as to how to use the data to profit, regardless of your trading style. Later, John and Merlin talk about Copper and their outlook on the industrial metal, as well as offer suggestions to some listeners on what to do with an inheritance.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On The Couch With Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: The Doctor is in the house for this Psychology filled show! Merlin and Dr. Woody run through a series of listener questions in an attempt to help listeners overcome their trading demons.  Topics include: Trading Live vs. simulated trading, trading with fear, taking profits too early, following your rules and creation of a trading plan. If you have questions that you would like answered, send them in on the website at www.powertradingradio.com by clicking the Power Blast button. We will save these questions for the next visit with Dr. Woody Johnson.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Earnings and Options
episodes.summary: Steve Moses joins Merlin Rothfeld for an options filled show in the peak of earnings season. Steve touches on some of the uses of options to help determine what the market perception is going forward. While not necessarily looking at Put/Call ratio, there are other items which offer a clearer picture. The duo also look at the recent earnings of Apple and Netflix, ultimately focusing on Netflix for a potential Long trade based off of some historic lows. Merlin also answers a listener question about how to add Data to the trend tool within TradeStation.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: For The Love of Money!
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld hosts and stars as his guest of the day on this 1 hour show dedicated almost entirely to currency trading. Merlin tackles several listener questions pertaining to a variety of currencies, including: EURUSD, AUDUSD, USDCHF, USDJPY, GBPUSD, and more. While going over these pairs, he sprinkles them with current fundamental news which may impact their trading. Tune in and find out what the next key levels are!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forecasting with Futures
episodes.summary: Steve Bobbitt steps out of his ProTrader class in Phoenix to talk with Merlin Rothfeld about some predictive tools for trading equities. Steve points out some key levels that we hit today on the Globex session that were instrumental in the reversals. This is a procedure that traders should look at daily to help identify turning points in all asset classes. Later, the duo talks about the uses of Fibonacci levels, which also played an interesting role in todays trading activity. Lastly, a listener asks about the NASDAQ 100 and its potential gap fill potential. Merlin and Steve trade their opinions and much more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Elliot Wave & Socionomics
episodes.summary: Peter Kendall of Elliot Wave International joins John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld for the Weekend Edition of Power Trading Radio to talk about Elliot Wave principles. These waves not only impact the financial markets, but can be applied to social elements like Music, Art, Movies and more. This discussion of Socionomics looks at how these trends are working now and how they may drive markets going forward.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Volatility and Adaptation
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison discusses how she looks at volatility, which is slightly different that most! Approaching it from a different angle allows her to filter for risk and reward prospects which might make a nice addition to the investment portfolio. This portfolio is most certainly using options to help buy these positions at prices that may be lower than the security actually traded! Got to love premium! Later, Tillie and Merlin discuss the uses of indicators to build a rule based strategy which removes the “thinking” process, and turns the investor or trader into an strictly rule based trader.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Hardball with HAL 9000
episodes.summary: Crowd favorite, Debbie Hague is back to talk to Merlin about the Futures and Commodities markets! Before diving into this topic Debbie talks about her recent computer crash and steps that she has put in place to ensure that she does NOT miss ANY trading! This is an important piece of information that everyone should incorporate into their trading plan as our livelihood depends on a computer! Later the duo discuss commodities trading as opposed to Index futures. Debbie definitely has her preference, tune in and find out what it is, and what she thinks about the markets going forward!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currency Markets Live from Singapore
episodes.summary: Bert Antonik joins Merlin Rothfeld for a show filled with Global Currencies and Gold! Bert starts off with is thoughts on the euro (his last call in April was “euro @ 1.22”), offering new targets for the tanking currency. Gold has become increasingly in demand by Central Banks around the world, but is their timing off? Charts done lie! Bert and Merlin look at a couple charts to support the Central Banks “mistiming” on gold, and offer insight to where gold may be headed. To round out the show, the duo run through a bunch of currency charts plotting out the next supply and Demand levels where price will most likely turn.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Secrets of a Level 2 Master
episodes.summary: Since the late 1990’s, Roger Best has been making hundreds of trades per week based off of what he was seeing in the Level 2 screen and short term chart time frames. Merlin Rothfeld gets Roger to break down some of the realities and misconceptions about using Market Depth to help make trades. Roger discusses “Patterns” in the Level 2, something which the vast majority overlook when utilizing this resource. While definitely not as powerful as it was 10 years ago, there are still some valid uses for Level2. Tune in and find  out what they are!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell wrap up an eventful week with a look at the key numbers coming out of China which indicate a slowdown, and even better, the increasing possibility that China step up its actions to stimulate their markets to boost growth. Later, John fields a question about Municipal bonds and the risk they pose as a wave of bankruptcies flow through California and potentially other states.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing Market 2012 – Boom or Bust?
episodes.summary: Diana Hill joins Merlin to talk about some of the major changes in the housing market including the landmark National Mortgage Settlement and its many provisions which may help those suffering with underwater mortgages. After a look at the most recent housing data and a breakdown of trends, Diana and Merlin dive into a listener question regarding web page and newspaper articles. Should one really follow what the media is saying about “10 Best Housing Markets” or “15 Best Cities for Jobs”? Often, just like when trading stocks, once the news hits the street, its already too late! Diana talks about her online real estate class which provides much more reliable data sources to help you in your decision.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodity Continuation
episodes.summary:
Craig Weil and Merlin Rothfeld continue on with the discussion started on Tuesdays show with Bill Henner regarding commodities. Craig points out some of the amazing moves that can yield tremendous returns for those with a good plan and discipline. In his experience, Craig feels that Momentum Breakout trades work very will in commodity markets, presenting fewer whipsaws and false breakouts often seen in equity markets. To round out the show, Craig offers his insight into where these markets are headed  going forward.

PowerPick: APOL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Dollar Dilemma
episodes.summary: Bill Henner and Merlin Rothfeld focus on the ticking time bomb over in Europe, analyzing the Euro chart for key levels which might make for great targets and better shorting opportunities. This global fear is driving more people to go long the US Dollar, thus creating significant waves in global commodities. Bill and Merlin try to break down how this Dollar ascent will impact tangential markets, and where the trading opportunities lie.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Testing Your Skills With an Indicator Quiz
episodes.summary:
Merlin welcomes Bruce Milbury to the program to talk about his frequent Power Trader Nation posts which include a chart quiz. The quizzes are designed to help traders think objectively and look at price from a variety of different perspectives, thus adding to their understanding about where price may go. Bruce talks about several of his Blog entries before turning to his upcoming blog regarding Triangle patterns and their many uses in trading. Later, the duo address a listener question regarding PFGBest and the potential disaster with the freezing of clients accounts. Bruce shares his stories as a former MF Global client and why he switched to his current broker, while Merlin presents his tactics for spreading money around.

PowerPick: LRCX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell break down Johns consistent opinion that we should be shorting unsustainable rallies. For many months, he has been talking about XHB, yet listeners want to know more. The duo take a look at some of the levels on the index, then break it down further to the individual components of the index for additional trading opportunities. As the dollar keeps its upward trajectory, John and Merlin take a look at many securities which may be pummeled by a rising dollar. Oil, Gold, Silver, Copper and the Euro! Tune in to find out which trade looks best for you!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading With Tillie
episodes.summary: Back from a great class in London, Tillie Allison and Merlin Rothfeld discuss current market events and their impact on the financial markets, both long term and short. Tillie walks us through some trades that she made in her personal account while teaching over in London, in several different asset classes. After a great listener question about Options and their use in Proactive Investing, the duo focus on what the market may hold for them for the remainder of the year.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex For the 4th
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and Justin Krebs break down the subtle scanning and filtering differences between the equity and currency markets. Merlin outlines some of the TradeStation tools he looks at to scan the equity markets while Justin presents a much easier approach. With the holiday week upon us, the duo looks at how they trade the short, illiquid week. Later Justin and Merlin break down their thoughts on the Euro and Yen.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What Does Your Filter Look Like?!?
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld & Debbie Hague address a common listener quest regarding how they filter the vast universe of stocks to find trading opportunities. Merlin looks at TradeStation for assistance, using several simple scans built into the Radar Screen, while Debbie uses a variety of websites to find relative strength within sectors then picks the best candidate to trade. The duo take a look at PEP for a potential reversal at weekly supply levels, then move onto talk about some specific details about how many trades they make. Ultimately, they both feel this week will be a very light one due to the 4th of July holiday. So be careful out there traders!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Getting Tasty with Tom Sosnoff
episodes.summary: The special guests on Power Trading Radio just keep on coming! Think or Swim founder, and CEO of Tastytrade.com Tom Sosnoff joins the show to talk about his trading experiences and the markets. The show starts with John and Tom talking about the hotbed of startup activity going on in Chicago right now, as investors and entrepreneurs seek to find the next Facebook. Later Tom sheds some light on what it was like for him as a floor trader, and the transition to screen based trading. To wrap things up, the trio looks at the importance of community and how it has helped them progress as traders. Tom ends things with a quick look at what he sees happening in the major markets including: Gold, Oil, S & P 500, and the Dollar.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Roadmap To The Revolution
episodes.summary: In this special show, John O’Donnell welcomes the President of the Ayn Rand Institute, Yaron Brook, to discuss the current political system and what Ayn Rand principles have to add. Yaron and John take a look at many of the pressing problems like Obamacare and offers some solutions which all involve a dramatically diminished role in our day to day lives. The show revolves around freedom, liberty, accountability and the understanding that we must take action before its to late.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A look at Commodity Futures
episodes.summary: While the markets ebb and flow, Commodities are posting some ridiculous swings, far greater in percentage basis than the equity market. With heavy pressure from the dollar, global demand, and environmental factors, this volatility will continue to provide a riskier but much more lucrative market. Bill Henner joins the show to talk about the current drought in the Midwest and how it might impact crops like corn and soybeans. Bill also touches on his experience on the CME and CBOT and how those environments gave you a much more transparent view of what was really moving the market. As he transitioned from the trading floor to screen based trading, changes had to be mad, but the lessons remained the same! PowerPick: TFU12, IWM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Facebook Float & Global Currencies: What You Need to Know
episodes.summary: Addressing a listener question, Merlin starts things off with a look at the Facebook IPO and some interesting details that anyone holding FB shares should take into consideration. Much of which is not very talked about in the industry and may actually lead to further decline in share price. Later, questions pour in regarding currencies which Merlin tackles one by one including: EURO, Yen, Pound and more. Much of the global turmoil is still squarely focused on Europe, which appears to be getting more bad news every day. This negative pressure could continue to push traders to buy the US dollar thus pushing domestic equity prices down even further.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Trend is Your Friend! But Which Trend?!?
episodes.summary: As the international markets get hit more bad news and fear, US equities also take a hit.
