episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Donkey of the Day Monday!
episodes.summary:
With a weekend of boneheaded actions from politicians, bankers and football players, we had to have an extended segment of Donkey of the Day!  After an extended opening rant, Merlin is joined by 3rd generation CME floor trader Bill Henner. Bill walks listeners though his last 25 years of experiences and discusses the difficulties he encountered when transitioning from pit to screen based trading. Later, Bill and Merlin break down the current action of the SPY, EURO and natural gas companies.

PowerPick: SHLD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Houses and Jobs, Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Herb Meyer, author of The Cure For Poverty, joins the show to talk about how most Americans don’t clearly understand “the Operating System” of the US, especially when it pertains to creating jobs and promoting entrepreneurship. He discusses some solutions and ways that we can stabilize the job market and get America pumping again. Diana Hill is up next with a look at the current housing markets, and walks us through several of the new legislative issues coming at the housing market. Diana walks through what are some of the impacts you will face with these new laws. PowerPick: BAM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Population Problems
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell Sits down with the founder and CEO of Online Trading Academy, Eyal Shahar.  We get Eyal's insight on starting the company and an insiders look at what is to come in the future.  John also discusses the world's current population problems.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: John O'Donnell's Golden Hour
episodes.summary: Guest host and Chief Knowledge Officer at Online Trading Academy John O'Donnell and special guest Steve Bobbitt discuss gold and the current state of our markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Currencies from Abroad
episodes.summary: So many of take the news at face value, however we don’t necessarily see it from a viewpoint that is Outside of the US. Media twists and public opinions can be dramatically different! Sam Evans, XLT instructor, joins the show live from London, after a long day of mentoring and trading. Sam talks about the current mood over in the UK which, from his perspective, is very different than our media makes it out to be. Merlin and Sam take a look at both long & short term charts on the Cable and Euro, in the hopes of planning out some future trades. PowerPick: AUDUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Trading Monday
episodes.summary: Merlin walks listeners through the 7-Pillars of Trading, and answers a listeners question about which one is most important. Later, John Barrett joins the show to talk about some of the more common mistakes he sees traders make and what to do about it. Moving on John talks about the importance of having a couple trading styles so that traders can adapt to a variety of different market conditions. Both hosts give out examples of trading styles they witnessed on their trading floors that were very successful for their time, but faded as time progressed. PowerPick: ESRX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell joins Merlin for the weekly rundown of the pressing market issues were for the week, and tackle a variety of listener questions. Volatility continued to persist, and given the problems with Europe, they could get much more wild. John talks about Gold as a hedge for any upcoming market selloff, and offers listeners a CD of his recent presentation in Pasadena California entitled “Why Gold, Why Now?”. From A fall in foreclosure rate to Italian Mafia, this edition of Power Trading Radio has it all!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading With Tillie Allison
episodes.summary: Coming to us from the snowy tundra of Kansas City, Tillie joins Merlin for a show filled with listener questions and market analysis. Listeners looking for direction with Fibonacci usage are treated to a Fibonacci CD giveaway and chart analysis as the duo helps fix their problems. Later Tillie talks about some great experiences which occurred during her class today regarding order routing and live trading. PowerPick; STZ

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Battle of the Sexes, who makes the better trader?
episodes.summary: After a recent article by Sam Seiden titled “Who Makes a Better Trader, Men or Women?”, Merlin decides to take that question to the front lines, with Professional Female trader Debbie Hague. Among the desirable attributes which make women better traders are: Risk Aversion, Patience, Humility, and the Ability to admit you are wrong. Debbie and Merlin site these as key factors which make women better traders. Debbie also talks about an important lesson she learned in the XLT program regarding adjusted data on futures contracts and how it distorts price history depending on what symbol you are looking at. Finally the duo look at the current market in regards to the S&P500 for some insight into where we may be headed. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Markets with Justin Krebs
episodes.summary: After some fantastic calls over the past few months on currencies like the Aussie and Loonie, Justin Krebs returns to Power Trading Radio to discuss some of the current movements in the US Dollar and how it is impacting global markets. Justin and Merlin tackle a listener question about the relationship between gold and the dollar before moving on to explain the differences between spot forex & forex futures. Finally the duo looks at several currency pairs from a technical perspective as Justin walks listeners through his recent trades on AUDUSD and USDCHF.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: For the Love of Money
episodes.summary: As the classic O’jays songs says, “Almighty Dollar… Don’t let money change you!” Darek Zelek joins Power Trading Radio to talk about the recent move in the dollar and its potential impact on the global equity markets. From his perspective, the equity markets could see a nice rally up over the next few days before beginning a much more significant and drawn out sell off over the next few months, and it all revolves around the dollar! After addressing a listener question about USO and global oil crisis, Merlin and Derek talk about relative strength, with an example on IYR and SPY. PowerPick: XLI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell chats with Victor Gruauag from Online Trading Academy and shares his two cents about the market.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tax Season Kick Off Show
episodes.summary: As the new year starts, all traders should already be thinking about getting their taxes done. Trader Tax professional Michael Atias of OTA Tax Pro’s joins the show to answer listener questions about a wide variety of taxation topics. Michael covers some of the primary criteria the IRS is looking as far as establishing “Trader Status”, as well as some of the reasons traders should think about setting up a trading entity early on in their career. PowerPick: AGU

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Show Me Your Crystal Ball!
episodes.summary: Special guest and XLT instructor Brandon Tristan joins Power Trading Radio to share some of the tools he uses to help forecast the market’s direction. Many use things like S&P futures, or indicators to help assist them. Brandon uses something much bigger and far more powerful! The Dollar Index! The duo analyze the current action of the Dixie, and help explain what its implications mean for traders regardless of their trading time frame. Later Merlin sparks a discussion on OCO orders, the USDJPY and relative market strength.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: New Years Kick off
episodes.summary: Mike McMahon and Merlin Rothfeld start off the new year with a look at some of the classic historical events that have pinpointed significant market turning points. Namely, mad media articles and publications boasting one thing, and actually leading to the opposite. Traders must be aware of how news impacts the markets and specifically, each asset class. Merlin takes a look at the current PMI and Construction numbers as a possible catalyst for future upside movements, but cautions on the broader negative picture. Later, the duo takes a look at the Aussie dollar and the Euro for trading opportunities. PowerPick: DECK

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing and Fibonacci
episodes.summary: As the year winds down, many questions have come in regarding Market Timing and Fibonacci tools. Master trader Jeff Manson joins Power Trading Radio to discuss his trading style and the unique way he uses readily available tools to plan and execute his trades. The duo talk about moving averages in conjunction with Fibonacci extensions as well as retracements to help pinpoint entries, stops and targets. More importantly, when multiple pieces line up and confluence is present, the trading risk can be reduced even further. Jeff also talks about his Live Trading Event in San Jose and New York in January. To find out more information, click here: http://bit.ly/bN7tsL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Looking Back at 2011, and Forward to 2012
episodes.summary: As 2011 quickly comes to an end, Tillie and Merlin take a look at a couple of standout items from the past year. Volatility & Uncertainty dominated the market, leading investors to run to bonds. Will this uncertainty continue in 2012? Tillie also breaks down some important correlation factors between Gold, Oil, S&P and Bonds. Later in the program, Tillie touches on how rebalancing portfolios is paramount in achieving a pre determined rate of return on your investments.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From Bartender to Bad A$$!
episodes.summary: Early on in her life Joanne Farley learned the importance of discipline and rules. Her jobs as a bartender taught her many ways to implement discipline on her patrons, and as a Trader & Mentor, she still finds ways to help others find their way. Joanne and Merlin talk about her rise to prominence in the Online Trading Academy community not only as one of the top instructors, but also the invisible hand behind the scenes of the XLT mentoring program. Discipline and rules have been her keys to success, and she has no problem sharing that with Power Trading Radio! Joanne also backs up her conversation with recent examples right out of the XLT live trading session.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Market Giveth, the Market Taketh
episodes.summary: In a dramatic reversal of market behavior, markets shot dramatically to the upside leaving many frustrated with the erratic behavior. Merlin and Mike McMahon tackle several question relating to the topic before diving into several segments on Price behavior and Technical Analysis. Rounding out the show, the duo looks at a few currency pairs using several technical indicators.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Picking Monday
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by XLT instructor Brandon Tristan for a show filled with market psychology and stock analysis. To start things off, Merlin and Brandon talk about market patterns and actions around holidays. Both share their routines and trading thoughts for end of year trading, then move on to current market analysis. The duo then tackles a variety of listener questions on several Equities, including: KOG, SWKS, GOOG, AMAT, IVN, ZNGA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with Tom Sosnoff
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell, Merlin Rothfeld and Tom Sosnoff take a walk down memory lane as they talk about the innovations that have shaped the landscape of the financial markets over the last 20+ years. Technology, transparency, and efficiency have leveled the playing field for traders and given them powerful tools to compete in the markets. According to Sosnoff, “If you can order a pizza, you can trade.” The trio go on to talk about social networks and how community plays a major part in the development of traders.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Year End Housing Market Wrap Up
episodes.summary: Diana Hill joins Merlin for a year end review of the current status of the Housing Markets. Diana talks about recent reports about the increase in Women buying real estate as well as other trends that are adding stability to the market. After a listener question about “Nontraditional” sources of funding to buy a home, the duo dives into a variety of market statistics which support current talk about stability in housing prices and growing confidence.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Markets Wicked Ways
episodes.summary: Commodities took a pretty big hit as the dollar continued to surge. This move sent the equity markets down over 1%, and momentum looks like it will continue. Craig Weil, 37 year trading veteran, weighs in with his thoughts on the current market behavior. Over the years he has seen his share of volatile markets, is this one any different? Craig and Merlin take a look at Gold as well as S&P futures to look for key levels where the slide may stop.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Surging Dollar Crushes the Markets
episodes.summary: The market tanked on the FOMC statement, as traders were expecting a little more support from the Fed. This sent the dollar index through key resistance levels and surging upward to the next. Mike McMahon joins the show to talk about how the dollar is impacting global currency markets like the Euro, Aussie Dollar and Yen. Mike and Merlin map out key levels and zones which may pose problems for global currencies going forward. PowerPick: ESV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From Student to Master
episodes.summary: Former Online Trading Academy graduate, Brandon Tristan, walks us through his trading career and some of the twists and turns he has faced along the way. After completing the ProTrader course, Brandon went on to assist in the XLT, Extended Learning Track, where he became one of the favorites! After seeing a significant impact on his account from following rules and helping others Brandon talks about mentoring and his role in the process.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at the weeks market numbers for signs of strength or weakness going forward. Of particular interest is the S&P 500 and its recent attacks at overhead price levels. John also takes a look at some international events moving our markets, and what the prognosis is going forward. The volatility continues, creating havoc for investors, but a fantastic environment for short term traders. PowerPick: SFLY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trader Taxation Special
episodes.summary: Due to overwhelming demand for advice on trader taxation, Power Trading Radio brings on an expert in the matter. Michael Atias, Director of Tax Services at OTA Tax Pros, joins the show to share a broad overview of some of the pros and cons associated with declaring trader status or maintaining individual status. Michael and Merlin discuss a wide variety of topics including: Corporations, 401k’s, wash sale rules, Mark-to-market accounting, writing off losses, and much more. PowerPick: URBN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Futures with Debbie Hague
episodes.summary: Merlin and Debbie start right off by breaking down the current action of the S&P 500 futures which have had a few days of struggle at present levels. The duo talks about the relative strength of the current impulse moves to the downside, as well as the current erosion the current overhead supply level. Later in the show, focus turns to the importance of a trading plan, and what really goes into it.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Amateur Laments, The Pro Moves On
episodes.summary: Merlin and Justin Krebs talk about how a true professional trader does not look back at a trade that missed their entry by a tick. Instead, they feel confident that they followed their plan and move on to the next trade. To many traders whine and moan about a missed trade, get over it and find the next one! After handling a couple of listener questions on Financials and proper stop execution, Justin talks about his current ProPick on the AUDUSD, as well as the impact of Oil and interest rates. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Good News or Bad? How Do You Know?
episodes.summary: Marty Dim joins Power Trading Radio to shed some light on what news to watch and what to discard. As the markets evolve, some information becomes more relevant than others, and it can change quickly! The duo also talk about why some ETF’s don’t accurately track the underlying indexes, then ultimately take a look at the current market for clues on where its headed: PowerPick KLAC

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell wrap up the trading weeks activity and discuss many of the lingering topics impacting our markets. Of particular interest is a report that 1 in 4 fund managers beat the market this year. Pretty Pathetic! PowerPick: WSM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Take a Deep Breath and Follow Your Plan in These Volatile Markets
episodes.summary: Guest Bob Heitner shares some excerpts from his Proactive Investor course which emphasizes following a strict set of rules regardless of market conditions. Using his tools, Bob is always in 1 of 2 modes: Bull or Bear. Whichever market condition his indicator indicates, he applies that strategy and stays with it until the indicator changes back to the other direction. This proactive approach allows you to catch 80% of the upside move and miss 80% of the downside move with a simple to follow strategy using a variety of asset classes. Bob shares a little of his thoughts on the European situation and its potential impact on our markets. PowerPick: ESV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Boys and their Toys
episodes.summary: Merlin interviews Steve Bobbitt, long time futures trader, who is in Atlanta teaching a TradeStation Platform Immersion class. The duo talk about their favorite functions of the software and how to use them. Later, Steve shares with listeners how he uses multiple markets to help navigate these extremely volatile times. Professional traders should look for areas where volatility is not as problematic, thus providing less whipsaws and more consistent trading results. Steve also talks about he uses relative strength to help him find the best markets and prime trading opportunities.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Calm Before the Storm
episodes.summary: A slurry of brewing headlines have the markets jittery, and poised for some big moves. Japanese unemployment & Intervention, Europe debt worries, and Dollar strength tops the list of market moving headlines which Merlin Rothfeld and Mike McMahon try to break down into their specific market moving parts.  The duo looks at each currency with a technical perspective as well as a fundamental one to give insight into where they see the currencies headed. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: After the Food Coma
episodes.summary: The post Thanksgiving festivities continue, as the financial markets posted significant gains on the heels of European optimism, as well as robust retail sales numbers. One has to wonder if the retail numbers were not skewed by loss leader prices at many retailers. Tillie Allison joins the show to talk about market timing and sector rotation as it applies to current markets. Tillie talks about how active traders need to apply a solid, proven strategy to their trading. In her case, she is using a bear market strategy currently.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Thanksgiving Special
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell break down some of the bigger pressing market issues on this weekend edition show. Rising food costs, Manufacturing slowdowns, European debt crisis and many other topics are covered all with an emphasis on building a strategy for the coming move. Which every way you think the markets will go, you need to have your road map drawn out in advance! Happy Thanksgiving!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: It’s Much More Than Supply & Demand
episodes.summary: Merlin starts things off by looking at a misconception of securities being Undervalued, and the danger they pose. By looking for proper supply and demand zones, traders can get past urges to buy just based off of perceived value. Sam Seiden talks about how these levels are determined, but reiterates that there are 11 odds enhancers that are only taught to his students at Online Trading Academy. PowerPick: MASI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Perspectives with Fibonacci
episodes.summary: Back from the Las Vegas Traders Expo, Merlin recaps the first day of the shortened thanksgiving trading week. With few domestic highlights moving the markets, traders looked to the fragile European markets for guidance, bringing the US equity markets down. Scot McCormick, CMT, joins the show to share some of his technical analysis knowledge with listeners, diving into one of his favorite tools Fibonacci. Scott looks at the S&P 500 from an Impulse/Correction perspective and ties that into current Fibonacci levels to give us an indication as to where markets are headed. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from the Las Vegas Traders Expo Day 2
episodes.summary: Once again Merlin Rothfeld brings Power Trading Radio to the Las Vegas Traders Expo 2011.  Tune in for interviews and coverage of all the action.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from The Las Vegas Money Show
episodes.summary: Merlin brings Power Trading Radio to the Las Vegas Money show to bring us all the action.  He interviews special guests including the President and CEO of TradeStation Group Salomon Sredni, The Senior Instructor of the Options Institute at the CBOE Jim Bittman and the Education Counselor from Online Trading Academy Teo Alamania.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Taking Advantage of Volatile Markets
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld and his special guest Kyle Hibbard take listeners through distinct advantages during market volatility.  Kyle’s extensive background and Merlin’s ability to communicate with listeners help Traders and Investors alike take advantage of these volatile markets.  This is a must listen show.  No Power Pick.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: More Money, More Problems
episodes.summary: Conflicting economic data leaves investors scrambling to make sense of it all, ultimately ushering in buyers on good Empire State Manufacturing numbers and Retail Sales. However, Merlin thinks the bigger problem is looming with the lack of demand for Copper. Justin Krebs joins the show to share his thoughts on how the new Italy problem is panning out, and its implications for the Euro. The duo also looks at the EURCHF, and the current ProPick for AUDUSD. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Downfall of America
episodes.summary: Having repeatedly addressed the problems with our political parties in Washington,  especially their exemption from rules regarding trading, Merlin celebrates the new 60 Minutes special covering the same topic. With self interested politicians passing laws (or blocking them!) just to benefit their personal trading accounts, we will never see America return to Prosperity. John Barrett joins the show to give his thoughts on the problem, and a possible remedy. Later, the two talk about John’s transition to trading Futures intraday, something he has never done before.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld recap the market activity for the week and look at some of the major headlines moving the world. John takes a look at Gold and validates some of the statistics in the “Commodity Traders Almanac” from Wiley & Sons Publishing, which call for a bullish move over the next couple months. Later in the show, Merlin walks listeners through 2 trades he made on Friday which follow the Online Trading Methodology that netted his account a 4% gain on the day. Low Risk, High Reward… it’s all about a plan! PowerPick: BUD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Negative & Positive Correlation
episodes.summary: Back from a trading event in Baltimore, Merlin brings up a couple of questions that he encountered from his students. Tillie Allison joins the show a little later to talk about the “old normal” models of market correlation to the “new normal”  models. She emphasizes the importance of adapting to current markets in all aspects of your trading. This adaptation allows for better rates of returns and less stress! PowerPick: LEA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Indices, Commodities, Gold and Currency
episodes.summary: Mike opened with a volatility warning and reminded everybody that these types of erractic days are going to be around. Mike went over the market numbers. We invited in guest Instructor Bob Dunn and members from his current class. A discussion of the interrelationship of the indices, commodities, gold and currency were covered as the class members asked specific questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex Tuesday with Mike
episodes.summary: Steve Misic was guest. Mike and Steve talked and looked at a variety of situations in GBPJPY, EURUSD and AUDUSD. Eurostress was the main theme with the resignation of 2 PM’s in Greece and Italy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Power Trading Radio guest host Mike McMahon sits down with Bruce Milbury to discuss our current markets with a particular emphasis on stocks and listener questions via PowerBlast.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday with Mike McMahon
episodes.summary: Power Trading Radio guest host Mike McMahon sits down with Bruce Milbury to discuss our current markets with a particular emphasis on stocks and listener questions via PowerBlast.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: The market limps its way into the weekend with a great deal left unfinished. Greece looms over the global financial markets creating waves which will surely make for a volatile trading session next week. John O’Donnell joins the show to share his thoughts on where he sees the European issue going as well as his thoughts on Gold, the Euro, China, and US economic growth. PowerPicks: LVLT, EMR

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stability in the Housing Market?
episodes.summary: Euphoria returns to the markets as Greece ponders its referendum and Groupon gets set to launch its IPO. As these big ticket market movers come and go, the housing market may provide much needed stability to the US markets. Diana Hill, Real Estate Expert, joins Power Trading Radio to discuss the current trends in Homes, both residential and commercial, in an attempt to help traders diversify their portfolio as well as generate income through real estate. PowerPick: GM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mentors and Personal Guidance in Trading
episodes.summary: One of the most frequent complaints from traders is how lonely trading can be, and that you must learn on your own. Joann Farley was one of these traders when she started, then gravitated to the education and community feeling of Online Trading Academy. In that past few years, Joann has been instrumental in the development of the XLT (Extended Learning Track), which is an online community of hundreds of traders all with the same core strategy and methodology. Joann shares her progress as a trader and describes how she and the other XLT instructors are working to change the financial futures of many others.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Turmoil Continues
episodes.summary: Last week it was euphoria, this week its fear of collapse… and the saga continues! With more and more fundamental data pointing to global contraction, and Euro instability, it’s a fantastic time to be trading currencies! Rick Wright joins Power Trading Radio to give us his thoughts on the markets and where he feels things may be headed. Rick also shares a little bit about the decision support tools he uses to help increase his odds on each trade me makes. This system of odds enhancers also brushes on Multiple Time Frame Analysis, a listener favorite!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Happy Halloween!
episodes.summary: Merlin The globetrotting samurai does PowerTrading Radio from the Great Wall of China, putting a particular emphasis on the international events and how they might impact the markets. Later, Tillie Allison joins the show to talk about some of the little details in her trading style as well as her “end-of Month” strategy. The conversation stretches to Multiple Time Frame Analysis, and Sector Rotation as important components that must be factored in to the current market dynamic. PowerPick: LVS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Weekend Edition
episodes.summary:
With so much big ticket news hitting the markets this week, one has to ask: “Is it different this time?”

Hosts, Merlin Rothfeld and John O’Donnell weigh on their thoughts about the news and what its impact is going to have on the overall markets, as well as what sectors they expect to be the movers going forward. Both John and Merlin talk about their upcoming events in Irvine CA and Baltimore MD.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Most Traders Biggest Problem, Their Head!
episodes.summary: Dr Woody Johnson, Author of From “Pain to Profit, Secrets of the Peak Performance Trader”, joins the show to help listeners with their trading problems. Most traders agree that trading is 75% psychological, yet most don’t feel that they have anything wrong with them. Think again! Every trader needs a coach to help them with their problems, and Woody is just the man! PowerPicks: NE, TWM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The O'Donnell Report
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell entertains a live studio audience with Gabe Velazquez as his special guest.  They take questions for the audience and discuss our current financial situation.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Art of Supply and Demand
episodes.summary: VP of Education at Online Trading Academy, Sam Seiden, joins us to talk about the mechanics of supply and demand. This is a far cry different from conventional “Support and Resistance” that so many traders use. And it is those subtle differences that allows Sam to consistently beat the markets. Merlin and Sam share thoughts on ways that traders can break the chains of mediocrity and achieve consistent success in the markets. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Lessons From the Trading Trenches
episodes.summary: Trading veteran, Debbie Hauge shares some of her trading experiences that helped her become a successful Futures and Equities trader. Merlin and Debbie share examples of trading routines and trading plans that will help individual investors gain a sense of structure and discipline in their trading. PowerPick: HCP

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition with John O'Donnell
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell talks with special guest Garrett Jones.  Garrett Jones is a money manager and one of only ten people to be accepted into Merrill Lynch's prestigious JET Program in 1970.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Greece Is The Word
episodes.summary: Mike Mc Mahon had Gabe Velazquez as an in studio guest.  Gabe took the audience into a realistic look at the short to intermediate term.  Mike and Gabe both agreed that the market was posing a little bullish and particularly if the Euro land would get off stage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: More Trading Styles and Gap Trading
episodes.summary: In contrast to the last two guests on Power Trading Radio, our guest today starts almost every trade off as a day trade and builds as things go in his favor. Bob Dunn classifies himself as a “base hitter” who plans out every trade, and when possible, turns those trades into doubles, triples and hopefully home runs! This is done through strict discipline and money management. Bob shares bits of his trading style as well as his view & tactics for trading Gaps. PowerPick: SHLD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weak Dollar, Strong Market!
episodes.summary: Reversing Monday’s selloff, the markets showed great strength, closing near the highs of the day, and right near the overhead supply level we have been talking about on the S&P 500. Steve Misic joins the show from Tampa Florida, where he is teaching a Pro Trader Stock class at Online Trading Academy. Steve and Merlin talk about how they look at stocks coming out with earnings announcements, and what others should watch out for. Later, Steve talks about the levels on the Dollar Index and their impact on currencies as well as equity markets.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Establish your Trading Style
episodes.summary: Scott McCormick, CMT and former broker, addresses a couple of listener questions which revolve around a very common mistake: Traders not knowing their style. Whether you are a day trader, momentum, swing or even a position trader, you must know which style fits your temperament best. Just because someone trades one way, does not mean that you will be successful trading that way. Merlin and Scott look at a variety of factors which can help listeners start down the path of defining their trading style. Later on in the show, they look at multiple time frame analysis and how it impacts your trading style. PowerPick: EQT

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: After a quick recap of recent market movements, the “Ambassador of Opportunity”, John O’Donnell sites a very interesting report about the current recession and gives us several ways to play the current market. This involves a bit of market timing, and asset allocation which John feels is essential to making money in these markets. Merlin talks about www.projectvets.com and their mission to teach disabled vets how to trade and secure their financial future, as well as their raffle for a 1965 Shelby Cobra! PowerPick: XLE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: More Tricks by Financial Advisors
episodes.summary: Paul Orme discusses a recent NY Times article about how Morningstar ratings often get people into the wrong investments. Paul reinforces this with examples of how most financial advisors are causing their clients to sell low, and buy high, the exact opposite of what they should be doing! Why is that?! Because they need to make money! Merlin and Paul discuss alternatives to this devious methodology, offering listeners a solution of Proactive management of their own money. Paul shares a little about the rebalancing and option strategies used in the ProActive Investor class he helped create for Online Trading Academy. PowerPick: DTV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using Options to Profit on ANY Market Move
episodes.summary: Shamus O’Connor joins Power Trading Radio to talk about how he sees the current markets and share his experiences with listeners. Shamus was self taught and reflects on a couple of the situations that he could have avoided if he simply had someone there to explain things better. He also discusses his use of options as a wealth income machine as well as a hedge for his long term account.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From Student to Master Mentor in 7 Years
episodes.summary: Online Mentoring superstar Sam Evans joins Power Trading Radio to talk about his meteoric rise in popularity in the trading community. Just a few years back, Sam was attending hotel seminars looking for a solution which would enable him to get involved in the financial community. 7 years ago, he found the answer! That discovery transformed his life and gave him the guidance to succeed in his own trading as well as present him with the opportunity to help others achieve theirs. Later in the show, Sam talks about his trading style, how he uses the news, and what he sees on the Horizon for the Euro. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Sails Again, with Little Wind!
episodes.summary: As the market rallies even harder, Merlin looks at several factors that may cause the markets to top out and drop from current levels. Several International factors are behind this recent move, but a lack of volume has to have traders questioning the lack of conviction. Several listeners get their questions answered on air on topics ranging from Financial stocks to market correlation. One theme persists with listeners today, to many people taking to much risk! Merlin breaks down what they can do to help minimize risk and maximize rewards. PowerPick: SPY (again!)

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: Today Merlin Rothfeld and Tillie Allison discussed how premarket news and economic indicators help active day traders improve the probabilities of success. Tillie and Merlin bring up listener questions regarding the Nasdaq 100 ETF and the Nasdaq futures as a way to get glimpse of what the market is truly doing. Merlin calls out a listener as the First ever  PTR “Sheep of the Week”, for making some very obvious novice mistakes on his trade, while offering solid solutions for not making those mistakes in the future by using some of the core strategies of Online Trading Academy. Tillie bring up some correlation between bonds and stocks in current market conditions as well as some insight into Fibonacci. PowerPick: BBY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Income Through Real Estate
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison and Merlin Rothfeld kick things off with a rundown of the markets ballistic behavior starting on Tuesday morning. Is this surge of momentum going to continue? Diana Hill joins the show to talk about some of the recent housing numbers and how the average person can learn to represent themselves as well as find amazing deals around the country. Diana also points out some new trends in the housing market, which may pose some very strong opportunities for traders and investors alike! PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Chop Continues
episodes.summary: The month of September ends on a sour note as markets sold off to end the quarter. For almost two months, we have been stuck in this large trading range and from the looks of it, it will not change anytime soon. Traders are adapting their trading styles to accommodate shorter term price fluctuations, and Merlin talks about some of the tools to do this. Although the consolidation continues, Merlin looks at some of the factors that have him looking for a bearish break of this consolidation. Much of this focuses on weakening fundamentals, and deteriorating global relations as factors for things dropping further. PowerPick: MOS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from the Online Trading Academy International Conference with Tillie Allison & Bert Antonik
episodes.summary: The fun continues from the Online Trading Academy International Conference! This session Tillie Allison starts things off talking about Community and some of the new initiatives that Online Trading Academy is rolling out to help build that community. Tillie stresses that much of her success has come from working with other traders and learning from their mistakes, as well as building on their strategies, Next Bert Antonik joins the show to talk about his NEW residency in Singapore. Bert moved there last year to help teach at the Singapore office and has subsequently moved there permanently. He shares with us his perspectives of the EURO and all the news that is swirling around Greece. The duo breaks down some of the key levels on the Euro before looking at a few other currency pairs

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from Online Trading Academy International Conference with Derek Zelek
episodes.summary: The annual pilgrimage to Trading Mecca began yesterday out in Sunny Southern California. Over 60 Traders and instructors gathered for several days of education and collaborative works in an effort to improve each other’s trading and training skills. Derek Zelek, fresh off a several month teaching tour in India joins us to share his thoughts on the conference and the current happenings in the trading world. Derek and Merlin talk about the recent break of the trading range on the S&P 500, and what it means for traders. Derek goes on to say that he believes that it is going to be a head fake, drawing traders in short, before ripping back up and stopping them out before heading back down.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tillie in the House!
episodes.summary: As a rare treat, Tillie Allison co-hosts Power Trading Radio for wealth management Thursday. After walking through some quick examples of stop loss modifications, Merlin and Tillie dive into some of the issues facing the investment world. Tillie talks about sector leadership and rotation in ones portfolio, stressing the importance of portfolio rebalancing. Later, the duo looks at how to effectively use technical indicators as conformation & decision support tools. PowerPick: NFLX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Base Hits or Home Runs?
episodes.summary: The Yo-Yo markets drop again, erasing a good chunk of yesterday’s gains. With no sign of a break to this volatility, traders MUST adapt their trading to accommodate these fluctuations. Craig Weil, 38 year market veteran, joins Power Trading Radio to share some of the things that he has done in his trading career to accommodate the markets when he identified a change in behavior. Craig uses the analogy of hitting for singles and doubles, and completely forgetting about home runs. This attitude has helped him survive turbulent times and focus on what is really important: Consistently Making Money over the course of your Life!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Power & Simplicity of Supply & Demand
episodes.summary: The short term bounce continues, rallying price near short term supply levels. Will Dallas Fed President Fisher’s comments have a lasting negative effect on the markets? Or just a short term sell-off? Sam Seiden joins the show and shares some of the highlights of his recent presentations at the Las Vegas Forex & Futures with listeners, and emphasizes the importance of how commodities and currencies impact each other. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Manic Monday!
episodes.summary: Strong bullish day on low volume temporarily calms fears of a market crash, yet does not mean we are out of the woods yet. Martin Dim joins the show to talk about how the recent market behavior has caused him to change his trading tools and tactics. Marty shares with listeners an experience he had in his Stock trading class today, which highlights the importance of proper order management and record keeping. One small error could cost you thousands of dollars in losses, and could be easily prevented! After taking several listener questions, Marty and Merlin share their intermediate term outlook on the markets. PowerPick: VXX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Squeezing the Gold Bulls
episodes.summary: With another round of margin increases for gold futures traders, Gold prices plummeted today. Commodities were the most volatile sector of our markets by far, and may present some good trading opportunities for short term as well as Long term investors. John O’Donnell shares his thoughts on his favorite precious metal, as well as the condition of the global financial markets. Financials also took a beating, helped out by some downgrades of major banks like BAC and WFC. PowerPick: DOW

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Look Out Below!
episodes.summary: The pot of international turmoil is beginning to boil, spilling fear to nearly every market around the globe. However, this fear reeks of Opportunity! Russ Allen joins the show to talk about what areas investors should shy away from, and which ones present greater than average returns. Russ address the use of options for your long term accounts as a great vehicle to generate income without actually owning the security. PowerPick: MOS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Riding the FED’s Waves
episodes.summary:
Operation Twist was revealed today, and not to much fanfare! The markets sold off hard on the news, as many traders realize that it is not really going to have much impact on the continuing economic problems at home. Tillie Allison joins Merlin with a special announcement for Power Trading Radio listeners. September the 29th, Tillie and Merlin will be hosting a free online webinar about Moving Average Strategies. T0 register, click this link: http://bit.ly/nNrXJKor visit www.Powertradingradio.com

Later in the show Tillie talks about how to trade these volatile moments of news, as well as how she uses “set-it-and-forget-it” orders to help curb her emotions. PowerPick: PRU

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Changing Your Trading in Volatile Times
episodes.summary: More bad news for the Euro as Italy gets downgraded by S&P. What are the impacts on the global currency markets for this as well as the ongoing Greek situation? Rick Wright joins the show to talk about he has recently changed his trading style to adapt to current market conditions. Later in the show, Rick offers his insights into what a Greek default might mean to the Euro, and where he is looking for trading opportunities if that does happen. PowerPick:MHP

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What’s your Routine?
episodes.summary: Europe continues to give us a Pogo stick market, spreading Greece fears again causing our markets to gap down sharply on the open. Even with the bad start, the marker regrouped  and rallied for most of the trading session, but still closed lower. Mike McMahon joins Power Trading Radio fresh out of his class in Washington DC, giving insight into what his trading routine is, and how important it is for him to get students to build their own routine.  Merlin then dives into the mail bag, answering several listener questions about a variety of securities. PowerPick: EBAY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekly Wrap Up and Glance at the Week Ahead
episodes.summary: A great week for the bulls was capped off by a heavy volume Friday closing on high notes. John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld tackle several listener questions on topics rangeing from Gold to Centeral Bank Intervention. John offers listeners a FREE copy of his “Why Gold, Why Now” presentation to all listeners who call in, and offers some insight as to what vehicles are best for trading gold. This weekend edition has a strong emphasis on Risk Management and gives several examples of how Online Trading Academy’s ProPicks are up more than 50% on the year, while all major market indexes are down (except for the NASDAQ, currently up 1.2% on the year). Beating them is not difficult if you have rules and discipline! PowerPick: MXIM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On the Couch with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: The masses continue to push the markets to the upside, and rapidly approaching very strong supply levels. Dr. Woody Johnson joins the program to help out listeners of Power Trading Radio deal with their Psychological problems as they relate to trading. Dr. Johnson is the author of “From Pain to Profit:  Secrets of the Peak Performance Trader” and instructor of the Online Trading Academy psychology courses and an Online Mentoring program to help traders with their trading problems. PowerPick: G

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Transforming Lives, One At A Time…
episodes.summary: With a live studio audience, Merlin tackles a question about his bearish outlook for the markets. Online Trading Academy graduate, Brandon Tristan joins the program to talk about his progression as a trader. Starting off with the ProTrader stock class, moving his way into the XLT, then becoming an Online Trading Academy instructor, Brandon’s journey exemplifies their mission statement of “Transforming lives through exceptional trading and investing education”. All roads have their turns, and Brandon shares his experiences, as well as what the XLT community is looking at. PowerPick:QQQ

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Intervention and its Countless Failures
episodes.summary: With the global community growing increasingly concerned with the Debt crisis over in Europe, many are grumbling about the impact of ECB intervention and the impact it will have on our financial markets. Sam Seiden, shares his experiences and thoughts on the matter, going on to point out that he has never seen intervention work, and that markets just need to "Organically" resolve themselves. Although, he is probably right, we will most likely continue to see efforts to stabilize failing countries and companies. Faced with that knowledge, traders must then look to see how they can capitalize on these moments of turmoil: maximizing returns and minimizing risk. PowerPick: AET

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The European Contagion Continues to Spread
episodes.summary: More pain for the financial markets floods as the European situation escalates. Kyle Hibbard joins the show to talk about how this news is impacting the equity markets, and what it means for his students taking the Online Trading Academy Pro Trader course. While embracing volatility, Kyle stresses the need for having a plan and using all the tools available to maximize your risk reward ratio. With this information, we review a trade that was made in the Pro Trader class today on LRCX. Later, the duo talks about the synergy and importance of trading multiple asset classes to gain greater probability of a trade working in our favor. PowerPick: GBPUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: American Jobs Act, or Just More Talk?
episodes.summary: Fresh off the heels of President Obama’s speech to Congress, John O’Donnell weighs in with his thoughts. Will we see if anything changes in the future, one thing for sure is that the markets didn’t feel any confidence on Friday! John sites the recent spike in gold as a flight to safety for much of the fiat currencies around the world, a trend he thinks will continue for some time. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Different Perspective on Market Timing
episodes.summary: As the debate rages on as to whether you can time the markets or not, Tillie Allison presents an interesting argument for a different form of Market Timing: Demographic Timing. With 70+ million baby boomers approaching retirement, their investment patterns are going to change, and in a rather predictable manner. What does this mean for the average investor? Tillie shares her thoughts on the issue as well as talks about her upcoming article in Trader Magazine talking about Trading Habits. PowerPick: ORLY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: A Good Craftsman Knows His Tools
episodes.summary: Steve Bobbitt joins the show today live from Atlanta where he is teaching a TradeStation Platform Immersion class. Merlin and Steve talk about trading as two separate components: The Analytical side and the Execution side. Even with the best analysis, if a trader cannot get their orders to market properly, the trade may never happen. Going beyond just order execution and bracket orders, The duo dive into some of the specific tools which they use on their respective platforms. Steve goes on to talk about his trading style and how it adapts to volatile markets like the one we are currently in. PowerPick: COH

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pegging the Franc, and the Ensuing Aftermath
episodes.summary: In a surprising move, the Swiss National Bank, said it would peg the Franc to the Euro at a rate of 1.2. What does this mean and how can we trade it? Steve Misic joins the show to share his insights on the issue, as well as how he has personally traded these events in the past. Steve is quick to point out several other interesting points on the Euro which make it a relatively safer trade than the Franc at this moment in time. PowerPick: TEL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Gold Hour with John ODonnell
episodes.summary: Guest host John ODonnell discusses take on gold in today's markets.  Joining him is special guest Ralph Benko.  Mr. Benko is the senior economic adviser to the American Principles Project and editor of The Lehrman Institute's the Gold Standard Now.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using All Asset Classes
episodes.summary: Mike went over market data and outlook for Friday.  Diana explained how Real Estate can easily be a major asset class to trade on the longer term.  She says the bottom is near and now is the time to learn how to evaluate any and all kinds of properties.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Difference Between Night and Day
episodes.summary: Mike talked about the end of the month and the upcoming  quadruple witching day on Sept 17. Mike and Don discussed the differences and importance of seeing the Globex night Highs and Lows for strong reference number the following day.  Using a Percent  chart, they discussed the “leader/laggard”  effect.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fear vs Reality
episodes.summary: A lot of Mail box stuff caught up and then Mike and Justin took a hard look at the USD Index and some possible plays in the Swiss Franc after the SB’s Intervention.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Gold Bugs Watch Out!
episodes.summary: The big spike was probably caused by a huge So. American  repatriation of gold. Steve talked about how powerful Fibonacci confluences/overlays  accurately point out areas of Demand and supply.  Power pick was a short sale on Klac in the next 2 days.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Weekend Edition
episodes.summary: The CME raised its margin requirement for gold futures, causing a nice drop in the commodities value. Is there more selling to come? John O’Donnell shares his thoughts on his favorite metal.  Given the recent Gold Craze, FINRA has issued an alert to investors to help them wade the sea of deceptive gold speculators, Merlin talks about some of FINRA’s main points and reposts the Alert on his blog at www.Powertradingradio.com. Later the due tackle topics such as Warren Buffett’s stake in Bank of America, as well as Naoto Kan’s resignation as Prime Minister in Japan. PowerPick: USDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Power of Your Mind
episodes.summary: With a live studio audience of Online Trading Academy graduates, Merlin tackles some questions about commodities, specifically Gold. With all the recent talk of gold, have we hit a bottom? Next, Power Trading Radio welcomes Dr. Woody Johnson to the show to help listeners with some of their trading issues from a psychological perspective. Merlin stresses the fact that trading is mostly a psychological game, yet many traders feel that they need some “Indicator” or special tool to be a consistent trader. The truth is that you need to get in control of your Brain! Dr. Woody is here to help! PowerPick: NIHD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: You Can Be Hot AND Consistent
episodes.summary: Another Summer roller coaster gave Mike some ammunition to discuss Oil, Gold and the volatility in the market. Looks like Merlin won a dinner on Gold. Our guest was Tille Allision who wanted to show how “looking back” in multiple time frames can help you “see” the Demand and Supply Zones.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Low Oil Is No Show Along with Muammar Gaddafi
episodes.summary: Show focused on the trading styles and number for special guest Eric Waddell while Mike mused about both the price of gold and Oil. Audience wanted to know if GS can fall to $88 and if Bank of America was too big to fail. Interesting points were shared.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.summary: On a somewhat quite Monday afternoon, Merlin welcomes Sean Kim into the Studio to talk about his years as an institutional trader. Sean talks about how he progressed from a Broker to a Big Time Market Maker, over the course of the last 20 years. In the sharing of his experiences, listeners will get a glimpse of how Market Makers can trounce the average investor from many different angles. While most see low commissions, Market Makers see suckers. While retail traders are buying, Market Makers are shorting to you! Knowing what they do, and how they act can be a huge advantage to anyone involved in the financial markets. PowerPick: ADSK

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: More Pain To Come?
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell, the ambassador of opportunity, joins the weekend edition of Power Trading Radio to share his thoughts on the current status of the markets and some of the major issues at hand. Still bullish on Gold, John and Merlin go back and forth on the direction of gold ultimately wagering a seafood dinner on a 3 month target for gold! Other show topics include: Spain austerity moves, Buy and Hold methodology, B of A layoffs and the SEC ineptness. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: We Have It Pretty Good Here In The USA!
episodes.summary: In a colossal blunder, the SEC is under investigation for destroying documentation for more than 9000 investigations of big banks and brokerages. You have to love the “Fair and Efficient” marketplace! Fresh off the heels of a 6 month stay in India, Derek Zelek joins the show to share some of the big differences and similarities between the US & Indian Markets. Derek emphasizes how the strategies that Online Trading Academy teaches are universal and can be applied to any market around the world, provided that market meets certain criteria. Finally, Darek casts a gloomy outlook for the markets with his Technically based assessment of the S&P 500.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Options and Volatility. To High to Buy?
episodes.summary: With a Live studio audience, Merlin tackles a listeners question about technical analysis and his personal charting methodology. Michael Young joins the program to share his though on the proposed trader tax and short sale ban. Later, the duo talks about Options and the current implied volatility levels, as well as addressing a listener question about COST. Finally, Michael talks about his use of VIX, and its benefit for traders. PowerPick: PEG

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fighting Forex Fraud
episodes.summary: Sam Seiden joins Power Trading Radio to talk about some of the common scams and tactics involved in the spot forex markets. Case in point is the recent $2 million dollar fine against one of the largest retail forex trading outfits in the US, for fraudulent trading practices. Sam points out some other ways to trade forex which will get traders away from the games spot firms play. Later, Sam and Merlin look at the Swiss Franc and Euro for potential trading opportunities. Power Pick: MAT

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Back in the Saddle Again!
episodes.summary: After 4 days on the road speaking at the San Francisco Money Show, Merlin returns to the studio to host Power Trading Radio. Monday’s trading saw many bullish opportunities, and investors rushed in to capitalize on them. Merlin see’s these rallies as opportunities to get short the market for those who may have missed the original move to the downside. This show is packed full of listener questions including: Top Down vs. Bottom up Analysis, Impulse Moves, M&A Activity and more. PowerPick: RES

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live from the San Francisco Money Show
episodes.summary: Merlin broadcasts live from the San Francisco Money Show and brings you captivating interviews with some of todays leading financial figures.  Join Merlin at this exciting event.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Relative Strength With Currencies
episodes.summary:
The “rubber band” we talked about on yesterday’s show, clearly snapped back to the upside today, reflecting optimism to the FED’s comments and short covering. Is it a sign of a market bottom, or a sympathy rally before the next drop. Chuck Fulkerson joins PTR to talk about how he uses currencies as a hedge in a slightly different manner. Instead of trading just equities in his Retirement accounts, Chuck uses currency ETF’s to offset the risk of just holding dollar based assets, as well as capitalizing on the strength of the powerful trends. By measuring the relative strength between the currencies, he can enter trades which offer a substantially better risk/reward ratio.

PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Ok, So Maybe the Sky Is Falling!
episodes.summary: Markets suffer their worst loss in years as traders around the world grimace in fear, unloading equities and running to financial save havens. Gabe Velazquez joins the show and tells us about his class today, outlining the importance of having a solid strategy and rules that we follow on each trade. These rules kept his students unemotional in today’s crazy markets and that calm actually presented some good trading opportunities. Gabe and Merlin address a listeners question regarding Bollinger Bands and Fibonacci tools to help increase odds on each trade.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Ride the Roller Coaster with Confidence
episodes.summary: Mike Mc Mahon and John O'Donnell co-hosted this week's wrap up. The local markets have been on a roller coaster ride but Mike and John discussed the underlying volatility through examples of gold and foreign currencies.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Fallout Continues!
episodes.summary: Huge downside moves in the market today further propelled by market fear and angst. Fridays trading will be a big moment for the market, as traders around the globe look to Unemployment to help stop the market slide. Tillie Allison joins the show to weigh in on how to properly allocate money in poor market conditions. She stresses the importance of hedging your portfolio, and the periodic re-evaluation of your holdings holdings.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What Are Your Options?
episodes.summary: A fierce initial selloff in the equity markets slammed prices into strong demand levels, turning a bad day into a positive one by session end. Ending on a strong note, and a Bullish hammer, gives hope of further price moves to the upside. Michael Young joins the show to discuss some of the recent headline news and its impacts on his trading. The duo address listener questions regarding the use of Options as a tactical asset class to take advantage of these volatile swings. PowerPick: CAKE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Everything’s Been Decided, Nothings Been Resolved
episodes.summary: The debt deal is done, but has raised more questions about the future. These questions rocked the confidence of traders around the world, and may persist for some time. This, coupled with bad economic data, propelled the markets down with a vengeance on Tuesday. Steve Misic joined the show to discuss how he instructs his students to trade weeks like the rollercoaster we have had the first two days of August! Steve gives opinion of several currency pairs including: USDJPY, USDCHF, AUDUSD. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The New New Deal
episodes.summary: In typical fashion, the debt issue is coming down the the 11th hour, and politicians scramble to save face and public opinion! Scott McCormick, CMT, joins the show to talk about how his strategy has changed over the years to adapt to market conditions and one off events. Scott also takes a look at psychology and how a thorough understanding of Technical Analysis can give traders an edge when looking for market timing. Using a variety of tools, Scott seeks out swing and position trades which offer high reward and low risk. PowerPick: DIS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: One Hurdle Down, 2 to Go!
episodes.summary: As the debt ceiling quickly approaches, the GOP bill passed the house and is now on its way to the Senate where it is sure to get shot down! What does this progress mean for the Tuesday deadline? John O’Donnell joins the show from San Jose where he is doing a 2 day workshop on Globalization 3.0. John looks at historical similarities between this event and others that have happened in the past, with the hopes of giving listeners some guidance to future moves. One thing that John does feel confident about is gold reaching 2000 an ounce. It may seem crazy, but history supports this claim! John also gives away free copies of his “Why Gold, Why Now” presentation to callers on the show.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On The Couch with Dr. Woody Johnson
episodes.summary: As the market shrugs off good news and focuses on the debt ceiling, traders and investors are all asking the same thing: What is going to happen?! It could go either way, and the fear is evident! Dr. Woody Johnson, author of Mastering the Mental Game, joins the show to help listeners address some of their trading demons! Topics discussed included: Simulated vs. Live trading problems, How to take losses like a pro, Battling fear and greed and several others. If you have questions of your own, send them in and we will get to them on the next show with Dr. Woody! PowerPick: CALX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Commodities: Calm Before the Storm?
episodes.summary: The Fed Beige Book comes out with disappointing statements about the economy and the markets panic! Big losses in all 3 major indices, and worries about more. Don Dawson joins the show to share his views on the commodities markets, ans where there are trading opportunities. Last time Don was on the show, he was focused on a divergence between the Dow and Copper that ultimately dropped the market about 10% before it moved upward. Now Don sees something similar, but where?!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Debt Ceiling: Crisis or Opportunity?
episodes.summary: Big name companies reported earnings today with very mixed results, however all of them were overshadowed by the urgency of the Debt Ceiling. Justin Krebs joins the show to talk about how he sees the debt ceiling as opportunity for traders, as long as they know where to put their money. Merlin and Justin look at several currency pairs which offer great opportunities regardless of which way the markets head as pressure builds. Swiss Franc, Pound, Yen, Euro and the dollar all have prospects if the trade is set up correctly! PowerPick: GBPUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: “Free Wheeling” Into Uncharted Territories
episodes.summary: Merlin addresses a few listener questions pertaining to the “Debt Ceiling” crisis, trying to put things into perspective as the deadline looms. Bruce Millbury joins the show and shares a trade that he and his students entered this afternoon on a price channel breakout. Bruce talks about his trading style, and how he deals with news and events which throw the markets around like a ragdoll. As the market’s rally, many stocks are hitting “Free Wheeling” levels, facing little resistance. Bruce talks about his recent article in Trader Magazine which talks about the principles behind “Free Wheeling, and how we as traders can use it to put the odds in our favor. PowerPick: WMT
