episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Recession vs. Recession!
episodes.summary: With history being such a great teacher, John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld look at historical recessions and analyze the performance of the markets in the following years. Such analysis can clue us into market trends and investment opportunities in the short and long term. How does our current situation stack up against the major recessions over the past 60 years? Tune in and fine out!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Exchange Traded Funds – Fad or Phenomenon?
episodes.summary: As European officials get their pens ready to sign a deal on Greece, traders flock to the Euro and equity markets making for a great trading session! Paul Orme breaks down several of the critical things investors should know about using ETF’s in the portfolio allocations. While there is ample reason to use these investment vehicles for our portfolios, they are not without problems. Merlin and Paul talk about some of the major issues regarding ETF’s and their increasing popularity in the investment world. PowerPick: XLE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How to Find a Mentor
episodes.summary: Originally spurred by a listener question about “How does one go about finding a Mentor?”, Merlin takes this question to the V.P. of Education at Online Trading Academy to see what steps traders can do to get a mentor of their own. Finding a Mentor can be an arduous task, and then you never really know who your getting! Sam Seiden shares his experiences as a mentor and what he has done to create a pool of active traders who mentor in groups to leverage their time. This online forum is designed to help facilitate faster learning as well as thwart bad habits before they become engrained in a traders style. PowerPick: RIMM

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Forex & Fundamentals, Does It Fit Your Style?
episodes.summary: More earnings bombshells power most of the market to the upside, leaving financials in the dust. Just how long the exuberance will last is anyone’s guess, but if the numbers and guidance keep rolling in like they are, we should see the market rally for a while. Rick Wright joins the show to talk about the Forex class he is teaching in Irvine California this week, enlightening us on some of the items his students are focusing on. Rick also talks about how important it is to identify your trading style, and then approach the markets in a manner that suits that style best. With his trading style, he really doesn’t pay attention to all the fundamental economic numbers pouring into our heads each day.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Earnings Season and the Uncertainty It Brings
episodes.summary: As earning season gets into high gear, many big name companies roll out their numbers, and begin to ignite momentum for the markets. The big question is: Is that momentum going to spur things up or down?!? Matt Gildea joins the show fresh out of his Stock trading class in Irvine California, sharing some stories from his class about order execution and the importance of understanding what types of orders to use in the right situation. Later we discuss routine and what steps are taken to get ready for trading session. Matt walks us through a recent trade on GS that looked great, but needed to be passed up. PowerPick: BVN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fresh from Freedomfest
episodes.summary:
The weekend edition of Power Trading Radio starts off looking at a couple listener questions regarding chart patterns and formations. These patterns help us increase probability in our favor as well as minimize risk. John O’Donnell phones in from Las Vegas where he is attending “FreedomFest”, an expo dedicated to all things freedom related. John shares with us some of the key points being presented at the expo and his views on how to help American get back on its feet.

PowerPick: GT

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Prepared Are You for the Future?
episodes.summary:
More economic data pours in to bring the masses into buying the open and driving prices into Bernanke’s testimonial time. From there it was a southbound train!

Tillie Allison joins the show to shed some light into a recent article about how ill-prepared most Americans as they near retirement. Through proactive management and proper asset allocation, investors of ALL ages can adequately prepare for the future. Tillie discusses several investment techniques and how we manage the positions from several different perspectives. PowerPick: BA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using Options for the Ultimate Protection!
episodes.summary: After a brief market overview and a live studio audience question about QE3, Merlin brings Corey Lane into the studio to talk about trading Options. In the past the duo have talked about how to use options to make money in up, down, and sideways market, this time they look into using options to set stops on equity positions to guarantee a stop price. Although it may eat away at some of the profits, the security might be worth it! PowerPick: GS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Technical Analysis Tuesday
episodes.summary: Mike McMahon joins the show to cover the technical side of things! Merlin and Mike look at a variety of currency pairs using Supply & Demand, Trends, Candlesticks, CCI, Moving Averages, Stochastics and more. Cutting out the fundamental noise and looking at what price is telling you often leads to higher probability, less emotional trading. The following Currency pairs are discussed: EURUSD, EURJPY, AUDJPY, GBPUSD, EURCHF. PowerPick: AUDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Not-So-Hard to See Sell-Off!
episodes.summary: Biggest down day in over a month, and it wasn’t all that hard to see coming. After Friday’s employment number gap down, fear was spreading! Then you had the European and Asian markets tank, setting up for a big down day in the US equity markets. Will it continues it the bigger question! Merlin covers the basics of how he uses Volume to gauge sentiment and emotions when trading, and addresses several other listener questions. PowerPick: WYNN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: An Evening with Elliot Wave
episodes.summary: Merlin Rothfeld & John O’Donnell wrap up the weeks market activity, and set the stage for next week’s trading. Brian Whitmer, Editor of The European Financial Forecast, joins the show to talk about his views on the international markets and his forecasts for global markets. Brian shares his history using Elliot Wave principles to forecast market moves and macro economic cycles. PowerPIck:DIS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Importance of Having a Mentor
episodes.summary: In the face of the August 2nd deadline on the debt ceiling, the question came up about the US gold holdings and the possibility of using that to carry the US for a little while. How much do we really have? Who has the most Gold? Ryan Cook, makes is first appearance on the show, walking listeners through the trials and tribulations he encountered on his way to being a successful trader. He breaks down the importance of having a Mentor, and how it helped give him structure and discipline. PowerPick: TSO

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Talking to an OG Day Trader!
episodes.summary: As the debt ceiling deadline looms, will the president pull out a small loophole in the 14th amendment to help resolve the situation? The drama continues! Bob Dunn joins the program and talks about how he has been day trading the markets since the early 80’s, highlighting how that particular style of trading provides great benefit to all traders in the financial markets. Although a shorter term trader, Bob uses long term time frames to set his trade parameters. PowerPick: SLB

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Digesting the Macro News
episodes.summary:
As the Euro saga continues, Mike McMahon joins the show to shed some light on how he sees things transpiring internationally and abroad. Downgrades, gold hording, slowdowns in global manufacturing are all moving international markets and currencies, so what does it mean to you? Merlin and Mike take a look at the fundamentals and then dive in to a discussion of multiple time frame analysis with visual examples for those watching on www.PowerTradingRadio.com

PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Do I Decide Which Asset Class To Trade?
episodes.summary: A normally quiet trading week BOOMS to the upside, presenting the largest 5-day percentage gain since early 2009. After a brief market overview, Merlin turns to a listener question which revolves around an issue that many traders have: What Asset Class To Trade? Merlin breaks down this question in to several components including: Trading style, personal interests, Work schedule and more. Understanding one asset is a great way to make money, however traders who understand the synergies between multiple asset classes have a distinct advantage.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Has the Housing Market Bottomed? Or Are We Back on the Slide?
episodes.summary:
Real Estate expert Diana Hill Joins the show to look at some of the recent fundamental data coming out of the housing market, including Existing, Pending, and New home sales. Are the trends changing? Diana shares her thoughts on market inventory and its impacts on prices and more importantly the Case Shiller HPI 20. After the market breakdown, Merlin and Diana tackle several listener questions pertaining to the housing markets.

PowerPick: FSLR

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Plotting the Future with Futures
episodes.summary: Good market news and global events propel the market’s upward for the 3rd consecutive day, putting a nice finishing rally on June’s trading. Dan Sugar joins the show to talk about his current class and how he uses the Globex highs and lows to establish market levels for each trading day. Wednesday’s trading hit these levels exactly, making of great trades for all his students! Rounding out the show, Dan talks about the recent dance between the 4 major indices, and how they are giving us clues as to where the market is heading in the short term.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Bad News Abound, and the Market Rallies?!
episodes.summary: With bad economic data and turmoil in the streets of Greece, the markets rallied sharply to the upside! Was it Fundamentally or Technically driven? Steve Misic joins the program to look at some of the fundamental news currently facing the global markets,  and how it is impacting his trading. Later, Steve and Merlin tackle several listener questions before moving onto the charts of several currency pairs for some technical analysis. PowerPick:USDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Different Strokes for Different Folks -  Patterns and Trading Styles
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off by looking at a recent PowerPick on SLB, and breaks it down from multiple perspectives. One Pattern offers 3 distinct trading opportunities for bullish or bearish investors. Craig Weil  joins the show and offers his quick opinions of news and how to trade it, then goes into his trading style and some of the lessons he has learned in the last 37 years of trading! PowerProspects:BR, PG, ARBA, KLAC

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Scams and Misconceptions
episodes.summary:
With countless people getting fleeced out of their money by a wide variety of market scams, what can the individual investor do to protect themselves? John O’Donnell joins the show to talk about some of the bigger scams he has seen over the years and the simple things that consumers need to pay attention to in order to protect themselves. John and Merlin look at a variety of macroeconomic issues currently facing our markets, including recent IEA statements Greece to gain a greater sense of how news influences our markets.

PowerPick: GD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Steps to Catch Up on Your 401k
episodes.summary: Over the last few weeks, many listeners have inquired about what to do if they tapped into their 401k, or if they haven’t started planning for retirement yet. Can people catch up? If so, what should they do? Tillie Allison joins the show to talk about these questions and more to gain a greater understanding of what we need to do to prepare for our golden years. PowerPick: HD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: On the Couch with Dr. Woody Johnson!
episodes.summary: Most traders and books agree that trading is 70-80% psychology, yet many know very little about themselves and how they actually trade. Dr. Woody Johnson, trading psychologist, joins the show to talk to listeners about ways to improve their trading and achieve peak performance in all aspects of their life. For most of the show, the “Couch” is open, and listeners questions are answered on the air. PowerPick: RIO

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Big News Coming From Greece, What’s Your Plan?!
episodes.summary: With the No confidence vote looming for the Greek Prime minister, the Euro, and other currencies are bouncing around like Wallabies! What impact does this have on our trades going forward, and what should we do as the news unfolds? Justin Krebs joins us in studio for a special segment which covers these topics and how Justin sets up his trades accordingly! PowerPick: HD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning the Trade, Trading the Plan
episodes.summary: Fresh back from the International Traders Expo in Dallas Texas, Merlin dives straight into a listeners question regarding a trading plan and the steps to build one. Marty Dim, joins the show and shares a trade with listeners that he is currently in. This trade involves A big gap, fundamentals, technical’s and Options. Marty is already locked in nice profit and is riding the options for even more return! PowerPick: MOS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Day 3 Live at the Dallas Money Show
episodes.summary: Merlin broadcasts live from the Dallas Money Show and brings us interviews with Stanley Dash from TradeStation and many more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Day 2 Live at the Dallas Money Show
episodes.summary: Merlin broadcasts live from the Dallas Money Show with interviews from Roy Worth of TheMoneyShow.com, John Roberts from TradeStation, and LP Ladouceur from the Dallas Cowboys.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Live From the Dallas Traders Expo
episodes.summary: Merlin broadcasts live fromt the Dallas Traders Expo and brings us all the excitement.  He chats with special guest Corey Lane about our current markets and answers listener questions.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Spot and Forex Futures with Sam Seiden
episodes.summary: Sam Seiden joins Merlin for an entire show focusing on the difference between Spot and Forex Futures. Getting his start in trading decades ago, Sam began trading FX Futures, yet has traded spot as well. Sam discusses the many pro’s and cons to both, and emphasizes that traders must identify their goals & objectives before committing to either asset class. Sam outlines some of the tools he and his staff have created help traders & Investors achieve their goals.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Monday Afternoon Mailbag
episodes.summary:
With little real exciting activity in the markets on Monday, Merlin opens up the mail bag and dives into listener questions. First and foremost, Merlin Tackles the topic of “Trading is Gambling”, and sheds light on how a professional trader always tries to stack the odds on their side, giving them a better than 50/50 chance of being on the right side of the trade. Stocks talked about on the show: NSTC, LMT, LULU, BRCM, JNPR, AMAT, MU

PowerPick: SBUX

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Macro Picture For Your Weekend Edition
episodes.summary:
John O’Donnell and Merlin focus the weekend edition show on the macro fundamental news that has been driving the markets recently. Topics covered include: The Fed becoming the largest holder of U.S. Treasury paper, Gold and Silver at these current levels as well as looking forward, Recent bounce in Financial stocks. John and Merlin also discuss their upcoming trip to Dallas for the International Traders Expo, where they will be offering several free presentations. TO find out more, go to www.moneyshow.com

PowerPick: XLE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Portfolio Management in Turbulent Times
episodes.summary: With a Live studio audience of Online Trading Academy students, Merlin runs down the day’s trading activity then focuses on listeners questions. Tillie Allison joins the show to talk about how many investors were spoiled with the recent run of the S&P, and how they should be proactively managing their accounts to protect against further downside moves. Merlin talks about Tillie’s cover story on Traders magazine, and how market timing helps improve investing results. PowerPick: NVDA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: When It Rains, It Pours….
episodes.summary: More bad economic data, and hawkish comments from the Fed District Presidents regarding their districts pressured the markets lower, while OPEC did nothing and oil shot up! Is there a bottom in sight? Or will we keep slowly dropping? Michael Young joins the program to talk about some of the technological innovations and how High Frequency has changed the landscape of the trading markets. Later, the duo look at a few listener questions, then dive into current market analysis, addressing key levels that all listeners should be aware of for upcoming trading sessions. PowerPick: ZUMZ

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Behind the Scenes With Futures & Forex
episodes.summary: After Ben Bernanke’s presentation today, the market reacted to his lack of definitive optimism by selling off the equity markets to close at near dead lows.  Merlin looks at the market action, and to no surprise, sees things heading down further. Trey Lazzara, President of TradePro Furtues, joins the program to talk about some of the key differences the spot and futures market for currencies. Trey shares with us some of the current trends he is witnessing with his clients as well as the markets as a whole. PowerPick: EXXI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Fibonacci and Its Many Uses
episodes.summary: Merlin Kicks off the trading week with a quick rundown of the major market headlines and reviews some listener question from last week regarding market strength and closing prices. Chris Manson joins the show to talk about how he uses Fibonacci as a decision support tool, helping him refine his entries, stops and targets. Later, Chris and Merlin look at where the markets may be headed and use a little Fibonacci to help validate upcoming levels. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Ignore The Static
episodes.summary: Merlin and Mike talked about the 7 pillars of trading after getting through today’s numbers. Despite the news, the market was only off 2% of the week and the fundamentals and technicals still look bullish long term but the short and intermediate needs great caution, the Dow has slid for 5 weeks but everybody is approaching or on support. Pick of the day was STT long for a swing trade. Details on the OTA Trader’s Dashboard.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Housing Market Back in Black?
episodes.summary: Two great listener questions regarding ways to report companies who are performing illegal activities and  how credit rating scales work, dominate the opening segment. Diana Hill joins the show to help make sense of much of the recent housing data and the talk of another housing market decline. Do the numbers support it? Tune in to see what Ms. Hill thinks, as well as what are some of the new government proposals to help get the housing market on solid ground. PowerPick: NOV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Clues While You Sleep
episodes.summary: As more economic data comes down the pipeline with bad results, the markets nosedive! Although the data is important, it wasn’t the only reason we saw the major indexes drop over 2%! Steve Bobbitt joins the show to walk us through how he looks at the overnight Globex trading sessions to get clues to where the markets may be headed when the open. Steve uses a variety of tools, including S&D levels, Fibonacci, range bars and gap data to build his strategy for the coming day. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Why Are We Rallying on Bad News?!
episodes.summary: Power Trading Radio listener Amy, sent in a great question about why the markets rallied in the face of bad news and a double dip recession. Merlin breaks this question down and applies elements of multiple time frame analysis to the way that people relate to news and information. Steve Misic joins the program to share his thoughts on the subject, and reflect on how the recent news has moved the markets in the short term, as well as how it might move things going forward. Steve addresses a listeners question about his “Channel Breakout Strategy”, and tries to clarify its uses in today’s markets vs. trending markets. Merlin points out the importance of trading slower assets first, then moving up to faster vehicles and Steve points out what the slow, medium and fast currency pairs are. PowerPick: SGEN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Inflation vs. Deflation
episodes.summary: Guest host John O'Donnell and his special guest Patrick Barron discus Keynesian economics and the inflation vs. deflation debate.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What’s Your Trading Style?
episodes.summary: For the second day in a row, 20 Trading Academy Students join the first segment of Power Trading Radio, and get involved with questions regarding what traders need to do to succeed. Tillie Allison joins the show and breaks down the 4 main trading styles, then shifts things to address 2 different subsets of long term investing. Traditionally investors just use boilerplate asset allocation tables to determine their investments. However, there are several different ways we can manage our investments, and Tillie shares the basics with us. PowerPick: FDO

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing and Sector Rotation
episodes.summary: With a Live studio audience, Merlin starts off the show by looking at a lot of the recent economic data and how it supports the recent sell off. Dan Sugar joins the program and starts discussing Market Timing and Sector Rotation, two concepts that are very crucial at getting the best possible entry. A 3rd generation trader, Dan discusses the importance of having a mentor, as well as his involvement in the XLT program where he gets to help other traders achieve their dreams. With the recent break of significant moving averages, Dan and Merlin share their prognosis for the markets going forward. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: From India With Love
episodes.summary: International trading globetrotter Brandon Wendell joins Merlin on Power Trading Radio to share his experiences traveling the world for the last 5 months. Brandon looks at some of the fundamental differences in the way that we trade here in the states, vs. the way trading occurs in India. Very different! Next, our dynamic duo takes a look at trading indicators: How they have been of assistance through the years, and what they are using now to trade all markets. Brandon takes a look at how we can use currency pairs, especially cross pairs to trade commodities like gold and oil with greater accuracy. PowerPick: AUDUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Sell In May and Go Away. Really!?!
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off the show by looking at a lot of the recent Economic numbers from the US and European economy, and assessing their impact on the markets going forward. Chuck Fulkerson joins the program to talk a bit about the often used market mantra “Sell in May, and go away.” Chuck emphasizes the importance of proactively investing and using other instruments, as well as shorting, when the market is in a downtrend. Rather than getting out, and not making money on the decline in prices, wouldn’t it be more prudent to ride prices down and make money!? With the current trend of the Dollar and commodities, there is ample opportunity for traders in all asset classes! PowerPick: CAT

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Mysteries of Fibonacci
episodes.summary: Keeping his word, Merlin starts the show off by going over the PowerPick from Thursday, and points out the obvious flaw with this trade. He also breaks it down from a Fibonacci perspective, giving listeners the opportunity to get their free Fibonacci CD by calling (88-304-8723). John O’Donnell joins the program to share some insights into his trading style and how it pertains to the metals market. Listener questions range from the current situation at Goldman Sachs, to market index correlation. PowerPick: PCLN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Planning For Your Future
episodes.summary: Merlin kicks things off with a quick rundown of the markets before shifting attention to the current IPO market, and the hype behind the LinkedIn (LNKD) release this morning. Bob Heitner joins the show and helps listeners understand some of the risks of Annuities, and other investment vehicles. Bob outlines how the XLT (Extended Learning Track) is designed to give Very simple rules for investors to follow, so that they can manage their own financial future, instead of trusting an advisor! PowerPick: PAA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Different Strokes for Different Folks
episodes.summary: After going over several stocks that listeners sent in to have analyzed, Merlin shifts the show to trading style and discovery. 36year trading veteran Craig Weil joins the show and walks listeners through the steps that it took him to discover his trading style! Craig uses intraday scalping to pull money from the markets, and does so using a very limited number of securities. Craig tells us what they are, and more importantly, WHY he trades only those. PowerPicks: LAZ, HBHC, SEE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How Much Should the News Impact Our Trades?
episodes.summary: With so much information pouring into our heads from all corners of the earth, does it really impact our trades? Justin Krebs joins the program and shares his thoughts on how he uses the landslide of economic information to gauge where the currency markets are going. Going one step further, Justin talks about his most recent XLT (Extended Learning Track) session and how he prepares students for a trading day. PowerPick: WLP

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Importance of Having Rules and a Trading Plan
episodes.summary: The trading week kicked off with a nice technology slide and a variety of international reports which soured the tone of traders. Merlin breaks down some of the big headlines and sheds some light on their impact going forward. Dan Sugar joins the show and shares some of the rules he has in his trading plan, and offers suggestions to traders on how they should shape their trading plans. Dan breaks down the current market movements , and gives his opinions on where things are headed from here. PowerPick: CTL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Breakdown of an Economic Indicator: CPI
episodes.summary: From the listener mail bag, Merlin digs out a good question on Fundamental analysis “How does Fundamental Data impact our trades?” John O’Donnell Joins Merlin on the show as they tackle this tricky question with tons of visual images to help support their explanations. The duo break down How CPI is comprised, and what are the influences on it, as well as explaining the trends of CPI and its individual components. PowerPick: RVBD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Another One Bites the Dust! Life of a Hedge Fund Manager
episodes.summary: Another Big Time hedge fund manager goes down today casting fear amongst the big brokers and joy to Merlin! Paul Orme joins the show to share his thoughts on the debate over dividend payments or capital appreciation. Later, Paul and Merlin look at asset diversification and how it leads to individual investors achieving their desired rate of return so they can retire in style. PowerPick: RKT

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Globex, Elliot Wave & Dead Cat Bounce: Anatomy of a Trade
episodes.summary: Back at the helm, Merlin Rothfeld kicks off Futures Wednesday by looking back at the last 2 days of All-Star events he hosted and breaks down current market movements. Steve Bobbitt joins the program and introduces 3 topics which sound like something out of a Teenage Slasher Flick! Globex Futures, Elliot Wave and Dead Cat Bounce are 3 key elements that led to a great trading day for Steve today, and he walks us through all 3 components and the puts them together as he walks us through his trade. Later he lays out his thoughts on where the market is headed in the short term. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Foreign Currencies and US Debt
episodes.summary: Guest Host John O’Donnell talks about Online Trading Academy’s unique approach using supply and demand zones to dictate your entry and exit in the markets. Special guest Rick Wright joined the shows and discussed the USD/EURO, POUND/FRANC and other opportunities in foreign currency markets, as well as how our economy is being impacted by massive federal debt of over 14 trillion dollars and more. Get well soon Mike!

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Gold & Silver in India
episodes.summary: Guest host John O’Donnell and Derek Zelek spoke about his 6 month visit to the country of India to teach investors and traders the Online Trading Academy strategies and techniques. Derek’s direct experience with the culture showed him their bias toward gold and silver verses the counter bias in the USA. John also found out why some of the strategies taught buy OTA work better in India than in USA or Europe. Learn why the Dollar is oversold over-sold verses Euro and why this could be a great trading opportunity. Get well Soon Mike!! See Pro Picks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: It’s Not Doom & Gloom, It’s Opportunity!
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld tackle a listener question regarding John’s negative viewpoint on the market and the misconception of Doom & Gloom. With the current moves in the market, there is tremendous opportunity to the downside, and all traders should be taking advantage of it. At a minimum, listeners should be rebalancing their portfolio’s co protect against large market drawdown’s if they are “Buy and Hold” Investors. John dives in to silver and what are some of the issues he sees with silver, and why he thinks we will see a small bounce before selling off to new lows. Lastly, the duo look at the Euro and its growing troubles with Greece. PowerPick: COP

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Asset Allocation in Volatile Times
episodes.summary: Silver plunges again as margin requirements are raised, and the dollar has an explosive rally. For many, this presents an attractive point to add to buy into, for others its high risk. Bob Heitner joins the show to explain the risks involved with trading volatile securities in your long term accounts. Bob addresses 3 major components to Investing that many have a hard time following: Asset Allocation, Market Timing, Discipline. He shares his insights on investing with Merlin, while focusing on these 3 key components. PowerPick:SLV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Markets Continue Their Slide, When Will It Stop?
episodes.summary: Silver gets crushed again as margin rules hit the street. Will the sell off continue? If so, when is the time to get back in? Merlin tackles this question to start off the show, as well as a couple other listener questions. Steve Misic joins the program to share his thoughts on parabolic moves such as the one Silver has enjoyed, as well as helping traders understand the difference between the Spot Forex and Forex Futures. Later in the program, the duo look at the EURUSD, and the Dollar Index. PowerPick: CNQ

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Rules & Strategies: Your Key to Success
episodes.summary:
Merlin starts the show off by going over some listener questions regrading the 
recent PowerPicks, and the logic behind them. With a thorough understanding of 
the strategy implemented as well as the rules that MUST be followed, listeners 
gain a clearer picture of proper trading. Sam Seiden, joins the show to share 
his thoughts on those issues as well as talk about some of the ground-breaking 
tools he and his team have created to help traders achieve their financial 
goals. Merlin and Sam look at the current EURUSD chart as well as EURGBP. 
PowerPick: USDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Parabolic Moves. Love em’ or Leave em?
episodes.summary: As the world celebrates the Death of Bin Laden, the equity markets actually sold off instead of rallying as expected. Silver also took a big hit, down nearly 10% on the day. Is this the end of Silvers run? John Barrett joins the show to talk about how he trades parabolic moves, like silver, and what he has learned over the years about how others trade them. John also discusses how he uses supply and demand levels to spot  turning points and origins of big sell-offs. PowerPick: FST

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Perspectives on Gold and Silver
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell returns to Power Trading Radio after nearly 3 weeks traveling around Israel. John shares his thoughts on his travels and how current events are shaping the markets. A lot of attention is put on the erosion of the US dollar and its global purchasing power. Merlin & John talk about their upcoming speaking schedule for the Dallas Traders Expo in June. PowerPick:DD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Tricks Money Managers Pull on Investors , and What to Do to Secure Your Financial Future.
episodes.summary:
Merlin starts off Thursday’s show by diving into the mail bag to tackle a few listeners questions regarding WTW & AMZN. Paul Orme joins the program from Philadelphia, where he is teaching a ProActive Investor class. Paul walks us through some of the things he is attempting to accomplish with his students, as well as some of the key concepts that have been the biggest surprise for them. Later, Merlin and Paul discuss some of the most problematic areas in long term investing and the power of compounding interest.

PowerPick: GPS

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Silver and Gold rocking to historic highs, is now the time to buy?
episodes.summary: Again today Gold and Silver shot up to record highs drawing in many traders. What were the factors for the move, and is now the time to buy? Dow Dawson, 23+ year commodities trader, joins the show to share his thoughts on how the fundamental news today impacted these assets as well as other commodities. Don talks about one of his favorite commodities and how he feels it is a good indicator of where the markets will be headed in the next few months! PowerPicks: RIG & WYN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Should the News & Current Events Influence Your Trades?
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off with an overview of why SLV was chosen as a PowerPick of the Day! on Monday. After some clarity on why the entry was selected, and how users may tweak their numbers, Justin Krebs joins the show to talk about the currency markets. Justin has a straight forward approach to trading currencies that discounts a majority of the news that is presented to us each day. “People Lie, Charts don’t” says Justin as he shares his views on the markets and shares some trades he is currently in. PowerPick: None

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Over the past couple weeks, we have received many messages from listeners who are frustrated with their financial advisors, and are curious what it takes to manage their own long term investments. Russ Allen pointed out on Thursday’s show that with just
episodes.summary: Kyle Hibbard joins Merlin to look at many of the macro factors impacting our financial markets. With commodity prices skyrocketing, global inflation, and the end of QE2, what’s next for our markets? Are earnings enough to propel us higher, or have we topped out? From Technical’s to fundamentals, Kyle and Merlin  tackle these topics and listener questions regarding ETF’s and specific stocks. PowerPick: SLV

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: What It Takes To Be a Part of the 10% of People Who Will Have Enough Money For Retirement!
episodes.summary: Over the past couple weeks, we have received many messages from listeners who are frustrated with their financial advisors, and are curious what it takes to manage their own long term investments. Russ Allen pointed out on Thursday’s show that with just 1 hour a week, we can do a better job than a financial advisor!  Merlin is joined by Tillie Allison for a look at what steps need to be taken by individuals looking to Proactively Manage their money. The two point out that with structure and the right education, anyone can manage their finances.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Stampeding Earnings Bull! Will They Stop?
episodes.summary: As more companies pour in great earnings numbers, the looming question is: Will it last? Russ Allen joins the program to offer his insights from a longer term perspective. Russ believes that we will continue to see these good numbers for a while, and that we need to rebalance our portfolios to reflect it. But with prices at lofty levels, do we buy now? Or wait for a Retracement? Tune in to get the answers! PowerPick: DD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Volatility In The Markets. How Do I Buy It? And Do I Want To?
episodes.summary: After a big gap up on Intel earnings and positive vibe, the markets traded sideways. Will we see more upside movement as more bellwethers come out with earnings tomorrow? Merlin takes a look at the VIX index and the various ETF/ETN’s which allow you to trade market volatility. With many options to choose from, traders need to analyze the various options from a risk/reward perspective to find out if it is worth trading them! Merlin walks you through them all from a risk/reward perspective, shedding some light on this relatively new trading vehicle

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Influence of the Media On Our Trades. Should We Listen?
episodes.summary: Merlin runs through some of the headlines facing the trading day, and mulls the importance of them. After all, it is the news and media hype which steers many investors. Rick Wright joins the show to share his thoughts, as well as how he tunes out the media and focuses on what is important: Price! Later the two look at the USD, EUR, JPY and try to make some sense of the past moves and where things may be headed in the meantime! PowerPick: USDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Private Companies Downgrading Their Own Countries! What’s Next?
episodes.summary: Standard & Poor’s cast a dark cloud over the markets today by lowering its long-term outlook for the federal government's fiscal health from "stable" to "negative." What impacts will this have going forward on our markets? What could this mean for the dollar? Bruce Milbury joins us to talk about what he is seeing in the markets, and how he uses specific trading tools to trade. Bruce goes over “Freewheelin” and how Silver still may have a lot more room to run. PowerPick: STI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Market Timing & Trade Strategies, Are They For You?
episodes.summary: Tillie Allison joins the program live from Detroit, where she is teaching the ProTrader Stock course. Tillie shares her thoughts on the debate about Market Timing, and its validity as an effective tool for evaluating markets. Merlin brings up a listener question on Automated Trading systems and if they work. Merlin and Tillie tackle that question and several others in this weekend edition of Power Trading Radio! PowerPick: SID

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using ETF’s and Market Timing to maximize returns in the market
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by 50+ year market Veteran Leslie N. Masonson. Les talks about his new book “Buy – Don’t Hold”, which lays out a clear cut system for long term capital preservation and growth using a variety of Exchange Traded Funds. Over the last 50 years, he has developed a unique system which incorporates a lot of market timing principals. These principals will keep investors on the correct financial path! Merlin looks at the Relative Strength concept and applies it to current market conditions. PowerPick: DNR

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Uneducated Lose, The Educated Win. Always! Which Side Are You On?
episodes.summary: Merlin is Joined by the V.P. of Education at Online Trading Academy, Sam Seiden, for an in-depth look at what it takes to be a good trader. Sam walks us through his progression as a trader from a floor based Market Maker on the Chicago Mercantile Exchange, to a successful screen based trader. In his dedication to the art of trading, Sam has created physical class content, as well as online Mentoring rooms to help traders achieve their financial goals as soon as possible! Finally Sam presents the newest offering from Online Trading Academy, OTA ProPicks. These daily market calls are designed to help facilitate learning as well as give students a FULL thought out trading plan for each trade. PowerPick: VSEA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Striking Similarities Between Chernobyl & Japan, and how its Impacting the Currency Markets.
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off the program with an interesting look at the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the eerie similarities which it shares with the current events unfolding in Japan. As with Chernobyl, the Japanese government has not exactly been forthcoming with the truth. Like in trading, we must look to the past to gain a better understanding of the future. Justin Krebs joins the program to share his thoughts on how to treat trading as a business, shattering the belief that trading is simple. The pair then turn their attention to currency pairs, including: EURUSD. AUDUSD, USDCAD. PowerPicks: LRY, PCAR

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: News and Multiple Time Frame Analysis: How They Fit Into Your Trading Day
episodes.summary: Matt Gildea joins Merlin live in studio to share his thoughts on the current status of the market and how others are trying to MAKE you think. Matt points out how the vast majority of traders use news incorrectly, and are often left holding the bag when their positions shoot against them! They then take a step back and look at how multiple time frame analysis plays a very crucial role in trading and how it pertains to the current market situation. PowerPick:DO

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Rising Gold and Silver Create Profts
episodes.summary: Merlin and his special gues Tillie Allison take a trader's look at all th markets and answer your questions and phone calls live on the air.  Rising gold and silver prices are creating profits and offering hedge opportunities for long-term investors.  Professional traders learn the value of each tool and it's purpose in various market conditions in order to be consistently profitable.  Which side of the trade were you on today?

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Jim Puplava 30+ Year Investor & CFP Talks Money and Online Trading Academy
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by Jim Puplava, President and Chief Investment Strategist for PFS Group. Jim talks about the importance of gold and having it in your portfolio’s.  Having invested for over 30 years, Jim shares his experiences and constant need for trading and investing education. For the past week, he has been attending the Online Trading Academy Pro Trader course, and shares his thoughts with listeners.  PowerPick: UAL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Eliminating Emotions Through Planning and Routine
episodes.summary: Michael Young, 26 years veteran on the floor of the CBOE, joins the show to shed some light on how traders need to prep for their trading day and develop a routine. Michael shares his experience this morning with XLT (Extended Learning Track), and how the methodically begin each trading day. Later the pair look at the current state of the equity markets and weigh in on which way they see them going. Show includes analysis of SPY, IWR, DIA, QQQ, VXX and several other stocks.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: 1 Year Anniversary Show!
episodes.summary: After 260 shows, Power Trading Radio officially turns 1 year old! As a present, the markets graced us with a ton of news and announcements that are sure to add more fuel for the volatility of the markets. Merlin addresses news ranging from Inflation, Apple, China, Portugal and tons more! Steve Misic joins the program to shed some light on what he sees happening in the currency markets, as well as what traders should do when they are impacted personally by traumatic events. The pair look at GLD, VXX, EURUSD, AUDJPY, USDJPY, GBPUSD. PowerPick: AUDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Debt and the Fractal Nature of the Markets
episodes.summary: Merlin tackles a listener question about the “Debt Ceiling” and how it impacts our trading. To understand this, we first have to know the purpose behind the ceiling and what its purpose is in our economy. Special Guest Marty Dim joins the show from Chicago bringing 30+ years of trading experience to PowerTradingRadio listeners as he and Merlin look at the fractal nature of markets, and how we can apply this knowledge to technical analysis. Merlin and Marty look at a few listeners stocks, including: IRE, RIMM, SPY. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The Pyramid of Success, In Life and in Trading!
episodes.summary: Merlin and John take a look at John Wooden’s “Pyramid of Leadership”, and how it applies to trading. John runs through the 15 key components, breaking them down in an attempt to illustrate the direct correlation to greatness in Leadership, Trading and in Life. These topics are essential for anyone interested in trading as a profession! Later, John and Merlin look at some of the key events and issues facing our markets such as Interest rates, NYSE merger, etc. PowerPick: NIHD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Time Decay using Leveraged ETF’s & How to use them in your portfolio
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off by addressing several listeners questions about Wednesdays discussion of ETF decay and how it works against you. Through specific examples, Merlin shows you that even when the underlying asset that the ETF’s are tracking do not change in time, the derivative ETF’s will all lose value. This phenomenon is known as Time Decay. Tillie Allison joins the show to add her thoughts on the subject, then shares a strategy that ties into the End of Month trading behavior of the markets. PowerPick: FXE

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: International Events and Their Impact on Commodity Prices
episodes.summary: After a market overview and current events, Don Dawson joins the program to shed some light into the current commodities markets. With the weak dollar and rising global demand, will the current commodity price trend continue? Don takes a look at this question as well as how the events in Japan will create opportunities for those trading commodities. Don and Merlin stress the need for a trading plan, regardless of your trading style and objective. PowerPick: @ES

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: The 7-Pillars of Trading Applied to the Currency Markets
episodes.summary: Merlin focuses this show on how the 7-Pillars of trading impact all aspects of his trading. To begin with, he explains how and why he chose the PowerProspects from Monday, and why the 7-Pillars impacted those choices. As the show progresses, Merlin applies the same methodology to some of the Major currency pairs including EURUSD, USDJPY. Listeners will receive a free 7-Pillars of trading CD if they call into the show. 1-888-304-8723. PowerProspects:NEM & MASI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Equity Market Movements & Moving Averages
episodes.summary: Off to a negative note, the Equity markets continue digesting a wealth of market internals and global events. John Barrett joins the show to shed some light on how he trades using Moving Averages to assist in his trading decisions. Using a variety of different time frames, John breaks down how Moving averages to both enhance his probability of being on the right side of the trade, as well as determining overall market direction. These same Moving Averages are telling us something very interesting about the current markets. PowerProspects: NWS, WLL, QLGC

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Keynesian vs Austrian Economics. Pro’s & Con’s
episodes.summary: John O’Donnell and Merlin Rothfeld open the show with a summary of the major issues facing our markets this week, as well as a final look at the numbers for the week. Douglas French, president of the Mises Institute and author of several book, joins the show to shed some insight into the Austrian school of economics. Clearly the way that our government has been steering things has its flaws, and Mr. French shares his thoughts on what we can be doing different, as well as what we have learned from Bubbles in the past. PowerPick: ARBA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Analyzing Your Largest Investment, Your Home!
episodes.summary: After another bullish day, Merlin recaps some of the PowerPick movements and market internals which helped the market rally today. Diana Hill joins the program to shed some light on the current status of the housing market. Current data suggests further downside movement, but is that what it means in your market? Diana breaks down the current Case-Shiller numbers, and sheds some light on the residential and commercial real estate markets. Diana also discusses some of the topics she will be covering in her upcoming Physical and Online classes. PowerProspects: BBT, PSLV, OIL

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Using Futures to Trade Commodities, Global Indexes and Currencies.
episodes.summary: Fibonacci brings itself to the forefront again as a slew of listeners sent in questions over night regarding its usage. Merlin looks at a listeners question on how to use Fibonacci extensions to help give price targets in situations where price has never been at those levels. Dan Sugar joins the program to give us some insight into the current status of the Futures market. Merlin and Dan discuss how Japan is impacting the futures markets, from Indexes, currencies, and commodities. Later they look at how the rising oil costs may impact the markets, and how we can capitalize on their movements. PowerPick: CNH

episodes.title: Using Futures to Trade Commodities, Global Indexes and Currencies.
episodes.summary: Fibonacci brings itself to the forefront again as a slew of listeners sent in questions over night regarding its usage. Dan Sugar joins the program to give us some insight into the current status of the Futures market. Merlin and Dan discuss how Japan is impacting the futures markets, from Indexes, currencies, and commodities. Later they look at how the rising oil costs may impact the markets, and how we can capitalize on their movements. PowerPick: CNH

episodes.title: Technical’s, Fundamentals & Fibonacci. Where Are the Currency Markets Headed?
episodes.summary: Merlin starts off the show by looking at a listener question about Fibonacci uses in financial markets, and how to properly use them. As the show progresses, examples are used on currency charts to show Fibonacci Retracements and Extensions. Merlin gives a thorough analysis of the EUROUSD on both a technical and fundamental level before moving onto the USDJPY pair for a similar analysis. PowerPick: EURUSD

episodes.title: Big Gaps, Tight Ranges, Another day in the equity markets!
episodes.summary: With the significant gap this morning, several of the PowerPicks were stopped out, and Merlin walks you through them all. After addressing the current market situation, focus shifts to the NYSE merger and other listener questions. Chuck Fulkerson joins the program and immediately stresses the real focus of trading: Controlling Losses! Although he had a couple losing trades today, they were kept small, and followed his plan to a “T”. The pair talk about Order Routing and its impact on profits & trade management. PowerPick: OI

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Mastering The Power Of Options
episodes.summary: After a turbulent week in the global financial markets, the dust is beginning to settle! John O’Donnell & Merlin Rothfeld take a look at the major events impacting the markets and the impact of the Japan situation. Mark Longo, President of The Options Insider, joins the show to talk about how options have evolved. After shares his experiences from the CBOE, and how he has successfully transitioned to screen based trading, Mark goes on to point out how most traders are using options correctly.  While many Deceptive Options schools promise amazing rewards and sell you junk info on Options trading, Mark stresses the need for Legitimate education to use this instrument correctly. PowerPick: ETN

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pro’s and Cons of ETF’s & Using Them to Anticipate Market Direction
episodes.summary: After outlining how he is adding to his short position in the market, Merlin invites Dan Sugar to the program. Dan discusses what his students are learning in his class in Concord California, and how this week’s market turbulence is impacting the learning experience. Dan stresses why ETF’s need to be a part of everyone’s long term portfolio, and may offer some great short term trading vehicles as well. The show wraps with an analysis of ETF’s can help us anticipate market direction. Specifically with  SMH, XLF, XLK, XLE. PowerPick: EFA

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Finding Success with Trading Mentors & The Latest Futures Innovations
episodes.summary: As the markets continue their present slide, Merlin looks at a wide assortment of market data which suggests further downside movement. XLT graduates, and "Guide a Friend To Success" winners, George Albert and Taylor Frame join the program to discuss how Online Trading Academy has helped them achieve their trading goals. Crediting the XLT mentoring program, these two traders share their experiences and trading styles with listeners. Trey Lazzara, President of Trade Pro Futures (www.tradeprofutures.com), joins Merlin to discuss what he learned while the Chief Technical Officer for one of the largest trading floors in the Western United States, and how it has helped him run a successful brokerage firm for Futures and Forex. Trey talks about some of the advantages he offers clients such as brokerage side stop losses, low margin requirements and Automated trading systems designed to reduce emotion and enforce discipline. PowerPick: SPY

episodes.title: Which way is the money blowing? Making sense of the Currency Markets.
episodes.summary: Special guest Justin Krebs joins the program to shed some light onto what is happening around the world with respects to currencies. With the Japan crisis escalating, Justin points out why the currency is going the opposite direction that most anticipated. Later they discuss XLT and ProPicks, where Justin highlights the trade he is currently in on the USDCAD. PowerPick:EURUSD

episodes.title: Mastering Multiple Markets with Merlin Rothfeld
episodes.summary: Fresh off the “Mastering Multiple Markets” tour, Merlin dives right back in to Power Trading Radio by addressing the significance of a trading plan. Without a plan, most will fail at trading! As the Inbox fills up, Merlin dives into many burning listener questions. From S&P500 market, Uranium mining companies, Prop Trading and more This show is all about the listeners! PowerPick:EBAY

episodes.title: Why Investors Lose With Buy And Hold Strategies
episodes.summary: Todays Host Mike Mc Mahon and his Special Guest Tillie Allison take a serious look at the losses that many investors are facing in todays markets due to the buy and hold strategies which are taught in most financial circles. Tillie brings great insight into some recent successes that many traditional investors will not be able to realize while Mike is able to highlight many of the downsides of the traditional investing theory. This is a show for anyone who is still trying to recoup their investment losses.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Swing Trading Options and Balancing Risk Management with Leverage
episodes.summary: Today Merlin walks listeners how he uses the TradeStation platform to scan & filter the equity markets to find the handful of high probability, low risk trades. For Wednesday’s trading, this filter came in hand on pointing out a great Shooting star on KLAC on a 5 minute chart which went on to be a great winning trade. Matt Gildea joins the show to talk about how he uses options for his swing trades, and how he  takes full advantage of the leverage and risk management features of options! PowerPick:SPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Focus on Forex
episodes.summary: Merlin dives right into the listeners questions about the current pattern forming on the equity markets, and how we may want to trade it going forward. Special guest Rick Wright joins the program and shares his thoughts on Fibonacci tools, as well as ABC patterns that he uses regularly. These 2 components are great for anticipating market direction, and are the building blocks for Elliot Wave analysis. Rick gives his analysis on a variety of currency pairs, including: EURUSD, AUDCAD, GBPUSD. PowerPick: AUDCAD

episodes.title: Making the Highest Probability Trades Possible with Merlin and Martin Dim
episodes.summary: Martin Dim joins Power Trading Radio to discuss some of the recent trades he has made in the market. Martin sensed that the market had changed its “pattern” and therefore would be ready for a pullback earlier this year. He then had to choose the correct asset class to capitalize on the market move: ETF’s, Leveraged ETFs, Futures, or Options. The final decision was options, and for good reason! Listen in to why Marty made the safest, low risk, high probability trade possible! PowerPick: COP

episodes.title: Open Lines Friday with John O'Donnell and Best Selling Author Dr. Thomas E. Woods Jr.

episodes.summary: Merlin and Corey look at how to use little known Options Strategies to profit in volatile markets and take profits regardless of market direction.

Although other trades were planned out, they never came to fruition. Steve Misic joins the program from Kansas City where he is currently teaching a Forex class. episodes.summary: Merlin starts off the week with a quick overview of the events steering the upside movement in Monday’s markets. After reviewing a couple of trades that did not pan out, Chuck Fulkerson joins Merlin live in the studio. Chuck talks about the strategy component of the Revised Online Trading Academy ProTrader content. Chuck stresses the need for a complete trading plan which has specific strategies which are easy to follow. Chuck talks about the 7 Pillars of trading and how successful traders understand all 7! Chuck takes us inside the class he is teaching in Irvine California, and focuses on Order Execution drills and why it is so important for traders to master order routing. PowerPick: UHS

Special guest, Merlin Rothfeld joins while on vacation to discuss trading opportunities and strategies available in today's market such as JPY / USD and others. No Power Pick today.

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Pro Active Investing
episodes.summary: Back in the saddle as the host of PowerTrading Radio, Merlin reflects on some of the more compelling moments from the International Traders Expo in New York. Really focusing on the false perception that traders MUST be right all the time. Merlin walks listeners through a few of his recent trades, and illustrates that not only are we not right all the time, but that it is OK to be wrong as long as the trade is planned out. Tillie Allison joins the program from a class she is teaching in Detroit to share some thought on Pro Active Investing. Tillie shares some thoughts about Market timing and how we might want to allocate our money during these uncertain times. Several callers phone in questions ranging from the current state of Oil, and money management of trades they are currently in. PowerPick: MYL

Anthony & Merlin take a look at a variety of currency pairs, including: USDJPY, EURUSD, AUDUSD and more. PowerPick:USDJPY

episodes.title: Political Unrest Impacts Gold

Robert’s shares some of the key things he has learned over his extensive trading and investing career. Robert shares some of the key things traders and investors need to focus on when constructing a trading plan. Its All about goals! Robert and Merlin then field a listener question on Gold and Silver. episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Stock Strategies for 2011 with Special Guest Chuck Fulkerson
episodes.summary: Listeners ask Merlin and Guest to share what some of the key things they have learned in their trading career, bot from the retail investor side and trading floor. episodes.title: Building a Strong Portfolio for Volatile Times takes Focus and an Open Mind
episodes.summary:
Merlin and his guest Paul Orme, instructor Online Trading Academy,  review and closely scrutinize a listeners' current portfolio to determine strengths and weaknesses, as well as what can be done to be in a better position.

Later in the show, a new portfolio is discussed that more suits the listeners financial goals and objectives. Paul Outlines the key things that are needed in a portfolio in order to build a solid Rate of Return (ROR).

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Trading Futures Successfully for a living Requires Skills You Can Learn
episodes.summary:
Merlin Rothfeld and his special guest Michael Young, Instructor Online Trading Academy,  break the show into 3 key segments, all dealing with the Futures class Michael is teaching in New York this week.

Segment 1 looks at the past 2 days of instruction and how he brings new and experienced traders up to speed with the ins and out of Futures. Segment 2 looked at trades that were made today, and the justification for them, and segment 3 takes a look ahead at the next trading session and how we prepare for that. PowerPick: GILD

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: Global Currencies and How they impact your trading
episodes.summary: Merlin is joined by Steve Misic for a solid show on Currencies and their impact on our trading. First they  talk about how Gold influences currency prices around the world, as well as which countries are impacted more by gold’s moves. Merlin & Steve discuss the aspects of Technical Analysis and Fundamental analysis, and how it impacts their trades. PowerPick: USDJPY

episodes.seriesTitle: Power Trading Radio - A Trader's Perspective on Investing in Stocks, Futures, Forex, Options Podcast
episodes.title: How to Trade Successfully with Moving Averages
episodes.summary: Merlin and John Barrett talk about some strategies and tactics to use in different markets. John breaks down the importance of defining a Reversal or Continuation trade, and how we need to be flexible and adapt to what the market give us. Finally, we look at Moving Averages and a couple simple trades that worked very well with them. PowerProspects: Up: VCI & HPQ,  Down: CBL, JPM
